perfumes_data.name: Althaïr Parfums de Marly for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Althaïr by Parfums de Marly is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Althaïr was launched in 2023. Althaïr was created by Hamid Merati-Kashani and Ilias Ermenidis. Top notes are Cinnamon, Cardamom, Orange Blossom and Bergamot; middle notes are Bourbon Vanilla and elemi; base notes are Praline, Musk, Ambroxan, Guaiac Wood, Tonka and Candied Almond.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Parfums de Marly launches Althaïr, a masculine fragrance that pays homage to French haute parfumerie and the woody-vanilla-amber fragrance family.
This modern tribute features high-quality Bourbon vanilla blended with citrus, spices, and noble woods for a balance of warmth and freshness. Created collaboratively by Julien Sprecher and perfumers Hamid Merati-Kashani and Ilias Ermenidis, Althaïr boasts a captivating contrast between traditional and disruptive notes, delivering distinct opulence.
Top Notes: Orange Blossom Absolute, Bergamot From Italy, Cinnamon From Ceylon, Cardamom From Guatemala Heart: Bourbon Vanilla From Madagascar, Elemi From The Philippines
Base: Ambrox, Guaiac Wood Praline, Musk
Encased in an opaque, warm-toned brown bottle, the fragrance's imagery invites a multisensory experience.

perfumes_data.name: Le Male Elixir Jean Paul Gaultier for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Le Male Elixir by Jean Paul Gaultier is a Oriental Fougere fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Le Male Elixir was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Quentin Bisch. Top notes are Lavender and Mint; middle notes are Vanilla and Benzoin; base notes are Honey, Tonka Bean and Tobacco.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Welcome on board!
The new sailor Le Male Elixir will induce burning cravings and drive your senses crazy. Burning desire spreads with the irresistible notes of fresh lavender, warming tonka bean, and gentle benzoin. With a gilded torso, this fiery novelty from Jean Paul Gaultier embodies radiant power and seductive charisma.
It is finished! You melt away with burning desire.
This intense fragrance ignites the fire of the senses on his upper body and gives the soft skin a burning sensuality. After a refreshing breeze of mint, the tide rises to addiction, becoming a glowing elixir. In this breath of fresh air, dashing lavender quickly takes on lusty proportions, enhanced by the balsamic richness of benzoin with syrupy vanilla accents. The tonka bean trumps with its warm and sweet tones between honey and tobacco. The time has come: You jump!
Radiant at first sight, glowing with masculinity, more fiery than ever. The torso is bursting with muscles, the skin is bathed in copper color by the sinking sun. What a Gaultier body... what accomplished style. Finely chiseled grooves stand out on its muscles dipped in gold and merge with the amber stripes of the sailor shirt, which plays with transparency effects in a highly sexy way.
Available as 75ml and 125ml Parfum.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
The experience: a passion fruit tasting in remote oud wood forests.
The surprising contrast: the richness of oud wood, contrasted by exotic and luminous passion fruit notes.
Fragrance family: exotic, woody and fruity (vegan).
Key raw materials: passion fruit accord, saffron, rose absolute from Turkey ORPUR, oud accord, benzoin from Laos ORPUR, cistus absolute from Spain ORPUR, leather accord, patchouli oil from Indonesia ORPUR, vanilla, akigalawood.
The ORPUR label brings together the finest natural perfume ingredients from the Givaudan perfume house.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: BOSS Bottled Absolu is a bold Eau de Parfum featuring an irresistible roasted signature. This woody-leathery scent is crafted by Annick Menardo in collaboration with Suzy Le Helley. It opens with a textured Leather accord harmonized with invigorating Incense essence. At the heart, Patchouli essence and Myrrh absolute elevate the scent, while warm Cedarwood and fruity Davana essences at the base leave a lasting trail.

perfumes_data.name: MYSLF Eau de Parfum Yves Saint Laurent for men
perfumes_data.short_description: MYSLF Eau de Parfum by Yves Saint Laurent is a Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. MYSLF Eau de Parfum was launched in 2023. MYSLF Eau de Parfum was created by Christophe Raynaud, Antoine Maisondieu and Daniela Andrier. Top notes are Calabrian bergamot and Bergamot; middle note is Tunisian Orange Blossom; base notes are Ambrofix™ and Patchouli.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
“MYSLF is the expression of the man you are, with all of your emotions and nuances.
“A twist of the traditional woody fragrance family with flowers. A statement of modern masculinity to celebrate your true self.”
The expression of the man you are, with all your nuances. A statement of modern masculinity, embracing all his facets and emotions.

The first YSL BEAUTY woody floral for a contrasted trail of modernity.

At first, a fresh & vibrant accord made of bergamot heart from Calabria and vert de bergamot.
At heart, a raw & beating orange blossom absolute heart from Tunisia crafted for YSL beauty.
At last, a sensual & textured woods accord made of Indonesian patchouli heart and Ambrofix™.

A YSL silhouette in a bottle. Sleek. Fluid.
A black lacquered monolith in nuances where you can see yourself. At its heart, embedded in the glass, is the iconic YSL Cassandre logotype.

My scent, MYSLF.
Available as 40ml, 60ml 100ml Eau de Parfum. Refil bottle is available in size of 150ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: Tobacco Honey Guerlain for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Tobacco Honey by Guerlain is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Tobacco Honey was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Delphine Jelk. Top notes are Honey, Cloves and Anise; middle notes are Tobacco, Vanilla, Tonka and Sesame; base notes are Agarwood (Oud) and Sandalwood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Guerlain launches Tobacco Honey in September 2023 as a part of the  L'Art & La Matière collection. The fragrance combines delicious amber tobacco accord with vanilla, tonka bean, and sesame, that come alive under the glow of intoxicating honey, enhanced by clove and anise accord. At the base, the precious accord reinforces its trail with woody notes combining the creamy softness of sandalwood and the power of oud wood.
"I've wanted to combine honey and tobacco for a long time. On the one hand, we have the dried tobacco leaves with their swirls of powdery aroma; on the other, we have honey as a delicious, enveloping nectar," said Delphine Jelk, Perfumer and Creative Director at Guerlain.
Available in 100ml and 200ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.short_description: Armani Code Eau de Parfum (2024) by Giorgio Armani is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Armani Code Eau de Parfum (2024) was launched in 2024. Top note is Green Mandarin; middle note is Nutmeg; base note is Tonka Bean.

perfumes_data.name: Le Beau Paradise Garden Jean Paul Gaultier for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Le Beau Paradise Garden by Jean Paul Gaultier is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Le Beau Paradise Garden was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Quentin Bisch. Top notes are Green Notes, Watery Notes, Mint and Ginger; middle notes are Coconut, Fig and Salt; base notes are Tonka Bean and Sandalwood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Drawing inspiration from the Autumn/Winter fashion collection of 2010-2011, imagine a lush, enchanting garden named "Le Beau Paradise Garden" and "La Belle Paradise," a haven of intense delights and fervent desires.
Picture a bottle of striking beauty: an emerald-green glass ornately embroidered with a vibrant vine leaf, boasting exquisite, high-fashion details. This alluring, unclothed bottle is impossible to overlook, inviting you to succumb to its charm.
This bottle is a masterpiece, unforgettable in its presence. It's like a tropical beacon, with a Couture-styled embroidered vine leaf artfully obscuring a secret garden where the naked, emerald-green bottle resides. Its magnetic allure draws you into the depths of a hypnotizing and sensuous masculine scent, both mysterious and compelling.
This fragrance is a woody, green aquatic symphony crafted by Quentin Bisch. It encapsulates the heavenly essence of a tropical paradise, replete with radiant flowers and alluring aromas directly from the Garden of Gaultier. The scent intertwines fresh, salty coconut with green fig and the warmth of sandalwood. Accents of spicy ginger, refreshing mint, and sun-warmed Tonka bean add to the fragrance's green aquatic and woody notes, perfectly embodying the passion of the vigorous men who embrace it.
LE BEAU PARADISE GARDEN will be available as 75ml and 125ml Eau de Parum.

Now is the time to experience your moment of immortality. A rich, powerful and long-lasting fragrance composed of spicy woods and intense freshness. The fragrance for absolute winners. The ultimate expression of victory. Never stop winning!
The new fragrance reveals its true nature with its intense blue to black lacquered bottle. The imposing central golden V is the deciding factor.

perfumes_data.name: Guilty Elixir de Parfum pour Homme Gucci for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Guilty Elixir de Parfum pour Homme by Gucci is a Oriental Woody fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Guilty Elixir de Parfum pour Homme was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Quentin Bisch. Top notes are Orange Blossom, Nutmeg and Pimento Seeds; middle notes are Orange Blossom, Orris and Osmanthus; base notes are Vanilla, Ambrofix™, Benzoin and Patchouli.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Gucci Guilty Pour Homme Elixir de Parfum is a woody, ambery leather fragrance for men. Guilty Elixirs are a daring assertion, a colorful extraversion: captivating and sophisticated scents that extend a loving invitation to accept who we are and let our authentic selves be seen while celebrating the countless iterations of love.
Perfumers Quentin Bisch and Nathalie Cetto sign the composition. It opens with accents of peppery pimento and smoky nutmeg. A flamboyant and noble heart of orris butter, orange flower, and sensuous osmanthus is followed by a sensual base of vanillin, ambrofix, and benzoin, which is intensified by an overdose of patchouli.
Extending a loving invitation to explore, create, and connect with our truest selves, Gucci Guilty Pour Femme and Pour Homme fragrances launched with a campaign starring A$AP Rocky, Julia Garner, and Elliot Page.
Available in a 60ml bottle.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Noble materials and pronounced opulence, unlimited sensuality: Scandal Absolu, the absolute scandal. What is the scent of this intense “Scandal” perfume that warms up Jean Paul Gaultier’s nights? The latest rumors say that this “Scandal” is incredibly free, mysteriously charismatic and very undisciplined. It is even said that its woody scent is absolutely sensual and that you will never tire of it again...

perfumes_data.name: Eau d'Ombré Leather Tom Ford for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Eau d'Ombré Leather by Tom Ford is a Leather fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Eau d'Ombré Leather was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Sonia Constant. Top notes are Cardamom, Ginger and Coriander; middle notes are Vanilla and Leather; base note is Ambrofix™.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Eau d'Ombré Leather is described as a wildly radiant composition with leather notes made smoother and milder, mixing accords of rich amber, vanilla, glowing leather, and refreshing spices. The composition opens boldly with fresh ginger, coriander, and cardamom. The note of vanilla tincture stokes a glowing leather accord, a sensual flame grounded in a landscape of rich amber and honeyed woods.
Eau d’Ombré Leather is packaged in a translucent black bottle with a faux-leather plaque. It is available in quantities of 10ml, 50ml, and 100ml.

perfumes_data.name: MYSLF Le Parfum Yves Saint Laurent for men
perfumes_data.short_description: MYSLF Le Parfum by Yves Saint Laurent is a Oriental Woody fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. MYSLF Le Parfum was launched in 2024. MYSLF Le Parfum was created by Daniela Andrier, Antoine Maisondieu and Christophe Raynaud. Top note is Black Pepper; middle note is Orange Blossom; base notes are Bourbon Vanilla, Amber, Woody Notes and Patchouli.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
MYSLF Le Parfum is a more intense interpretation of the men's fragrance "MYSLF Eau de Parfum." This new version has evolved to offer a deeper and more powerful experience. The signature blend of soft orange blossom and textured wood in MYSLF is enhanced by spicy black pepper and sweet vanilla bourbon, culminating in a sensual amber finish.
The packaging features a black color scheme and a slender silhouette, capturing the essence of YSL. The glossy "Cassandra logo" is prominently displayed on the bold matte black glass, creating a design that is both powerful and sophisticated.
MYSLF Le Parfum will be available from late August 2024 in 60ml and 100ml sizes.

perfumes_data.name: Gentleman Society Eau de Parfum Extrême Givenchy for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Gentleman Society Eau de Parfum Extrême by Givenchy is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Gentleman Society Eau de Parfum Extrême was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Karine Dubreuil-Sereni. Top notes are Nutmeg, Peppermint and Clary Sage; middle notes are Coffee, Orris Root, Madagascar Vetiver, Haitian Vetiver, Vetiver and French Narcissus; base notes are Madagascar Vanilla, Australian Sandalwood and Himalayan Cedar.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Givenchy invites the most unstoppable Gentlemen to join the edgiest society with its new Eau de Parfum Extrême. This masculine fragrance combines a dark iced coffee accord with a powerful woody floral fragrance and a spicy scent for the most extreme Eau de Parfum. The perfect match for men who set their own rules and go beyond limits in their relentless pursuit of excellence.
In our quest to craft the perfect men fragrance, Givenchy carefully selected exceptional raw materials, harnessing its savoir-faire. This masculine Eau de Parfum opens with an immediate aromatic and spicy twist, a blend of Clary Sage, ice-cold Peppermint, and fiery Nutmeg. The heart reveals the original Gentleman Society accord, a fusion of Narcissus Absolute, Iris Concrete and quartet of Vetiver which enhances the Coffee Extract Absolute and Peppermint Essence. The base, rich with Cedar, Sandal, Patchouli Essence, and Vanilla Absolute, leaves a deep and lasting impression.
The bottle, inspired by couture, is revisited to embody the new extreme facet. A deep black lacquer finish is adorned with the 4G logo in a bold gunmetal finish, giving a contemporary edge to the iconic design.
Additionally, the Gentleman Society Eau de Parfum Extrême bottle is made from 15% post-consumer recycled glass.
Gentleman Society. Not a place, a state of mind. Come and join us.

perfumes_data.name: Smoking Hot By Kilian for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Smoking Hot by By Kilian is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Smoking Hot was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Mathieu Nardin. Top notes are Apple, Smoke and Cinnamon; middle notes are Tobacco, Vanilla and Moss; base notes are Bourbon Vanilla, Licorice, Orcanox™, Iso E Super and Clary Sage.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
KILIAN launches the latest addition to its Smokes Collection called Smoking Hot in late September 2023. The fragrance offers a fusion of sweetness and smokiness, reminiscent of delectable caramel.
With a contemporary take on the smoky essence, this creation not only redefines the genre for modern sensibilities but also encapsulates an element of scorching allure. The heart of the fragrance is steeped in the lusciousness of caramel, blending the robust depth of Kentucky tobacco absolute and apple shisha. The bold undertones of Bourbon vanilla further contribute to the untamed and opulent nature of this olfactory composition.
The scent opens with apples, and the warm cinnamon bark essence is added to the mellow apple hookah. Then, slowly over time, smoked Kentucky tobacco absolute emerges. A rich tobacco absolute blends with oak moss, followed by Bourbon vanilla with balsamic notes. Orkanox is added to Bourbon Vanilla, also known as Pure Jungle Essence, to express its powerful and sensual charm with a scent.
The exquisite "Smoking Hot" is elegantly presented as a 50ml Eau de Parfum, encapsulating the essence of this alluring fusion within its meticulously crafted formulation.

perfumes_data.name: Jubilation 40 Man Amouage for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Jubilation 40 Man by Amouage is a Woody Chypre fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Jubilation 40 Man was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Bertrand Duchaufour. Top notes are Blackberry, Black Currant, Labdanum, Orange, Rosemary and Davana; middle notes are Frankincense, Bay Leaf, Cinnamon, Broom, Cloves, Celery Seeds and Rose; base notes are Opoponax, Patchouli, Myrrh, Agarwood (Oud), Guaiac Wood, Moss, Cedar, Ambergris, Musk and Cistus Incanus.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
"For this even more celebratory incarnation of Jubilation XXV Man, Amouage called on the talents of its original creator, Bertrand Duchaufour. While keeping the essential structure of his composition intact, the perfumer emphasised and highlighted key aspects to construct an even more striking blend of styles. Jubilation 40 Man reaches new heights of expressiveness, offering an extraordinarily compelling presentation of masculinity.
Retaining the instantly recognisable blackberry opening, the scent now also reveals dry, tart hints of Blackcurrant This makes way for the perfume’s majestic heart: Genet unfurls within a burst of honeyed Tobacco notes while regal Frankincense cuts through the narcotic warmth of Balsams and Resins. Eventually, the scent settles on an enveloping, heart-stopping dry-down of Patchouli, Cistus, and Opoponax. Flaming with magnificence and a lust for adventure, Jubilation 40 Man captures the absolute essence of masculine sophistication."
Top notes: Blackberry, Blackcurrant, Rosemary, Labdanum, Orange, Davana
Heart notes: Scotch Broom, Frankincense, Cinnamon, Clove, Bay St Thomas, Rose, Celery Seeds
Base notes: Patchouli, Cistus, Opoponax, Myrrh, Cedarwood, Guaiac Wood, Musks, Moss, Orientalgris, Oud
Available in a 100 ml bottle, extrait de parfum containing 40% pure perfume oils.

perfumes_data.short_description: Narcotic Delight by Initio Parfums Prives is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Narcotic Delight was launched in 2024. perfumes_data.detailed_description:
"A Sensual Shot of Provocation. It set its sights on the erogenous VANILLA BEAN, electrified by PINK PEPPER, drenched in a draught of COGNAC, before finally succumbing to the intoxicating swirls of a cigar. A cheeky twist of plump and juicy CHERRY celebrates the indulgence of a polished proposition."
Available as 90ml EDP.

perfumes_data.name: Old Fashioned By Kilian for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Old Fashioned by By Kilian is a Oriental Fougere fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Old Fashioned was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Sidonie Lancesseur. Top notes are Wheat and Davana; middle notes are Immortelle and Cedar; base notes are Tolu Balsam and Styrax.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Old Fashioned is a new fragrance of heritage and sophistication, with whisky accords inspired by the complex taste structure of an 18-year-old single malt.
Created in collaboration with perfumer Sidonie Lancesseur, Kilian Hennessy wanted Old Fashioned to evoke only the purest and finest whisky: a single malt, that is, a liqueur cultivated in a single distillery, and aged to perfection with a richness of at least two decades, according to the best Scottish tradition.

perfumes_data.name: Oud Wood Parfum Tom Ford for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Oud Wood Parfum by Tom Ford is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Oud Wood Parfum was launched in 2024. Top notes are Cardamom, Pink Pepper and Rosemary; middle notes are Sandalwood, Agarwood (Oud), Patchouli and Vetiver; base notes are Vanilla, Tonka and Amber.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
TOM FORD BEAUTY will release the new fragrance from the Private Blend collection, the new edition of Oud Wood Eau de Parfum from 2007, called Oud Wood Parfum in March 2024.
Oud Wood is enriched with fresh spices of cardamom and pink pepper, mixing with the essence of rosewood. Various woods including intense patchouli, sandalwood, vetiver, and oud are icombined into the underlying tones of amber, tonka bean absolute, and vanilla.
The sleek and sophisticated bottle, emblematic of Private Blend, is adorned in black paint and embellished with a platinum-colored plaque. Offered in 50ml bottles.

perfumes_data.short_description: Bvlgari Man In Black Parfum by Bvlgari is a Oriental Woody fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Bvlgari Man In Black Parfum was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Alberto Morillas. Top notes are Spices and elemi; middle notes are Iris and Tuberose; base notes are dark woodsy notes and Siam Benzoin.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Exuding a unique elegance, Bvlgari Man in Black Parfum takes the original Eau de Parfum to a new level of density, richness and refinement, embodying a contemporary masculinity through its ambery woody signature.

With addictive and vibrant spicy top notes that smoothly morph into the lavish florality of tuberose and iris, before yielding to the intensity of a dark wood accord, Bvlgari Man in Black Parfum is a contrasting and textured composition. Crafted by Master Perfumer Alberto Morillas, it is the richest and most concentrated fragrance in the Bulgari Man collection to date.

The all-black flacon delivers an intense interpretation of the Bulgari Man in Black aesthetic codes. The dramatic and audacious use of black personifies the higher concentration of the Parfum, differing from the more marked contrast between the black and rose gold of the Eau de Parfum.
TOP NOTES: Vibrant Spice Accord & Elemi Essence
HEART NOTES: Tuberose Absolute & Iris Essence
DRY DOWN NOTES: Dark Wood Accord & Benzoin of Siam Absolute

perfumes_data.name: H24 Herbes Vives Hermès for men
perfumes_data.short_description: H24 Herbes Vives by Hermès is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. H24 Herbes Vives was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Christine Nagel. Top note is Herbal Notes; middle note is Pear; base note is Physcool®.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
With this third part of the H24 line, Hermès perfumer Christine Nagel continues to chronicle her plant-based story in the footsteps of a contemporary man on the move. The H24 Herbes Vives eau de perfume transcribes the rediscovered urban nature after a rain shower.
FRAGRANCE NOTES
The H24 Herbes Vives eau de perfume combines the power of a fresh herbal bouquet with the texture of pear granita and the liveliness of a high-tech molecule, Physcool®.
The bottle with clean lines by Philippe Mouquet is decorated with a green lacquer that reflects the fragrance notes. The packaging is adorned with a deeper gray-green as if the city's asphalt is permeated with vegetal accents. A lime green trim defines and opens up the space.
Available as a 50ml, 100ml, and 200ml (refill) Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: Le Sel d’Issey Issey Miyake for men

Le Sel d’Issey by Issey Miyake is a woody aromatic fragrance that encapsulates the essence of a salt-sprayed voyage.
"Marine meets woody: the contrast of the elements gives birth to Le Sel d’Issey, a revitalizing fragrance born between the Ocean and the earth in a tribute to the salt of life."

As a long-lasting men’s perfume, the YSL perfume impresses with its masculine scent. Fresh lavender from Provence and the woody note of patchouli from Bali ensure an intensely sensual fragrance experience. The men’s fragrance of self-realization convinces in the heart note with lavender and geranium. In the base note, cedar wood and patchouli give the intense fragrance a woody note. Juniper berries in the top note complete the combination of cool and sensual.

perfumes_data.name: Luna Rossa Ocean Eau de Parfum Prada for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Luna Rossa Ocean Eau de Parfum by Prada is a Oriental Woody fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Luna Rossa Ocean Eau de Parfum was launched in 2023. Top note is Grapefruit; middle notes are Woody Notes and Frankincense; base notes are Vanilla and Amber Xtreme.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Prada's men's cologne is an earthy and woody fragrance with warm wood notes. It starts with a refreshing grapefruit essence and features vibrant incense and rich vanilla bean notes. The scent is intensified by the use of OrientalXtreme™, providing a long-lasting and sensual trail. The bottle design is inspired by extreme sailing boats, lacquered in a deep blue to represent the ocean depths and features the iconic Prada red line, symbolizing innovation. The elegant night-black cap is finished with a red dot, referencing Luna Rossa, the red moon.
Prada's Luna Rossa Ocean Eau de Parfum for men is a seductive fragrance that blends strength and refinement, using advanced technology and natural elements. The composition starts with a refreshing burst of grapefruit essence, paired with the robust essence of frankincense and a luxurious vanilla bean accord to create a woody and captivating aroma.
Available as a 50 and 100 ml EDP.

The power of oud wood is enhanced by the synergistic pairing of Lavender orpur and bergamot, creating a thrilling scent whose active ingredients work to boost confidence and positive energy.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
In the summer of 2024, Tom Ford introduces the new version of Neroli Portofino fragrance from the Private Blend collection.
Neroli Portofino Parfum is a refreshing and lively neroli-centered perfume. It contains the essential oil of neroli buds, which brings out the charm of a citrus scent, reminiscent of a freshly blooming orange flower. It lies in the harmonious combination of neroli accord, Italian blood orange, lush white florals, and amber.

Available in bottles of 50ml.

perfumes_data.name: Deified Tony Iommi Parfum Xerjoff for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Deified Tony Iommi Parfum by Xerjoff is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Deified Tony Iommi Parfum was launched in 2024. Top notes are Saffron, Apple and Cinnamon; middle notes are Leather and Rose; base notes are Papyrus, Patchouli, Musk and Moss.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Step into a parallel universe where mystery possesses the mind in a dark and decadent experience that casts subliminal shadows on the wearer.
The second chapter of the almighty collaboration between the greatest riff master of all time, Black Sabbath’s legendary guitarist and rock composer, Tony Iommi and Xerjoff’s esteemed founder, Sergio Momo.
A combination of forces that play on the palindromic nature of sound, scent and sensorial sequences, Tony Iommi Deified parfum is the new Xerjoff Blends venture that presents Deified perfume with a soon to come soundtrack and music video.
Created on a duality of leather and spice, Deified plays in a loop with no beginning and no end, accompanying the wearer with its omnipresent aura. Authentic and warm accents of saffron meet powdery and leathery facets that dance with the delicate touch of gourmand freshness. Cinnamon exalts spicier notes, complemented by gentle rose at the heart.
The woody base of papyrus and patchouli leaves the senses longing for more in a rhythmic exchange of back and forth.
OLFACTORY NOTES
Available sa 50ml Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: L’Homme Idéal Platine Privé Guerlain for men
perfumes_data.short_description: L’Homme Idéal Platine Privé by Guerlain is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. L’Homme Idéal Platine Privé was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Delphine Jelk. Top notes are Grapefruit and Bergamot; middle notes are Green Almond and Neroli; base notes are Musk and Vetiver.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
This concentrate of ideals embodies today's men – modern and unique.
Like skilled cellar masters, Guerlain Perfumers create a new blend to enhance the irresistible uniqueness of L'Homme Idéal—an exceptional cuvée with hints of spirits. The iconic almond note of L'Homme Idéal becomes delightful, thanks to an accord known only to the house of Guerlain.
With L'Homme Idéal Platine Privé, Guerlain Perfumers secretly reorchestrate the irresistible green almond accord to emphasize its freshness and modernity further. The emblematic amaretto note becomes bitter and powerful. Enhanced by a freshness that combines grapefruit essence and pink berries, the almond blends with the strength of Haitian vetiver, resulting in a dualistic signature. An exceptional reinterpretation of our icon.
"Platine Privé reinterprets L'Homme Idéal with an exceptional blend. The signature amaretto accord, enhanced by citrus and vetiver, becomes even sharper and more refined." - Delphine Jelk, Guerlain Perfumer.

perfumes_data.name: Polo 67 Ralph Lauren for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Polo 67 by Ralph Lauren is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Polo 67 was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Marie Salamagne. Top notes are Pineapple, Bergamot and Lemon; middle notes are Sage, Juniper and Rose Hip; base notes are Vetiver, Patchouli and Goldenrod.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Bold, vibrant scent for the man who dares to dream. A captivating blend of woods and citrus fruits ignites a spark, giving a fresh meaning to vitality.
Ralph Lauren Polo 67 Eau de Toilette exudes sensitivity infused with radiance and warmth. It begins with refreshing notes of bergamot, cedar, and pineapple. The core notes of the fragrance are the warmth of the sun and addiction, contrasting with aromatic juniper and fragrant sage notes. Earthy whispers of aromatic vetiver and patchouli chords envelop, leaving a powerful and refined trace. When greatness calls, respond confidently.
This elegant fragrance features five sustainably sourced ingredients: bergamot, lavender, juniper, sage essence, and Haitian vetiver.

perfumes_data.name: Alexandria II Anniversary Xerjoff for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Alexandria II Anniversary by Xerjoff is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Alexandria II Anniversary was launched in 2024. Top notes are Lavender, Bulgarian Rose, Cardamom and Cumin; middle notes are Oud, Amber, Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha, Civet, Orris, Wormwood, Mint and Clary Sage; base notes are Australian Sandalwood, Vanilla and Musk.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Alexandria II Anniversary is emblematic of the complexity and triumph of Alexandria and Alexandria II from the Oud Stars Collection.
A unique creation that honours the conception and significance of the two prestigious perfumes.
Alexandria II Anniversary opens with the deep yet sultry tones of Bulgarian rose, cumin and cardamom, smoothly blended at the heart with the most prosperous and precious ingredient in the world: oud.
Collected from the depths of the Bornean jungles, the finest Tarakan oud adorns the composition, casting a powerful spell on those who experience it.
Presenting an opulent and lustrous new look, this sophisticated scent closes with a warm embrace of musk and vanilla from Madagascar, blended with Australian sandalwood leaving an unforgettable mark on those who wear Alexandria II Anniversary.
OLFACTORY NOTES

perfumes_data.name: Red Tobacco Intense Mancera for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Red Tobacco Intense by Mancera is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Red Tobacco Intense was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Pierre Montale. Top notes are Cinnamon, Incense, Agarwood (Oud), Pear, Saffron and Nutmeg; middle notes are Tobacco, Leather, Patchouli, Jasmine and Vetiver; base notes are Vanilla, Musk, Sandalwood, Guaiac Wood and Ambergris.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
In 2023, Mancera launches the intense version of its popular Red Tobacco fragrance from the Confidential Collection. It is described as an irresistible fragrance that combines vanilla from Madagascar, leather, and the intense aroma of tobacco. This fragrance dazzles with its shimmering spices, saffron, and oud.
Concentrated, powerful, and intoxicating, this fragrance will leave an indelible mark on the space around you, according to the brand.
Available in 60ml and 120ml Extrait de Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: Allure Homme Sport Superleggera Chanel for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Allure Homme Sport Superleggera by Chanel is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Allure Homme Sport Superleggera was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Olivier Polge. Top notes are Citrus, Mandarin and Grapefruit; middle notes are Woody Notes and Cedarwood; base notes are White Musk, Amber, Patchouli and Sandalwood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Allure Homme Sport Superleggera by Chanel is a limited-edition fragrance inspired by the Italian concept of superleggera, which emphasizes lightness and power. This scent is a rethinking of the classic Allure Homme Sport, featuring a lighter mix of woods, less amber, and an 'engine' of patchouli.
The “Superleggera” means “super light” in Italian, and was a nod to the innovative construction technique used by Carrozzeria Touring of Milan. This technique involved wrapping a lightweight aluminum body over a steel frame, resulting in both very light and structurally sound construction of a car.

perfumes_data.name: Habit Rouge Rouge Privé Guerlain for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Habit Rouge Rouge Privé by Guerlain is a Leather fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Habit Rouge Rouge Privé was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Delphine Jelk. Top notes are Bergamot and Ginger; middle notes are Orange Blossom and Iris; base notes are Leather, Vanilla and Patchouli.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
A legend that transcends generations, a true statement of boldness and elegance.
Like skilled cellar masters, Guerlain Perfumers create a new blend from their secret reserve to elevate the elegance of Habit Rouge, making it more refined than ever. A masterful reinterpretation of the myth, an exceptional fragrance with hints of spirits. In the utmost secrecy, the facets of vanilla become liqueur-like, thanks to an accord known only to the house of Guerlain.
For the precious Habit Rouge Rouge Privé edition, this contrasting olfactory journey takes on a more noble and exclusive character than ever before. A splendid homage by Guerlain Perfumers to the first amber fragrance for men, this new composition reinvents its legendary patchouli, vanilla, and leather accord in a more sensual and intense blend. Notes of tanned leather mingle with the warmth of vanilla and captivating patchouli to reveal an exceptional interpretation of Habit Rouge—an outstanding Rouge Privé.
"Rouge Privé reinterprets the Habit Rouge myth with a new exceptional blend. The signature leather facet, played in overdose and combined with bergamot and patchouli, becomes even more sensual and intense." - Delphine Jelk, Guerlain Perfumer Product Benefit.
Inspired by the world of spirits, Habit Rouge Rouge Privé is an extraordinary reinterpretation of the original Habit Rouge. Notes of tanned leather blend with the warmth of vanilla and captivating patchouli to reveal an exceptional interpretation of the myth.

perfumes_data.name: Ani X Nishane for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Ani X by Nishane is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Ani X was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Cécile Zarokian. Top notes are Lemon, Bergamot, Melon, Ginger, Cardamom, Water Notes and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Green Apple, Black Currant, Patchouli, Lavender, Sage and Rose; base notes are Vanilla, Sandalwood, Cashmere Wood, Ambergris, White Musk and Cedar.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
ANI was the first reference launched in 2019 under the new theme “NO BOUNDARIES” that aimed to eliminate all emotional boundaries between people. The fragrance immediately became a global hit being often mentioned as the best vanilla scent ever. With ANI X, NISHANE wanted to enhance this mystical journey through time that the fans had with ANI, a fragrance that pays homage to an ancient metropolis that now stands as a monument to the might of empires and the inevitability of time. Just like the original bestseller, ANI X aims to break down boundaries and to empower the wearers to build their own empire from the ruins. In an attempt to reach the perfume lovers who specifically seek for the refreshening aspect of the scent, ANI X was designed to open with a richer burst of juicy citrus than the original formula of ANI. The freshness that the wearer will feel with the new ANI X on top of the well-known vanilla excellence of the original ANI will be a nice surprise for the perfume lovers.
ANI X is a fragrance with true heritage to its name, and invites you to explore how to eliminate the boundaries of time and space, to create your own empire even when all that remains is nothing but the ruins. So spray on ANI X, let the fragrance take you on a journey through the ages, and embrace the power of history in a bottle.
TOP NOTES
bergamot oil - lemon oil - watery notes - honeydew melon - cardamom oil - blue ginger - pink pepper
HEART NOTES
lavender oil - sage - green apple - blackcurrant - rose - patchouli
BASE NOTES
cedarwood - cashmere wood - vanilla - ambergris infusion - white musk - sandalwood

perfumes_data.name: Ambre Nuit Esprit De Parfum Dior for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Ambre Nuit Esprit De Parfum by Dior is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Ambre Nuit Esprit De Parfum was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Francis Kurkdjian. Top notes are Cinnamon and Cardamom; middle note is Spicy Notes; base notes are Amber and Musk.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Dior Ambre Nuit Esprit De Parfum is a new fragrance for women and men launched in 2024. This scent is an invitation to journey into the dark, where musk seamlessly blends with spices like cinnamon and cardamom. Accompanied by a light amber accord, it leaves an enchanting scent trail that wraps the wearer in its allure.

perfumes_data.name: Wulong Cha X Nishane for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Wulong Cha X by Nishane is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Wulong Cha X was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Julien Rasquinet. Top notes are Bergamot, Yuzu, Litsea Cubeba and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Green Tea, Magnolia and Thyme; base notes are Musk and Fig.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Included in the first-ever NISHANE collection launched globally in the year 2015, WŪLÓNG CHÁ has reached a huge fanbase worldwide thanks to the journey it takes the wearer to the serene tea gardens of the Far East, where the delicate notes of oolong tea leaves and Mediterranean fig fill the air. The original WŪLÓNG CHÁ has been celebrated mainly because of its robust power of refreshing notes. However, WŪLÓNG CHÁ X is designed to mute the sharp edges of the original formula and enhance it with the addition of florals namely magnolia. This fragrance opens with a burst of zesty citrus notes of bergamot, orange, mandarin, and yuzu, transporting the wearer to the sunny shores of the Mediterranean. As the scent settles, the heart notes of magnolia, thyme oil, and green tea weave a magical spell around you, evoking the tranquil stillness of a teatime. Finally, the musk and fig base notes provide a warm and grounding finish to this fragrance that will keep the wearer feeling fresh and revitalized all day.
TOP NOTES
bergamot - yuzu - litsea - mandarin
HEART NOTES
magnolia - thyme oil - green tea
BASE NOTES
musk - fig

perfumes_data.name: Eros Energy Versace for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Eros Energy by Versace is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Eros Energy was launched in 2024. Top notes are Lemon, Lime, Grapefruit, Blood Orange, Sicilian Bergamot and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are White Amber, Pink Pepper and Black Currant; base notes are Oakmoss, Musk and Patchouli.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Eros Energy is inspired by the breathtaking beauty of the Mediterranean coastline; the freshness of its scenery, the wildness of the air, and the luxury of a vast Italian vacation.
Channing Tatum stars in the Versace Eros campaign that debuts the collection’s latest eau de parfum pour homme, Eros Energy, and joins the existing Eros and Eros Flame fragrances.
Love, passion, desire and the breathtaking beauty of the Mediterranean shores form the inspirations of this olfactory creation. A unique freshness and sensuality to feel powerful, sexy and positive. Versace Eros Energy is the fragrance of a passionate man, master of himself and the codes of masculine allure.
Top notes: bergamot, blood orange, lime, mandarin, grapefruit, Lemon
Heart notes: white amber, blackcurrant, pink pepper
Base notes: patchouli, musk, oakmoss

Available as 50ml and 100ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: Hero Parfum Burberry for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Hero Parfum by Burberry is a Oriental Woody fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Hero Parfum was launched in 2024. Top note is Amyris; middle note is Cedarwood; base note is Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Burberry Hero Parfum belongs to the Hero collection and is an intense version composed of amyris, cypriol, and cedar wood.
The fragrance arrives in bottles of 50ml, 100ml and 150ml Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: Oud Minérale (2023) Tom Ford for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Oud Minérale (2023) by Tom Ford is a Woody Aquatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Oud Minérale (2023) was launched in 2023.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
In 2023, Oud Minerale Eau de Parfum by TOM FORD is now launching in the Signature Collection a contrasting fusion of elements.
The warmth of oud is intensified by a rush of fresh pink pepper, while silver fir balsam and ambergris balance earthy and maritime nuances. A wave of smoky wood embraces sensual, skin-clinging musk. Oud Minérale combines rich oud notes with refreshing oceanic minerals.
Notes: marine accord, oud accord, ambergris accord, pink pepper, styrax, and silver fir balsam.
Available in 50ml and 100ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: Ganymede Extrait Marc-Antoine Barrois for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Ganymede Extrait by Marc-Antoine Barrois is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Ganymede Extrait was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Quentin Bisch. Top notes are Incense, Myrrh and Mandarin Orange; middle note is Immortelle; base notes are Akigalawood and Safraleine.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Jupiter’s immense satellite has not only inspired our perfume’s name, but is also known to be full of craters and to have an underground ocean vaster than all of earth’s oceans put together. The perfume’s creators, Marc-Antoine Barrois and Quentin Bisch, have imagined it here in a world with an atmosphere brimming with aromatics that it becomes combustible: its sky is gleaming with the sour spike of mandarin and the holy fumaroles of incense and myrrh. It’s a planet covered with warm velvet dunes where the spicy and caramelized everlasting flower is preponderant. The fiery heart of this fragrance reminds us that the gods gave Ganymede eternal life so that his beauty would never fade. Is it the smoldering skin hidden underneath the wild leather? This precious perfume extract is as much a sophisticated perfume as a carnal one.
Ganymede EXTRAIT unfolds in its dizzying trail the seduction of great Classics.
The sound of the waves from far away. The wind is sweeping a field of everlasting flowers. The sun takes out its right and heats the spicy, almost syrupy scent of these yellow flowers. The waves are caressing the dune.
The wind picks up the sand into warm, leathery, heady gusts- incense, myrrhe? Grains of sand are twirling, incandescent. The rock is flushing, the Akigalawood and Mandarin bring minerals and freshness. The air becomes… captivating.

perfumes_data.name: Hacivat X Nishane for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Hacivat X by Nishane is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Hacivat X was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Julien Rasquinet. Top notes are Pineapple, Bergamot and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Lime, Tunisian Orange Blossom and Jasmine; base notes are Haitian Vetiver, Cedar and Patchouli.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
HACIVAT X is the new interpretation of NISHANE’s global hit HACIVAT (launched in 2017), paying homage to the traditional shadow play character with a chypre structure that exudes elegance, competence, and love of art. This fragrance is a celebration of life, with stimulating notes of pineapple and bergamot backed by woody notes. It features top notes of juicy pineapple, zesty bergamot, and spicy pink pepper, leading to a heart of refreshing lime, delicate jasmine,and orange blossom. The base notes include earthy patchouli, woody cedarwood, and vetiver from Haiti.
NISHANE is looking forward to hearing the thoughts of the crowded HACIVAT fans worldwide about HACIVAT X and is sure that it will quickly become a new favorite amongst the fragrance enthusiasts with its highly addictive and noticeable scent.
TOP NOTES
bergamot - pineapple - pepper pink
HEART NOTES
lime - jasmine - orange flower
BASE NOTES

Explore the captivating essence of Azzaro The Most Wanted EDT Intense, a fragrance that seamlessly blends invigorating freshness with irresistible sensuality. Crafted for the modern man who fearlessly charts his own course.
Embark on a journey of allure and allure with Azzaro The Most Wanted Eau de Toilette Intense. The bottle of Azzaro The Most Wanted Eau de Toilette Intense is a testament to style and self-assurance. Its iconic black barrel design, juxtaposed with the light hue of the fragrance within, reflects both elegance and contrast. The sleek, contemporary design mirrors the bold essence of the fragrance, making a visual statement of modern sophistication.

The effervescence of grapefruit, juxtaposed with sophisticated woody nuances. Perseus enthralls the senses with its unparalleled luminosity. Blu Mediterraneo Mandarino di Sicilia is a fragrance inspired by Sicily's sun-drenched landscapes, where architecture and culture merge with nature's splendor, encapsulating the Italian Arte di Vivere as a state of mind. The fragrance blends fresh, green notes of mandarin with a heart of Italian citrus, creating a lively and refreshing sensation.
The fragrance opens with the invigorating aroma of green mandarin, sparkling with an effervescent blend of bergamot, lemon, and juicy red orange. This combination wraps the scent in the brightness of a Sicilian summer, radiating intense emerald nuances and a lively freshness. In its heart, the green hue of the mandarin meets the freshness of the notes of petit-grain and spearmint in a blend that extends the fragrance's longevity. The cedarwood base note completes this green sensation, while the musk note adds a clean, sophisticated brilliance.
Green Mandarin, Bergamot, Lemon, Blood orange

Patchouli, Cedarwood, Musk

Luna Rossa Ocean Le Parfum by Prada is a fragrance that blends classic perfumery art with modern technology, symbolizing the ability to push boundaries and redefine what is possible. Luna Rossa Ocean Le Parfum by Prada is refillable, available in 50ml and 100ml bottles and a 150ml refill.

perfumes_data.name: Penguin Zoologist Perfumes for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Penguin by Zoologist Perfumes is a Leather fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Penguin was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Chiaki Nomura. Top notes are Ozonic notes, Ice and juniper berry; middle notes are Pink Pepper, Saffron and Labdanum; base notes are Suede, Moss, Musk and Sandalwood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Zoologist Penguin by Chiaki Nomura
Top Notes: Antarctic Air, Ice Accord, Juniper Berry
Heart Notes: Pink Pepper, Saffron, Ciste Absolute
Base Notes: Sandalwood, Musks, Seamoss, Suede
Emperors they may be, but when a massive cyclone unleashes its merciless austral winds, the colony of penguins bow to its power. It's from such extremes that the male penguin must guard his precious bundle. Passed tenderly from mother to father, the egg is their shared purpose. She embarks on a perilous odyssey to the sea for food. He begins his own monotonous march, packed tightly in a circle of trudging penguins. So intent is he on protecting his egg that even the dazzling aurora australis against a lonely night sky escapes his notice.
Zoologist Penguin opens with saffron caught upon a salty blast of crisp antarctic air. Against the cool desolation, anticipation glimmers as lively aromas of pink pepper and sea moss swirl over musks, suede and sandalwood. Brace yourself for a vibrant scent that Is always invigorating, a reminder of nature’s harsh reality in a welcome blast.

perfumes_data.name: Spicebomb Infrared Eau de Parfum Viktor&Rolf for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Spicebomb Infrared Eau de Parfum by Viktor&Rolf is a Leather fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Spicebomb Infrared Eau de Parfum was launched in 2023. Spicebomb Infrared Eau de Parfum was created by Carlos Benaïm, Nicolas Beaulieu and Jean-Christophe Hérault. Top notes are Cinnamon, Chili Pepper and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Chili Pepper and Leather; base notes are Resins and Woodsy Notes.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
SPICEBOMB INFRARED Eau de Parfum is the most carnal and intense fragrance in the Spicebomb collection. This highly captivating scent for men is the result of a collaboration between three renowned perfumers: Jean Christophe Herault, Carlos Benaim, and Nicolas Beaulieu. Spicebomb Infrared Eau de Parfum is an erotic explosion of spices built around a seductive leather accord.
From the first whiff, your senses will be ignited by a combination of chili pepper, pink pepper, and the aphrodisiac essence of cinnamon. The heart of the fragrance reveals a fiery red habanero pepper that arouses the skin with its scorching touch. At its base, the fragrance is grounded by notes of resinous wood and the animalistic allure of leather, adding infinite sensuality to the scent. Unapologetically bold, Spicebomb Infrared is more than just a sensual and carnal fragrance; it is truly erotic.
Housed in the collection's signature grenade-shaped bottle, the design is enhanced with a powerful red hue for this edition. Spicebomb Infrared Eau de Parfum is available in 50ml and 90ml sprays, ready to be unleashed for an explosive fragrance experience.

perfumes_data.name: Oud Cadenza Maison Crivelli for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Oud Cadenza by Maison Crivelli is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Oud Cadenza was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Jordi Fernandez. Top notes are Saffron, Cinnamon, Cardamom, Ginger, Nutmeg and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Dates, Caramel, Agarwood (Oud), Sugar Cane, Incense, Amberwood, Myrrh and Davana; base notes are Madagascar Vanilla, Tonka, Cacao Butter, Leather, Benzoin, Musk, Patchouli, Labdanum and Mate.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Maison Crivelli presents Oud Cadenza, an extrait de parfum developed in collaboration with perfumer Jordi Fernandez. Inspired by Thibaud Crivelli's personal adventure of smelling oud at a hidden party in a palm grove, this fragrance features a surprising contrast of oud with a date and toasted cane sugar accord.
"Oud Cadenza Extrait de parfum
The defining adventure: smelling oud while attending a hidden party in a palm grove.

The surprising contrast: oud contrasts with a date and toasted cane sugar accord.

Fragrance family: gourmand woody (vegan).

Key raw materials: cardamom oil from India ORPUR, cinnamon bark oil, saffron, oud wood accord, davana oil from India OPRUR, cocoa butter absolute ORPUR, vanilla extract from Madagascar ORPUR, patchouli oil from Indonesia ORPUR, toasted tonka bean absolute from Venezuela ORPUR, myrrh.

The ORPUR label brings together the finest natural perfume ingredients from the Givaudan perfume house."

A new intense interpretation of the iconic Pour Homme woody musky scent. An Eau de Parfum created around dazzling fresh and spicy notes, which unfolds in an ultimate duo of tea blend accords bringing longlastingness. Crafted by Master perfumer Jacques Cavallier.
The elegant and minimalist flacon matches the innate freshness and comforting notes of the new Eau de Parfum. Its transparent green and evocative tones not only refer to the new concentration of Pour Homme but also opens up to the harmonic scenery underlying the fragrance. Simple yet iconic, the bottle is the gateway to an inner sanctuary, anticipating the comfortable feeling of being in a safe space.

perfumes_data.name: Kenzo Homme Santal Marin Kenzo for men

perfumes_data.name: Y Elixir Yves Saint Laurent for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Y Elixir by Yves Saint Laurent is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Y Elixir was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Dominique Ropion. Top note is Lavender; middle note is Geranium; base notes are Frankincense and Oud.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
THE ELIXIR OF Y, THE ELIXIR OF SUCCESS.
The quintessential fragrance for the self-accomplished man. A new opus with the highest concentration of Y, a timeless intensity. The Yconic dark and white fougere blends with exceptional ingredients of perfumery in this new juice crafted by master perfumer Dominique Ropion.
HIGHLY ENIGMATIC. INTENSELY RICH.
A deep woody-spicy take on Y. An unprecedented quality of raw materials.
The most singular white accord : A quality of a Diva lavender heart exclusively crafted for YSL Beauty from Provence; a geranium accord captured in the Ourika Community Gardens in Morocco precisely at 9:40 AM for its unique freshness.
The most sumptuous dark accord: A warmly resinous mysterious incense and a precious oud of natural origin with a leathery sensual facet.
THE BOTTLE. A METALLIC BLUE OPUS.

The iconic bottle created by Suzanne Dalton for YSL takes on its most luxurious appearance yet for Y L'ELIXIR. In a bold statement on Y’s signature color, ever-shifting, the new bottle catches the light through the elegant, translucent metallic blue shade of the glass.

Oud Stallion gives the experience of smelling oud wood while attending a horse race. The surprising contrast is provided by smoky leather with the depth of oud wood. It is a leather woody (vegan) fragrance.
Key raw materials: ORPUR cardamon absolute from India, nutmeg essential oil from Indonesia, saffron, ORPUR rose absolute from Turkey, ORPUR osmanthus absolute, ORPUR jasmine absolute from Egypt, cedarwood essential oil from Morocco, leather accord, ORPUR patchouli oil from Indonesia, roasted tonka bean absolute from Venezuela.
The ORPUR label brings together the finest natural perfume ingredients from the Givaudan perfume house.
Available as a 50ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: Grey Vetiver Parfum Tom Ford for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Grey Vetiver Parfum by Tom Ford is a Woody Spicy fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Grey Vetiver Parfum was launched in 2023. Top note is Orange Blossom; middle note is Saffron; base note is Haitian Vetiver.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Tom Ford launched Grey Vetiver in 2009 as a woody-spicy scent in Eau de Perfume concentration. In 2014, the house introduced its fresher, more luminous and lighter version—Grey Vetiver Eau de Toilette. In 2023, the collection ins expanded by the new edition - Grey Vetiver Parfum.
Described as a bolder iteration of the original, Grey Vetiver Parfum is inspired by Tom Ford's impeccable tailoring and styling. A trio of sustainably sourced vetivers are used to exude intense radiance. The notes of fresh orange blossom give way to saffron, as the world's most expensive spice. The fragrance elicits the essence of debonair masculinity, merging natural, sustainably sourced vetiver with warm orange flower and rich spices.
"If you go into our stores, grey is the color of the packaging, our carpets, and our walls; in a sense it's the Tom Ford color. The idea was to convey a cool, silvery, very refined vetiver." -TOM FORD.
Available in bottles of 50 and 100 ml.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Benoist Lapouza presents a floral and oriental fragrance that illuminated the last rays of the sun before welcoming the evening between the dunes. Fragrance pyramid reveals top notes of incense and orange over a foundation of cinnamon, tonka bean, and chocolate. The base reveals cedar and iris notes to us.

perfumes_data.name: Opus XV – King Blue Amouage for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Opus XV – King Blue by Amouage is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Opus XV – King Blue was launched in 2023. Opus XV – King Blue was created by Alexis Grugeon and Hamid Merati-Kashani. Top notes are Mandarin Orange, Black Currant and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Frankincense and Amber; base notes are Agarwood (Oud), Leather, Oak, Patchouli and Sandalwood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
A primal new member of the esteemed Library Collection – Opus XV - King Blue is a perfume of endless questions, of curious detours and unforeseen revelations.
An opening of vibrant mandarin leads unexpectedly to a bold, animalic and effortlessly sophisticated base of oud. Surrealism in Scent - Opus XV explores the primordial nature of contrastive ingredients that blend together to evoke a sense of mystery and intrigue.

perfumes_data.name: Luna Rossa 2024 Prada for men

perfumes_data.name: Valentino Uomo Born in Roma Green Stravaganza Valentino for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Valentino Uomo Born in Roma Green Stravaganza by Valentino is a Oriental Fougere fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Valentino Uomo Born in Roma Green Stravaganza was launched in 2024. Valentino Uomo Born in Roma Green Stravaganza was created by Nathalie Lorson and Olivier Cresp. Top note is Calabrian bergamot; middle note is Coffee; base note is Vetiver.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Born In Roma Uomo Green Stravaganza Eau De Toilette is an audacious and captivating fragrance that embodies the spirit of Rome. This fougère ambery scent unveils its allure through the zestful Calabrian bergamot and the invigorating coffee accord. As dawn breaks over Rome, it transports you to the city's serene gardens, celebrating freedom and self-expression. This fragrance encapsulates the dynamic energy of Rome, a place where individuality sparkles and possibilities are boundless.
The fragrance is a part of the Fougère, Orientaly family. It begins with the dynamic note of Calabrian Bergamot Heart, which gradually unfolds its intensity. The fragrance's heart is marked by a robust Coffee Accord, reminiscent of a rich espresso shot, adding to its irresistible charm. The base is graced with Haiti's earthy and refined Vetiver Heart Essence, lending the fragrance a natural elegance and sophistication. Each ingredient is sustainably sourced, reflecting Valentino Beauty's dedication to responsible luxury.
Fragrance family: Fougère, Orientaly
Top notes: Calabrian Bergamot
Heart Heart Notes: Coffee Accord
Base Notes: Vetiver Heart Essence
Born In Roma Uomo Green Stravaganza Eau De Toilette is encased in an eye-catching bottle that pays homage to the iconic Valentino Rockstud. Inspired by the timeless architecture of Rome, the bottle's pyramid shape is a hallmark of Maison Valentino. Adorned in bold black leather and vivid green, the bottle radiates the passion, audacity, and lavishness synonymous with Valentino. It visually represents the fragrance's lively character and unique style.
Launched in 2024, it is available as a 50ml and 100ml Eau de Toilette.

perfumes_data.name: Myrrhe Mystère Tom Ford for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Myrrhe Mystère by Tom Ford is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Myrrhe Mystère was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Rodrigo Flores-Roux.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Tom Ford launches Myrrhe Mystère, a new addition to the Private Blend collection, in September 2023. The new exclusive creation delves into the enigmatic world of amber, crafted to showcase Tom Ford's personal interpretation of the ingredient of myrrh.
Myrrhe Mystère embraces the rarity and exclusivity fueled by the ingredient's ancient heritage and expands olfactory horizons with the allure of warm, woody, and sweet notes.
The composition develops with myrrh essence and myrrh resinoid absolute, wrapped up in smooth sandalwood and vanilla notes.
Tom Ford Myrrhe Mystère is available as a 30 and 50 ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: The Dandy Penhaligon's for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: The Dandy by Penhaligon's is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. The Dandy was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Fabrice Pellegrin. Top notes are Raspberry, Citron and Bergamot; middle notes are Oak, Whiskey and Cedarwood; base notes are Patchouli and Clearwood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
“Penhaligon’s presents The Dandy, a woody ode to whiskey, tinged with impertinence. Surrounded by a cloud of smoke, here we are, the mischievous spirit coming from all sides, following the decadence of rowdy heels. Cast aside all inhibitions, my friends, because once you’re down those steps, the party will never, ever end.

Run shoulders with visionaries, rub shoulders with artists, loosen that tie, ready for a thousand faces. Lipstick marks on mirrors (and collars), sip amber liqueur.  In crystal glasses, under convoluted chandeliers. Suddenly the stroke of midnight rings out, to the tempo of the brass orchestra, trumpets and saxophones beating time, in the dazzling reflection of your glass. Here we are in the land of jazz, of swing that surges to the rhythm of whiskey, of bebop that gallops to the beats of bourbon. Oh, what tumultuous memories in this den, the spirits cheerful, the cocktails flowing freely. In the misty steam, if the speakeasy stage, in this place the dandy, which will forever be ours…to dance to infinity”

Natural lavender is an essential ingredient in the history of the House of CARON. It is overdosed at 61% in Pour Un Homme de CARON. The House of CARON collaborates with Jérôme BOENLE, a lavender producer based in Sault, Provence.

perfumes_data.name: Explorer Platinum Montblanc for men

perfumes_data.name: Tilia Marc-Antoine Barrois for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Tilia by Marc-Antoine Barrois is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Tilia was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Quentin Bisch. Top notes are Lime (Linden) Blossom, Jasmine Sambac and Broom; middle notes are Heliotrope, Orange Blossom and Vetiver; base notes are Ambrofix™ and Georgywood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Simple. Solar. Smiling. It is the scent of everlasting summer. Of holidays that never end. Of long lazy lunches with friends, out in the countryside, around a big wooden table. Of flowers that just keep on blooming.

Tender verdancy, pollen, honey from the linden tree with its lovely heart-shaped leaves, an emblem of softness and flexibility for the Celts. The honeyed, apricot inflexions of broom. The tender powder of heliotrope. A bucolic bouquet made still richer with a sprig of velvety jasmine Sambac. Underlined, like a stroke of shade intensifying the radiance of an afternoon in the sun, by the smoky earthiness of vetiver...

The first of a constellation of floral fragrances, Tilia is also, for its creator Marc-Antoine Barrois and his long-time accomplice, the perfumer Quentin Bisch, the name of an imaginary star. The one that shines on happy days. An ode to simplicity and optimism.

perfumes_data.name: Vanille Planifolia Extrait 21 Guerlain for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Vanille Planifolia Extrait 21 by Guerlain is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Vanille Planifolia Extrait 21 was launched in 2023. Vanille Planifolia Extrait 21 was created by Delphine Jelk and Thierry Wasser.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Vanille Planifolia Extrait 21 reveals vanilla in its most perfect olfactory expression at Guerlain and reveals a most delicious signature. Taken to its climax, the overdose of vanilla is tinged with that Guerlain je ne sais quoi which makes it a great perfume, in an ultimate concentration of 30%.

Guerlain Perfumers increase the intoxication of vanilla by punctuating it with spicy notes. In the background, it is enveloped in musky notes and the famous opopanine, Guerlain's legendary amber accord.

Vanille Planifolia Extrait 21 is part of the Les Extraits Signature extract collection which embodies the quintessence of Guerlain trail. Paying homage to the alchemy of Guerlinade – the emblematic signature of the House – The Signature Extracts highlight each of the six raw materials that compose it and reveal its golden ratio.

perfumes_data.name: Legend Blue Montblanc for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Legend Blue by Montblanc is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Legend Blue was launched in 2024. Top notes are Lavender and Mint; middle notes are Cedar and Sandalwood; base notes are Ambroxan and Moss.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Discover Montblanc Legend Blue, a new facet of the Legend man: elegant, masculine, modern, and timeless. This new transparent bottle in blue lacquer reveals the Eau de Parfum inside. A woody, aromatic, and fresh Eau de Parfum: it resonates with the aromatic accord of mint and lavender and then reveals a woody heart with cedar and sandalwood. Finally, ambroxan combines with moss notes to create an intense olfactory aura. Zinédine Zidane, with his charisma and natural elegance, is once again the face of this new Legend Blue perfume.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: The woody notes of powerful vetiver, lifted by spicy ginger and warm sage. A streamlined formula composed only of essentials, like an ode to the elements, which triggers an instant addiction. In this new Eau de toilette Intense, vetiver root exudes its woody generosity.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Invictus Aqua Eau de Toilette is back once more, with its powerful aquatic vibes. The fragrance masterfully balances the contrast of the fresh marine accord with the enticing and warm amber wood. The new version opens with grapefruit oil, bolstering the intensity of marine notes, and finishes with powerful amberwood that grants an irresistible, masculine scent trail.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Notes: Ambroxan, Australian oud, Clearwood™, Cypriol, Fig, Fig leaf, Gaiac wood, Musk, Oakmoss, Orris root , Oud Assafi™, Peru balsam, Rose, Saffron, Tolu balm, Vanilla.

perfumes_data.name: Écrin de Fumée Serge Lutens for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Écrin de Fumée by Serge Lutens is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Écrin de Fumée was launched in 2023.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
"Infused with the sweet and sensual scent of tobacco, this is a poetic ode to those who burn life at both ends.
To those for whom excess is a way of life, who love celebrating the pleasures of living in the most opulent luxury. To those who know that time flies so fast that life must be lived intensely and celebrated to the hilt.
Living dangerously has its limits, and disenchantment is inevitable. When the party ends and the smokescreen falls, lost illusions resurface. A tragic and fascinating reality check."
"Quick, quick, the world is ending! Our very existence needs urgent tending.
Amid the roar of the cannons, the champagne flows. Corks in the air, could they be aflame?
Beneath the smokescreen, life is a decadent game." - Serge Lutens
Available in 50 and 100 ml.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Nerolia Vetiver Forte embodies a Neroli irradiated with light, enveloped in the generosity of a velvety Fig accord, the warmth of Vetiver and the almond notes of Tonka Bean.
“I imagined a neroli golden by the rays of the setting sun, awakened by the power of vetiver, – Delphine Jelk.

perfumes_data.name: GNTONIC M. Micallef for men
perfumes_data.short_description: GNTONIC by M. Micallef is a Woody Spicy fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. GNTONIC was launched in 2023. perfumes_data.name: Search Amouage for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Search by Amouage is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Search was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Alexis Grugeon. Top notes are Lime, Lemon and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Olibanum, elemi and Black Pepper; base notes are Vetiver, Cade oil and Guaiac Wood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
CITRUSES WITHIN BURNING WOODS
It is at first a flash of Lemon, insanely vibrant and bright, striking like lightning in the middle of the night. Fluttering notes of Lime, lively and shrill, soon come forth, welded into the metallic zing of Mandarin, its leathery zest and bittersweetness.
 
Shackled in a cage of dark woods, the Citrus fight with a newfound strength, their light shining brighter as delicate notes of Elemi and a heavenly touch of Hojari Frankincense burst open.
 
Even as the smoke rises and crashes in waves of burnt Cake, spicy Guaiac wood and incandescent Vetiver, the Citrus bouquet carries its brilliance proud, undefeated, and undimmed.
 
A tale of trying and reaching, of life overcoming shade, Search captures the virile energy of resilient minds unafraid to fight their inner darkness to become their ideal self.

perfumes_data.name: Hacivat Oud Nishane for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Hacivat Oud by Nishane is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Hacivat Oud was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Dominique Ropion. Top notes are Pineapple, Citruses, Black Pepper and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Frankincense, Olibanum and Jasmine; base notes are Oud, Patchouli, Haitian Vetiver and Vanilla.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
HACIVAT OUD belongs to Nishane Prestige Collection, and it is created in collaboration with the master perfumer DOMINIQUE ROPION. This luxurious and opulent scent is a richer version of Nishane`s bestseller, HACIVAT.
"Our iconic scent Hacivat was created under the inspiration of the traditional shadow play character Hacivat. We have taken that inspiration to a whole new level by creating a scent that is richer, stronger, and more sophisticated to be included in our Prestige Collection which started with NEFS in 2019 and expanded with the addition of SHEM and MANA, respectively.
HACIVAT OUD was crafted to address the taste of those who desire a luxurious scent that embodies elegance and charm but still has traces of Hacivat. Our new fragrance is the perfect choice for those who appreciate the finer things in life. The scent is a complex blend of oud and pineapple, making it an unforgettable fragrance that will leave a lasting impression. With carefully selected and high-quality ingredients, this fragrance offers a more intense and captivating aroma, giving you an unforgettable sensory experience.
We believe this fragrance will become a beloved addition to the collections of perfume lovers and a staple for those who seek a truly luxurious fragrance experience," says from Nishane.
TOP NOTES: PINEAPPLE, CITRUS, PEPPER PINK & BLACK
HEART NOTES: JASMINE, OLIBANUM OIL & RESINOID
BASE NOTES: VETIVER OIL HAITI, PATCHOULI OIL INDONESIA, VANILLA, OUD OIL

perfumes_data.short_description: Un Jardin à Cythère by Hermès is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Un Jardin à Cythère was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Christine Nagel.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Created by Hermès’ perfumer Christine Nagel, Un Jardin à Cythère eau de toilette is a surprising garden that its neither green nor floral, but... blond. It is the expression of an olfactory quest through Greece that leads to Kythira, an unspoiled island that has inspired many artists. A citrus and woody fragrance, Un Jardin à Cythère eau de toilette combines enveloping notes of grasses with the strength of olive wood and the tenderness of fresh pistachio.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: “The minerality is given by different agreements combined with each other,” explains Mathilde Bijaoui. “Cold and spicy cardamom, incense, aromatic geranium, marine and leathery red algae – a magnificent ingredient reminiscent of musk. This minerality is what makes the fragrance unique."

perfumes_data.short_description: Liam by Lattafa Perfumes is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Liam was launched in 2023. Top notes are Cardamom, Fig and Black Tea; middle notes are Iris, Vetiver and Labdanum; base notes are Vanilla, Sandalwood, Tonka and Patchouli.

perfumes_data.name: King Cobra Zoologist Perfumes for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: King Cobra by Zoologist Perfumes is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. King Cobra was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Prin Lomros. Top notes are cannabis, Camphor, Pomelo, Fig Leaf, Petitgrain and Mandarin; middle notes are Soil Tincture, Black Tea, Cumin and Leather; base notes are Incense, Moss, Vetiver, Patchouli and Amber.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Intoxicating aromas of exotic greenery infuse the ancient Indian forest. Yet a snake on the trail of its next meal can isolate the scent of a plump rat. But a flick of its slithering tail betrays the snake, sending the rodent darting away. Thwarted, the snake curls back upon itself, only to feel the cool touch of a menacing shadow of a towering King Cobra witnessing its failure. Now the predator becomes prey and there’s no escape. Intent on a breakfast devoured whole and without mercy, the hooded king strikes. Fangs sink deep, their venom coursing through the body of the snake. Instantly paralyzing heart and lungs, the toxins set to work dissolving the flesh from the inside out.
King Cobra from Zoologist is driven by danger and a desire to dominate. It hypnotizes with camphorous notes of Ganja and petitgrain, radiating coils of aromatic spices and damp mossy soil around a body heavy with incense. Finally, after shedding a delicate green leather, the powerful king ascends to his throne. A coronation of scent, King Cobra gives you license to rule.

perfumes_data.name: Purpose Amouage for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Purpose by Amouage is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Purpose was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Quentin Bisch. Top notes are Olibanum, Black and Pink Pepper, Pimento and Bergamot; middle notes are Vetiver, Papyrus, Sandalwood and Rose; base notes are Akigalawood, Saffron, Suede and Mystikal.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
SHAMANIC AWAKENING
A brisk Bergamot washes over you like a draft of glacial air. You feel the cold grip of Pink Pepper, the slight tingle of Pimento Berry in your fingers and a Frankincense encapsulating your past and your future.
 
A deep breath fills your lungs with the fierce and smoky scent of Sand Vetiver and of an animalic Rose whose weathered tobacco accents tame the tension between an earthy Papyrus and a silken touch of Sandalwood.
 
Yet this is roads’ end, where the sun is always high, and rays of aldehydic Mystikal suddenly spear through Saffron and Suede, your leathery cloak of doubts, to kindle a mist of Akigalawood, shimmering like a swarm of fireflies.
 
A vertical totem of mineral woods and stellar sparks of spice, Purpose is a shamanic awakening, the scent of feeling at peace, of finding your roots, of feeling complete.

The nose behind this fragrance is Alberto Morillas. Top notes are Green Tea and Orange; middle notes are White Lotus and Musk; base notes are Guaiac Wood and Amber.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Bvlgari Man Rain Essence is an invitation to experience the unstoppable creative power of water through the transformative and restorative power of rain. Powerful and indispensable as rain, Bulgari Man Rain Essence is a unique fresh woody musk fragrance permeated with clear and radiant notes. It is given strength by energetic mineral accords that bring to mind the purity of this rejuvenating natural element.
TOP NOTES: green tea essence and orange essence
MIDDLE NOTES: accord of white lotus and accord of crystalline musk
BASE NOTES: mineral amber accord and guaiac wood essence
Bvlgari Man Rain Essence is available as a 60ml and 100ml Eau de Parfum.
