perfumes_data.name: Infinity Montale for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Infinity by Montale is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Infinity was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Pierre Montale. Top notes are Black Cherry, Plum, Saffron, Pink Pepper and Cardamom; middle notes are Oud, Leather, Sandalwood, Rose, Vetiver and Tuberose; base notes are Tobacco Leaf, Vanilla Sugar, Tonka, Amber and Musk.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
"There can be no mistaking his deep gaze. His eyes are fixated to the intangible and he moves forward peacefully. At first sight, this piquant character pulls you in. The brightness of his smile, and the pink Pepper come to pick you up. Cross his path and you immediately turn away from your routine. The space around him becomes his, permeated by a purple wave of Plum and black Cherry that whisper of its sweet origin and touch your soul.
It’s a beautiful summer, a summer echoing its temperance and made of the sun’s caresses under the light sheets, of fresh Flowers opening in the morning and of starry nights in the souvenir of the scorching day.
The soft Indian Rose gently balances the Leather and black Oud in a semi-hypnotic pendulum where Sandalwood and Vanilla mingle without excess. You are touching a rare, ambered and deeply oriental feeling, a sensation whose genesis you would not know: who from the message or the messenger, who from the wake one has been left in or its wearer? Who from the top note or the heart will take you to your own immensity?
It doesn’t matter, because in the end, all roads lead to Infinity." - Montale
NOTES
Black Cherry, Plum, Peruvian Pink Pepper, Cardamom & Saffron.
Black Oud & Leather, Indian Rose & Solar Tuberose, Sandalwood & Vetiver.
Vanilla Sugar, Intense Oriental, Tobacco Leaves, Tonka Beans & Musk.

perfumes_data.name: Fan Your Flames X Nishane for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Fan Your Flames X by Nishane is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Fan Your Flames X was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Miroslav Petkov. Top notes are Coconut, Rum and Mastic or Lentisque; middle notes are Tobacco, Tonka Bean, Carrot and Thyme; base notes are Patchouli, Cedar and Oakmoss.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Inspired by the quote “Set your life on fire. Seek those who fan your flames” by Rumi, FAN YOUR FLAMES, launched in 2016, is another global hit of NISHANE. Underlining the desire of people to be surrounded by the friends who would encourage them no matter what they want to do with their life, the original formula offers a blend of notes that evoke a warm and inviting atmosphere. The new offering FAN YOUR FLAMES X is designed to soften the flames of the original bestseller by a gentle touch of tropical flavors.
The fragrance opens with a combination of coconut, rum, and lentisque, which gives off a sweet and tropical vibe. The heart of the fragrance features a mix of tobacco, tonka bean, and thyme oil, which creates a rich and spicy aroma. The base notes consist of cedar, oakmoss, and patchouli, which provide a woody and earthy finish to the fragrance. This scent is a great choice for those who love warm and comforting fragrances with a touch of exoticism.
TOP NOTES
coconut - rum - lentisque
HEART NOTES
tobacco - tonka bean - thyme oil - carrot
BASE NOTES
cedar- oakmoss - patchouli

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
All it Takes is A Drop.
Discover the exceptional intensity of Ralph’s Club Elixir. Grounded in the iconic woody sophistication of Ralph’s Club reinterpreted to reveal a more intense and luxurious facet, Ralph’s Club Elixir combines sensual notes refined through an intoxicating ambery quality.

The perfect fragrance for anyone who wants to stand out from the crowd and make a statement that lasts long after the night is over.

perfumes_data.name: Quattro Pizzi Xerjoff for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Quattro Pizzi by Xerjoff is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Quattro Pizzi was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Sofia Bardelli. Top notes are Davana, Rum, Pink Pepper and Coriander; middle notes are Tuberose and Coconut; base notes are Hay, Tonka Bean and Tobacco Leaf.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
The story of a Sicilian dynasty that has known glory, wealth and power.
Quattro Pizzi, the most iconic palace that was home to Palermo’s most symbolic and prominent families. A perfume reminiscent of the Belle Époque era, where love, beauty and nobility entwine with secrecy and sin.
A juxtapose of sweet and spicy hits the senses on first spray with rum, davana and pink pepper, where the intoxicating notes of tuberose enchant and seduce at the heart, a sensual scent that lingers like a lover's forbidden touch on the skin long after the sun goes down.
Heat and passion unravel through the notes of this scented story ahead of Sicily’s breathtakingly beautiful backdrop.
OLFACTORY NOTES
Rum, Davana, Pink Pepper , Coriander
Tuberose , Coconut
Hay, Blonde Leaf Tobacco , Tonka Bean
Available as 30ml and 100ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
An intense new amber take on the original fragrance, which captures the golden nuances of vanilla and amber, embodying the last moments of sunlight before twilight settles over the dunes.

The fragrance pyramid of this enriched version enhances the iconic signature of incense and the blend of orange with cinnamon, tonka bean and chocolate, while the cedarwood and iris are enveloped in a warm embrace of amber and vanilla.

Expanding upon the Elysium universe, Roja Parfums are pleased to welcome a new addition to the collection: Elysium Eau Intense.
Re-imagining the beloved Elysium accord, Eau Intense brings an even more refreshing experience. Uplifting the senses, it transports the wearer to a paradise of crystal waters and cloudless skies.
Elysium Eau Intense - A new era for the revered Elysium experience.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Mysterious and original, LOEWE 7 Elixir reinterprets and amplifies the original LOEWE 7 EDP with a higher, more resonant concentration of essential oils. The scent reveals intense notes of patchouli, red pepper berries, and amber, underlined by the rich, raw, and authentic aspects of the LOEWE Accord—a new note based on the complex, resinous scent of the Spanish Rockrose wildflower.

perfumes_data.name: French Defense Mind Games for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: French Defense by Mind Games is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. French Defense was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Christelle Laprade. Top notes are Cherry, Violet Leaves and Chamomile; middle notes are Rose, Geranium and Mimosa; base notes are Amber, Blonde Woods and Cedarwood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
A sophisticated fragrance that exudes true confidence, French Defense takes control in a tantalizing scent of succulent black cherry, seductive notes of smooth liqueurs, and a bed of velvety woods and ambers. Soft florals are woven throughout the perfume's composition bringing a quiet grace and natural beauty to its structure. Completely captivating, French Defense rises to every occasion, with a scent that sets the tone for success.
"French Defense leads with a mouthwatering boldness of dark liquor-saturated cherries; a hypnoticred fruity note that hooks the senses from the start. Threads of soft mimosa and geranium Madagascar woven through the heart transition the fragrance into a skin-warming caress of golden amber and woods." - Christelle Laprade, Perfumer.

perfumes_data.name: Dolce Melodia Sospiro Perfumes for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Dolce Melodia by Sospiro Perfumes is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Dolce Melodia was launched in 2023. Top notes are Mandarin Orange, Orange and Saffron; middle notes are Pear, Black Currant, Gardenia, Jasmine and Rose; base notes are Vanilla, White Musk and Sandalwood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Dolce is the melody you can't stop listening to.
An irresistible combination of luscious fruit and floral notes with a sweet touch. The debut of sparkling Mandarin, tasty Saffron and juicy orange hints at something more mysterious. In the dreamy heart, where Rose creates a fresh and willing invitation to creamy white notes of Jasmine and Gardenia, a delicious Blackcurrant weaves its way out of the shadows. It induces the sensuality of Sandalwood and Vanilla into a siren’s song, while whispers of White Musk dance around to create a deep base which enables the sweetness to resonate softly throughout the day.
A sweet scent from which there is no escape.
Top Notes: Mandarin, Orange, Saffron
Heart Notes: Rose, Jasmine, Gardenia, Pear, Blackcurrant
Base Notes: Sandalwood, Vanilla, White Musk

perfumes_data.name: Viole Nere Meo Fusciuni for women and men

perfumes_data.name: K by Dolce & Gabbana Eau de Parfum Intense Dolce&Gabbana for men
perfumes_data.short_description: K by Dolce & Gabbana Eau de Parfum Intense by Dolce&Gabbana is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. K by Dolce & Gabbana Eau de Parfum Intense was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Daphné Bugey. Top notes are Blood Orange and Sicilian Lemon; middle notes are Fig and Saffron; base notes are Leather and Woody Notes.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
«K Eau de Parfum Intense preserves the energy and effervescence of Sicilian lemon and red oranges, featured in the original top notes. The heart of the new fragrance is characterized by creamy notes of fig, already the protagonist of K Eau de Parfum, embellished by the addition of warm and spicy facets of saffron and enhanced by the unforgettably elegant woody base, built on deep and sensual tones of a leathery accord – says Daphne Bugey –. The combination of these elements lays the foundation for an even more powerful olfactive journey».
The iconic glass bottle is tinged in an elegant midnight blue hue and adorned with a crown cap covered in burnished silver topped by a lapis lazuli blue dome.
K by Dolce&Gabbana Eau de Parfum Intense is available in 50ml, 100ml.

perfumes_data.name: Amber Oud Aqua Dubai Al Haramain Perfumes for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Amber Oud Aqua Dubai by Al Haramain Perfumes is a Aromatic Fruity fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Amber Oud Aqua Dubai was launched in 2024. Top notes are Bergamot, Green Notes and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Amber, Melon, Black Currant and Pineapple; base notes are Petitgrain, Musk, Galbanum and Vanilla.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Dive into the refreshing temptation of the Arabian Sea with Haramain Amber Oud Aqua Dubai—a fragrance that captures the essence of Dubai's coastal charm. At the forefront, bergamot, green notes, and mandarin orange dance like sunlight on the water, evoking the crispness of a sea breeze. As you journey deeper, middle notes of melon, pineapple, amber, and black currant emerge, painting a picture of tropical indulgence against a backdrop of azure waters. These scents intertwine seamlessly, creating a symphony of sweetness and sophistication that lingers on the skin like a gentle caress.
The base notes of musk, vanilla, galbanum, and petitgrain anchor the fragrance, adding a touch of depth and complexity reminiscent of the coastal landscape. With Haramain Amber Oud Aqua Dubai, every spritz is an invitation to immerse yourself in the vibrant energy and timeless elegance of Dubai's aquatic allure.

perfumes_data.name: Rouge Trafalgar Esprit De Parfum Dior for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Rouge Trafalgar Esprit De Parfum by Dior is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Rouge Trafalgar Esprit De Parfum was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Francis Kurkdjian. Top notes are Cherry and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Bulgarian Rose and Turkish Rose; base note is Red Fruits.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Dior Rouge Trafalgar Esprit De Parfum is a new fragrance for women and men launched in 2024. Rouge Trafalgar Esprit de Parfum boasts a delicate, scarlet red shade, more intense and dense than ever, portraying a ripe, crisp cherry. The new Esprit de Parfum is darker and deeper due to the use of powerful notes like fiery pink pepper, the delicate yet opulent Turkish and Bulgarian roses, eventuating with a luscious blend of irresistibly delectable red fruits.

perfumes_data.name: Titanium Gisada for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Titanium by Gisada is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Titanium was launched in 2024. Titanium was created by Olaf Larsen and Lucas Sieuzac. Top notes are Cardamom, Sage, Pink Pepper and Artemisia; middle notes are Lavender, Sandalwood, Cinnamon, Leather and Cedarwood; base notes are Vanilla, Tonka Bean, Iris, Patchouli and Balsam Fir.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Gisada Switzerland is proud to announce the launch of Titanium - Eau de Parfum, on April 11. This signature scent from the House of Gisada transcends ordinary scent boundaries and has been carefully crafted to emerge as a true contemporary classic — 'Breaking The Scent Barriers'.

Bold. Powerful. Unforgettable. Titanium carries the promise of standing as a bold declaration of the contemporary man. As part of the fragrance's campaign, Gisada has partnered with the British boxer, Anthony Joshua, a true champion both inside and outside of the ring.
From the first spritz, Titanium exudes quiet confidence with notes of pink pepper, artemisia, sage, and cardamom. As it settles, you'll catch hints of cedarwood, sandalwood, leather, cinnamon, iris, vanilla, tonka bean, and fir balsam. Its depth and warmth leave a memorable mark.

perfumes_data.name: Rouge Smoking Extrait BDK Parfums for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Rouge Smoking Extrait by BDK Parfums is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Rouge Smoking Extrait was launched in 2024. Rouge Smoking Extrait was created by Amélie Bourgeois and Margaux Le Paih Guérin. Top notes are Cherry, Almond, Pink Pepper, Red Mandarin and Bergamot; middle notes are Peru Balsam, Milk, Tonka Bean and Spanish Labdanum; base notes are Oud, Rum, Ambroxan, Patchouli, Vanilla Absolute, Amber, Benzoin and Siam.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Rouge Smoking Extrait by BDK Parfums is a new unisex fragrance launched in 2024. This amber, fruity fragrance intensifies the original edition with a blend of cherry, mandarin, bergamot, almond, and pink peppercorn. The heart reveals tonka bean, labdanum, Peru balsam, and a milk accord, resting on a base of oud, amber woods, ambroxan, vanilla, rum, patchouli, and benzoin.

perfumes_data.name: Gucci Guilty Essence Pour Homme Gucci for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Gucci Guilty Essence Pour Homme by Gucci is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Gucci Guilty Essence Pour Homme was launched in 2024. Top notes are Lavender and Coriander; middle notes are Orange Blossom and Neroli; base notes are Patchouli and Cedar.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Homme has been rebranded as Gucci Guilty Essence Pour Homme. Gucci Guilty Essence Pour Homme by Gucci, released in 2024, is classified as a fragrance for men and belongs to the fougere, citrus, and woody families.

perfumes_data.name: Town & Country Clive Christian for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Town & Country by Clive Christian is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Town & Country was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Vincent Ricord. Top note is Clary Sage; middle note is Ambergris; base note is Sandalwood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Originally created in 1925 and famously worn by Winston Churchill, Town & Country was a shining star of a new era of the Crown Perfumery Company. Today it is reimagined with the Clive Christian hallmarks of complexity, concentration and dedication to the finest ingredients - perfectly crafted for self expression. Crisp with refreshing notes from the most elegant of herbs resting on a deeper base. Capturing the natural beauty of the countryside and the elegance of London town.
Notes: clary sage, gray amber and sandalwood.

perfumes_data.name: Fifty Four Jusbox for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Fifty Four by Jusbox is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Fifty Four was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Julien Rasquinet.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Fifty Four Eau de Parfum by Jusbox, released in 2024, is classified as a unisex fragrance and belongs to the gourmand family. The composition includes notes of nagarmotha (cypriol, nutgrass, cyperus), davana, cardamom, cinnamon, patchouli, pina colada cocktail, rum, sandalwood, saffron, chocolate, tobacco, and vanilla.

perfumes_data.name: Hope Frederic Malle for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Hope by Frederic Malle is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Hope was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Dominique Ropion. Top notes are Juniper and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Oud, Smoke and Vetiver; base notes are Leather and Amber.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Hope by Frédéric Malle is a fragrance from the Desert Gems collection created by perfumer Dominique Ropion. This scent emulates the rising feeling of determination and jubilation, infused with a delicate dance of juniper, oud, and amber. It flourishes into a luminous cloak of smoke and leather, making for an opulent indulgence.
"Created by Dominique Ropion for the Desert Gems collection, HOPE fragrance exalts the nobility of an exceptional oud essence.

They say that it’s the pillar of the world. Others whisper about it giving life. Hope has always been right there at the heart of humanity. The third masterpiece by Dominique Ropion for the Desert Gems collection, HOPE is an amber and woody fragrance that highlights the absolute nobility of an exceptional oud essence. The smoky, leathery notes of incense and vetiver mingle with the spicy freshness of pink peppercorn, cypress and juniper to reveal oud in all its purity.  A scent of unparalleled elegance.

Oud, vetiver, incense."
Available in 50ml and 100ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: Phantom Intense Rabanne for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Phantom Intense by Rabanne is a Oriental Fougere fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Phantom Intense was launched in 2024. Phantom Intense was created by Dominique Ropion, Anne Flipo, Juliette Karagueuzoglou and Paul Guerlain. Top notes are Cardamom, Lemon, Bergamot and Rhubarb; middle notes are Lavender, Cedar, Patchouli and Geranium; base notes are Vanilla, Tolu Balsam and Vetiver.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Following the mysterious facet of Phanton Parfum, a bolder face of PHANTOM comes alive as the story continues. With PHANTOM Intense, discover a fresher incarnation in an aromatic ambery accord of vivid lavender, a vanilla addiction and a frosted orange blossom twist.
When the daylight fades embrace the your dark side with PHANTOM Intense by Rabanne. More Intense, bolder, powered by your most daring side. Vivid lavender surrenders to a vanilla addiction and a frosted orange blossom twist to capture the enigmatic aura within you.

perfumes_data.name: Under the Stars Maison Martin Margiela for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Under the Stars by Maison Martin Margiela is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Under the Stars was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Meabh McCurtin. Top note is Black Pepper; middle note is Leather; base notes are Agarwood (Oud) and Labdanum.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Maison Martin Margiela is introducing a fresh addition to its Replica line, titled Under the Stars.
With its blend of oud and amber, Under The Stars captures the cozy ambiance of a campfire crackling beneath a mesmerizing tapestry of stars. This fragrance evokes a sense of warmth and wonder, made to transport you to a night under the open sky.
The year is 2022, and the location is Namibia. The description of the composition is "oud and leather."
Replica Under the Stars is available as a 30 ml and a 100 ml Eau de Toilette.

perfumes_data.name: Qaa'ed Intense Lattafa Perfumes for men

perfumes_data.name: Patchouli Noisette Les Indemodables for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Patchouli Noisette by Les Indemodables is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women and men. Patchouli Noisette was launched in 2023.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: This creation revisits a mythical fragrance ingredient: patchouli. It has been combined with an exclusive ingredient used for the very first time in perfumery: the ultrasound extract of Hazelnut from Piémont Italy designed internally using a 100% green extraction technology, and the world most qualitative origin of hazelnut! An accord which provides a delicate balance between the dark and rough side of patchouli with the incomparable soft praline facets of the hazelnut from Piémont.

perfumes_data.name: Black Meisterstuck Montblanc for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Black Meisterstuck by Montblanc is a Oriental Woody fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Black Meisterstuck was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Jordi Fernández. Top note is Incense; middle note is Amber; base note is Vetiver.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Encapsulating the essence of writing elegance, the iconic Meisterstück writing instrument inspires a captivating fragrance. Black Meisterstück eau de parfum embodies sophistication and grandeur with noble incense and spicy notes, amplified by the captivating sensuality of ambery notes.

perfumes_data.name: Harvest Mouse Zoologist Perfumes for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Harvest Mouse by Zoologist Perfumes is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Harvest Mouse was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Luca Maffei. Top notes are Chamomile, Clove, Orange Blossom and Bergamot; middle notes are Beer/Ale, Hay, Benzoin, Opoponax, Davana and Rose Oil; base notes are Vanilla, Sandalwood, Peru Balsam, Cedar, Balsam Fir and Oakmoss.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Autumn winds skip across golden wheat fields. As the tall grasses billow, the rattle of husks beats a soft prairie lullaby, signalling to the weary sun to rest. In the fading light, tiny harvest mice venture forth, scrambling to gather seeds and fruits. For once the sun sinks fully beneath the horizon, its rule of the sky is bestowed on another. And when the coo of the owl breaks the night, the mice dash, trembling, back to their nests.
Like a countryside bathed in sweet sunlight, Harvest Mouse by Zoologist conjures images of home-baked goodness. Stalks of wheat sway among chamomile, davana and hay, and rich beer extracts are sobered by resins and woody notes. Cozy up in a warm nest of homespun scent.
pros: Cosy and somewhat unique wearing experience
Warm yet not overbearing
Appealing and fairly wearable
Lovely fragrance that captures the essence of the harvest mouse
Delectable warm bakery vibe
Perfect for any time of year
Alluring, classy and mature scent
Sweet and floral, slightly fruity and grassy-green
cons: May not work well with certain skin chemistry
Not as dry and bright as expected
Some find it overly sweet
Boozy notes may not be to everyone's liking

perfumes_data.name: Artik Sea Lorenzo Pazzaglia for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Artik Sea by Lorenzo Pazzaglia is a Woody Aquatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Artik Sea was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Lorenzo Pazzaglia. Top notes are Sea Notes, Ozonic notes, Wormwood, Bergamot, Green Notes, Pink Grapefruit, Lime, Yuzu, Orange Blossom, Citron, Mandarin Orange and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Sea Notes, Myrtle, White Flowers, Jasmine, Davana, Fig, Rose and Wisteria; base notes are Salt, Seaweed, Ambergris, Oakmoss, Precious Woods, Amber, Ambrette (Musk Mallow) and Patchouli.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
The sea fragrance you don't expect
"A frozen sea, as if it were a lime granita sprinkled with salt and then yuzu, arctic wisteria and suspended dreams. A sea that knows how to overwhelm you with elegance. A sensual and magnetic embrace. One of the most beautiful olfactory paintings ever painted so far." - Antea Devon
The cold and icy sea of the arctic manifests itself majestically from the first spray, transporting us beyond the arctic circle in lands beaten by an icy whipping wind, where the sea and unspoiled nature are the center of everything. The swirling marine and aquatic notes meet the balsamic freshness of mint and green notes and are softened in its pace by a warm woody and musky accord. Finally, the salinity of ambergris is inextricably linked to the water element and transfers its immense power to the service of the fragrance.
Top notes: bergamot, lime, yuzu, pink grapefruit, cedar, mandarin, orange blossom, pink pepper, ozone notes, aquatic notes, green notes, absinthe
Heart notes: rose, jasmine, davana, white flowers, fig, myrtle, marine notes, arctic wisteria
Base notes: oakmoss, seaweed absolute, wakame seaweed, ambrette (mallow) seed, salt, ambergris, patchouli, precious woods, amber

perfumes_data.name: Tabac Nomade Houbigant for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Tabac Nomade by Houbigant is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Tabac Nomade was launched in 2023. Tabac Nomade was created by Luca Maffei and Antoine Lie. Top notes are Spices, Rose and Bergamot; middle notes are Tobacco Leaf, Tonka Bean and Saffron; base notes are Vanilla and Leather.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Tabac Nomade is an explosive composition that will transport you to the wilderness of the desert. In this warm and hypnotic perfume, refined tobacco leaves blend together with precious spicy notes.
Rich and creamy, the fragrance opens with a warm and crystalline accord of bergamot, rose and spices. In the refined and hypnotic heart, tonka bean and saffron mingle with tobacco leaves to melt into a base characterised by a leather accord and a touch of vanilla.
Tabac Nomade is reminiscent of a sunset in the wild desert, along the golden dunes where the natural wonders of this region never cease to impress.

perfumes_data.name: Royal Blend French Avenue for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Royal Blend by French Avenue is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Royal Blend was launched in 2023. Top notes are Cognac, Cinnamon and Plum; middle notes are Iris and Myrrh; base notes are Vanilla, Tonka and Sandalwood.

perfumes_data.name: Torino24 Xerjoff for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Torino24 by Xerjoff is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Torino24 was launched in 2024. Top notes are Mango, Bergamot, Mandarin and Plum; middle notes are Orange Blossom, Pink Lotus and Styrax; base notes are White Musk, Moss and Patchouli.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
A scent that evokes the memories that come with the friendly indoor tennis match for Xerjoff’s fourth year as Silver Partner for the Nitto ATP Finals in Turin.
The components that make up the match are captured in the blend, from the rubbery core of the tennis ball that bounces off the indoor court to the wooden tennis racket in hand.
Deliciously enticing, TORINO24 opens floral and fruity with juicy mandarin, mango and plum that fuse with pink lotus absolute and orange blossom. TORINO24 draws to a warm close with moss, patchouli and white musk at the base.
A playful scent that leaves the senses yearning for more.
OLFACTORY NOTES
Top Notes: Bergamot, Mandarin , Mango, Plum
Middle Notes: Orange Blossom , Pink Lotus Blossom , Styrax
Base Notes: Patchouli, White Musk

Torino24 is available as 50ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: Odyssey Mandarin Sky Armaf for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Odyssey Mandarin Sky by Armaf is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Odyssey Mandarin Sky was launched in 2023. Top notes are Mandarin Orange, Orange, Saffron and Sage; middle notes are Caramel, Tonka Bean and Marigold; base notes are Ambroxan, Cedar and Vetiver.

perfumes_data.name: This Is Really Him! Zadig & Voltaire for men
perfumes_data.short_description: This Is Really Him! by Zadig & Voltaire is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. This Is Really Him! was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Nathalie Lorson. Top notes are Graperfuit and Lemon; middle notes are Metallic notes and Orange Blossom; base notes are Palo Santo and Amberwood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Discover This Is Really Him!, the new men's fragrance from ZADIG&VOLTAIRE. A juice for lovers who engage in a passionate adventure, continuing through the streets of Paris as night falls and gives way to a new day.
The most intense men's perfume from ZADIG&VOLTAIRE With This Is Really Him!, perfumer Nathalie Lorson (the nose behind the This Is Him!) collection brings to life ZADIG&VOLTAIRE’s most intense fragrance to date. The fragrance opens with a refreshing cocktail of top notes, combining intense grapefruit and sparkling lemon. This refreshing intensity then gives way to the captivating heart of the juice: a metallic accord of orange blossom. As the fragrance evolves on the skin, lively notes of palo santo accord and amber woods create a seductive trail, for a magnetic and powerful scent that will follow you day and night.
A perfume bottle that breaks conventions As luxurious as it is subversive, the bottle of This Is Really Him! is bathed in a bold silver hue, inspired by the lively shadows of an unforgettable Parisian night. The iconic ZADIG&VOLTAIRE label has a metallic finish, which echoes the metallic accord of the composition and fits with Zadig's signature bold and elegant aesthetic.
Available as 50ml and 100ml Eau de Toilette Intense starting mid-January 2024.

perfumes_data.short_description: DesirToxic L'Intense by M. Micallef is a Aromatic Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. DesirToxic L'Intense was launched in 2024. perfumes_data.detailed_description:
A more concentrated version, DesirToxic L'intense.
Torrid, ambery, spicy, incandescent, explosive, bewitching and over-sensual, DesirToxic L'Intense perfume turns heads day and night.

perfumes_data.name: Haramain Detour Eco Al Haramain Perfumes for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Haramain Detour Eco by Al Haramain Perfumes is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Haramain Detour Eco was launched in 2024. Top notes are Lavender, Clary Sage and Bergamot; middle notes are Saffron and Praline; base notes are Agarwood and Cedar.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Haramain Detour Eco is an eco-conscious fragrance that captures the essence of nature. It opens with refreshing top notes of clary sage, lavender, and bergamot, reminiscent of a dew-kissed morning in a fragrant garden. The heart features a blend of saffron and praline, offering a delicate balance between earthy warmth and sweet indulgence. The base notes of agarwood and cedar ground the scent, evoking the timeless allure of ancient forests. This fragrance is designed for those who appreciate sustainable luxury and the beauty of the natural world.

perfumes_data.short_description: Phantom Parfum by Rabanne is a Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Phantom Parfum was launched in 2023. Phantom Parfum was created by Juliette Karagueuzoglou, Dominique Ropion and Anne Flipo. Top notes are Cardamom, Bergamot, Rhubarb and Lemon; middle notes are Lavender, Cedarwood, Patchouli and Geranium; base notes are Vanilla, Tolu Balsam and Haitian Vetiver.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Phantom Parfum was designed to be more luxurious than its predecessor. That robot-like, refillable bottle was given a black matte finish. The fragrance is almost wholly natural, it features French lavender, black vanilla bean from Madagascar and Haitian vetiver.

perfumes_data.name: CK One Essence Calvin Klein for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: CK One Essence by Calvin Klein is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. CK One Essence was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Alberto Morillas. Top notes are Bergamot, White Tea, Blood Orange and Black Pepper; middle notes are Green Tea, Mint and Geranium; base notes are Musk, Australian Sandalwood, Incense and Moss.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
CK One Essence by Calvin Klein is an intensified, premium take on the iconic original fragrance CK One from 1994. Launched 30 years after the original, this fragrance modernizes its fresh notes while paying homage to its DNA. It is an olfactory symbol of timeless unity, described as explosive, energetic, and captivating. Master perfumer Alberto Morillas formulated this fresh edition, amplifying the concentration for long-lasting, powerful freshness.
"The intense fragrance for all. fresh. provocative. unapologetic. Twice as concentrated as the original icon. ck one essence features top notes of sparkling italian bergamot and blood orange for vibrant intensity. organic green tea accords are drenched in a warm base of natural sandalwood and musk. the feeling is clean and sensual. The iconic bottle is fully recyclable, reimagined with a modern translucent metallic finish."
Calvin Klein CK One Essence is available in 50ml, 100ml, and 200ml bottles.

perfumes_data.name: Signature Halfeti Black Rose Zaharoff for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Signature Halfeti Black Rose by Zaharoff is a Floral fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Signature Halfeti Black Rose was launched in 2024. Top notes are Black Pepper, Bergamot and Basil; middle notes are Turkish Rose, Black Rose, Cedarwood, Amber, Musk and Tonka Bean; base notes are Vetiver, Frankincense, Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha, Musk, Oud and Labdanum.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Three years in the making, the inspiration came when ROSÉ was launched in 2020. George was applying NOIR on his skin and then shortly thereafter applying ROSÉ on the top. It was a magical fragrance - and he got to work with Claude on a "NOIRROSÉ" fragrance. It turned out to be exactly as was hoped, NOIR with ROSÉ. But it was too "safe" - and George Zaharoff set out with Master Perfumer Claude Dir to develop a Halfeti Black Rose from scratch, apart and distinctive from any of the other Zaharoff fragrances in the Signature collection, including the Rose Athonite ROSÉ.
Imagine fighting through a thick thorn bush forest to get to that one magical black rose, this is the inspiration behind Black Rose! Deep, mystical, sensual - this is a serious masculine scent!

perfumes_data.name: Sugar Leather Une Nuit Nomade for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Sugar Leather by Une Nuit Nomade is a Leather fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Sugar Leather was launched in 2023.

perfumes_data.name: Primo Trussardi for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Primo by Trussardi is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Primo was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Violaine Collas. Top notes are Maple sap, Lava, Mineral notes and Grapefruit; middle notes are Tonka, Pimento and Bourbon Geranium; base notes are Sandalwood, Patchouli and Cedarwood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
THE FRAGRANCE OF A NEW DAWN
Obsidian, coal, earth, rocks, crystals, the stormy sea, and the fiery dawn on a volcanic island. Emerging from the core of the earth is a primitive and powerful treasure: Trussardi Primo. A tribute to resilient masculinity, it is powerful, explosive and simultaneously the precursor of a new olfactory saga. It is the dawn of a new day, full of promise. The man imagined by the Trussardi maison is intrepid and confident in the future, a pioneer in a new world. Trussardi Primo rewrites the codes of men's perfumery starting from the courageous and innovative olfactory pyramid to the packaging, a work of art with a green heart. The composition is like a flower warmed by the first rays at dawn: it opens slowly and celebrates the daily miracle of rebirth with its fragrance. Its bold, virile notes evoke the freshness of the sea air mixed with the heat of volcanic lava, creating a unique olfactory harmony that reflects the duality of the island itself: the untamed
power of nature and the beauty of its landscape. Wearing Trussardi Primo is like wrapping yourself in a cloak of courage and confidence, ready to face any obstacle. Trussardi Primo is the invitation to embrace the light of day with primitive, powerful energy. It is the exhortation to discover your inner strength and potential.
Trussardi Primo is an unexpected fougère with a persistent sillage and "noir” nuances obtained from an accord of bergamot, geranium, musk, lavender, vetiver, and tonka beans. The liquid contains organic ingredients from Italy, extracted with highly technological processes that respect the characteristics of the raw material in order to capture every olfactory nuance. Here is how perfumer Violaine Collas describes it: "The last time I was in Sicily was immediately after an eruption of Mount Etna. It was a truly inspiring scene that compelled me to recreate a similar sensation: the sensation of heat, like that of an eruption of incandescent lava. This image gave me the idea of using a maple syrup accord, super addictive with its golden nuances. I also wanted a dash of pepper to convey a sensation of danger and restore the hypnotic beauty of the volcano, intertwined with a dark, mineral black lava accord. Thus, a warm and sexy fragrance was born."
THE BOTTLE AND PACKAGING
At the center of a volcanic island, shrouded in the mists of dawn and surrounded by a tumultuous sea, stands a totem-like bottle, a work of art in glass with iridescent nuances that start from black, so typical of the night, and veer towards a shade of red that tinges the early hours of a new day. Like a reflection of dawn that slowly rises on the horizon, the bottle mesmerizes with its chromatic metamorphosis, conveying the promise of a bold, new beginning.
The glass bottle, substantial in weight and compact to the touch, transmits a sensation of power and solidity as a tangible sign of the wearer's inner determination. Like lava that runs down the sides of the volcano and carves out the landscape, the glass is transformed into an elegant and sculptural swirl that captures the essence of primordial fire. The design of Trussardi Primo is a revolution in packaging for perfumery, thanks to a few elements like the threading under the dispenser and the reusable magnetic cap. Solid, refined and refillable, the bottle combines high-level ecological green solutions without compromising its aesthetics. All components are non-toxic, recyclable or reusable. Likewise, the refill bottle follows the same ethics and aesthetics. The Trussardi Primo box is made of recyclable materials like FSC paper from forests managed according to rigorous environmental and social criteria. It echoes the same colors of the bottle with gradient shades passing from black to red and features embossed lettering with a vinyl finish.
"I'm excited by novelty. I believe that people who seek new things are unwilling to repeat what they've seen
before...” Fabien Baron.
For over three decades culminating in illustrious accolades and awards, Fabien Baron has dominated the industrial design landscape with a proactive mind and unparalleled creativity, defining the success of some of the most prominent global brands. His boundless artistic conception unfolds through myriad facets, drawing from art to nature. During his career, Baron was the catalyst for the revival of famous magazines and brands, and he also created his own furniture line. Baron embodies the immense fervor that only true masters possess, shaping ideas and projects and making them a reality. For Trussardi Primo, he curated the design of the bottle and packaging, paying great attention not only to the aesthetic aspects of the latter, but also to its environmental impact.
ADVERTISING CAMPAIGN – THE CONCEPT
An epic, nocturnal escape in search of oneself in the volcanic landscape of Lanzarote, the lava island. Dark rocks and wild nature, majestic and exciting, are the backdrop of this primitive night. The mystery of nature demands respect, contemplation, and total dedication. The senses expand between the images, visions, smells, and sounds of a captivating and evocative night. It inebriates and confounds, but also sends signals that transform into symbols for the protagonist's journey guided by the stars and the light of the imminent dawn. The shadow of a man accompanied by his noble greyhound merges with the landscape in a deep connection with the surrounding natural elements.

perfumes_data.name: Amber Oud Dubai Night Al Haramain Perfumes for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Amber Oud Dubai Night by Al Haramain Perfumes is a Oriental Woody fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Amber Oud Dubai Night was launched in 2024. Top notes are Saffron, Bergamot and elemi; middle notes are Agarwood, Bulgarian Rose and Lily of the Valley; base notes are Tonka Bean, Amber, White Musk and Oakmoss.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
As the sun dips below the horizon, Dubai transforms into a playground of enchantment and allure, and Haramain Amber Oud Dubai Night becomes the scent of the city's nocturnal adventures. Picture yourself stepping into the booming energy of the night, where each scent note is a chapter in a captivating tale. At the outset, bergamot, saffron, and elemi cast a spell of anticipation, their citrusy and spicy fragrances hinting at the adventures to come. As the evening deepens, agarwood, Bulgarian rose, and lily of the valley emerge, evoking the romance and mystery of the Dubai night.
Finally, the base notes of white musk, tonka bean, amber, and oakmoss linger like whispers in the desert breeze, leaving an indelible mark on the senses. With Haramain Amber Oud Dubai Night as your companion, every moment becomes an unforgettable journey through the enchanting streets of Dubai under the starlit sky.

perfumes_data.name: La Voglia d'aMare Filippo Sorcinelli for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: La Voglia d'aMare by Filippo Sorcinelli is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. La Voglia d'aMare was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Filippo Sorcinelli. Top notes are Pine tar and Tangerine; middle notes are Coconut and Orris; base notes are Oakmoss, Musk and Amber.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
... is like looking for spaces in a hand
In the mushy squares of red loneliness
In the keys of a love changed in the night,
in the stones that stain life,
in that barefoot polished asphalt.
Because the skin has flown
Into a blue smoke
And in a moon that moves a sea
that cries.

When the sun sets and the heat of the day gives way to the coolness of night, the atmosphere is charged with an energy with a taste of mystery.
The city lights come on, but the adventures and excitement are far from them... we search for them by walking by the sea, where the figures are undefined and where we sense only the sea and a few car in the distance.
Time passes, and the summer night invites us to get lost and let ourselves be carried blend with the tar of a newly renovated street next door.
Everything is made possible under the reflections of the moon, sitting and looking at an undefined landscape that turns black to blue.
They are passions of everyone, for everyone, of a minute or an entire night...those that are fixed forever, for the usual sip of memory.
SUBJECT: Oak Mosses, Musk, Oriental
COUNTER SUBJECT: Coconut Cream, Iris Rhizome
TAIL: Pine Tar, Tangerine

perfumes_data.name: Café Tabac Aedes de Venustas for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Café Tabac by Aedes de Venustas is a Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Café Tabac was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Bertrand Duchaufour.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Café Tabac - A hedonistic scent that celebrates the undocumented moment.
A sumptuous party that goes on for days. Endless dinners and all-night merengue dancing under charcoal skies. Smoke meets flower and spice settles in for the next inhale. This is CAFÉ TABAC.
Before Aedes de Venustas’s newest scent was realized in a bottle, it had a name: CAFÉ TABAC, inspired by the iconic 90s bar in the East Village. Upstairs at Cafe Tabac was where Kate met Johnny, Madonna picked up the phone, Leo picked up supermodels. It was a place where the truly glamorous could be truly off-duty, an unselfconscious, pre-cell phone era that feels so far away as to be longed for again.
“It’s the deep mood of a place to be, creating its own legend,” says perfumer Bertrand Duchaufour. “The deep blue smoke of cigarettes, cigars, weed … whatever. We’re exploring other paradises: laughs, desires, and pleasures, again and again.”
That spirit was also present when Duchaufour and Gerstner went to visit the Dominican Republic last year for another scented project. “It was an explosion of vibrant and chic people from Mexico, France, Rio, New York; different cultures and conversations and ideas and opinions,” says Gerstner. “We went from a tropical forest to the coast together, but it wasn’t until we were standing in a cigar factory that I looked at Bertrand and said, ‘Can you put this in a bottle?’”
The result is as dazzling, sexy, and complex as the trip: It opens with sparkling notes of expected (bergamot) and unexpected (apple, tamarind) fruits but the overall perfume is an homage to tobacco in many forms. Dry leaves, humid flowers, and a cigar lit by fire are represented thanks to herbal clary sage and davana, a tint of mango with dried fig and date, and a rough smokiness using tobacco absolute, tar, cade, and cedarwood. An amber accord of secretions and sugars from cistus and labdanum, ambergris, oakmoss, vanilla, cacao accord and Peru balm at the heart gives way to a darkly rich and resinous base. There is no saccharine here. Instead, distinctive burnt sugar and fresh clove and cardamom are infused with vapors that keep CAFE TABAC multilayered instead of perfectly round. It is blended at a twenty percent concentration made in the old school haute parfumerie style, including a month-long maceration in France.
With CAFE TABAC, there is a mad sensuality that feels like the olfactive equivalent of a twist of orange atop a demitasse of espresso—rich with a touch of freshness and tang. To wear it is to maintain a state of heightened emotions that are sooner remembered than they are recorded.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Dive into the depths of the abyss, to discover the beauty hidden in the immensity. Ambre des Abysses is an unexpected combination of sumptuous ambery nuances and the freshness of aromatic notes.
Faceted and bold, this fragrance opens with unexpected and sparkling notes of Bergamot, Orange Blossom and Mint Leaves. In the heart, Rosemary, Gernium and Jasmine embrace Patchouli and Oriental to give it softness and sumptuousness. In the base, creamy and emblematic notes such as Vanilla and Tonka Bean mingle with Oak Moss and a Leather accord to give it a vigorous structure.
Ambre des Abysses is an immersion in an unknown reality that makes us discover the beauty hidden in the immensity.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Argos Sacred Flame is a new fragrance for women and men launched in 2024. It features a fiery blend of zesty bergamot, juicy grapefruit, sugared peach, and invigorating tangerine, complemented by fiery ginger with a dash of pepper and clove. perfumes_data.name: Tonka Sarrapia Extrait 75 Guerlain for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Tonka Sarrapia Extrait 75 by Guerlain is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Tonka Sarrapia Extrait 75 was launched in 2023. Tonka Sarrapia Extrait 75 was created by Delphine Jelk and Thierry Wasser.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Tonka Sarrapia Extrait 75 reveals the tonka bean in its most perfect olfactory expression at Guerlain and reveals a most addictive signature. Overdosed with natural tonka and a hint of coumarin, the deliciousness of the tonka bean is intoxicating, in an ultimate concentration of 30%.

Guerlain Perfumers enhance the almond facet of the tonka bean by enriching it with bitter almond essence and a microdose of coumarin. Pushing the addiction to its peak, the tonka bean becomes burning on contact with vanilla, cocoa and hot spices.

Tonka Sarrapia Extrait 75 is part of the Les Extraits Signature extract collection which embodies the quintessence of Guerlain trail. Paying homage to the alchemy of Guerlinade – the emblematic signature of the House – The Signature Extracts highlight each of the six raw materials that compose it and reveal its golden ratio.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
A scent synonymous with the centuries-old sport for Xerjoff’s third year as Silver Partner for the Nitto ATP Finals in Turin.
Timeless and traditional, TORINO23 evokes the class and sophistication that lies at the heart of tennis.
TORINO23 awakens the senses with a fresh hit of bergamot, which settles as delicate hues of rose and cardamom combine in the top notes.
At the heart, a fusion of neroli and jasmine dance with the rich and heady tones of tuberose as the whole composition closes to a comforting blend of cashmere wood, amber and musk at the base. A sumptuous masterpiece that echoes the true sense of tradition and elegance.
OLFACTORY NOTES
Available as a 50ml Eau de Parfum

From the first notes, the mind is carried away by a warm, shimmering wind of sand, on the other side of the Mediterranean, in the heart of an orange blossom grove. perfumes_data.detailed_description:
The “extrait de musique” collection aims to describe with incense the many sounds of the registers of the Great Organ of Notre-Dame Cathedral in Paris.
The sixth new fragrance to be presented speaks synaesthetically of the trumpet register, belonging to the reed family, one of the oldest organ registers. The first documented attestation of this register is found in a description of a large organ from the first century B.C., placed in a gladiator arena.
Reed registers the sound due to the vibration of a tab (the reed) on two walls.
Characterized by a particularly metallic and “scratchy” sound just like real trumpets, they enrich and complement the instrument.
The cap, like the previous extrait de musique, faithfully reproduces the stops of the registers of the Parisian Grand Organ.
Trompette 8 is enclosed like its predecessors inside an entirely handmade wooden box, reminiscent of the wooden case of large pipe organ soundboxes.

perfumes_data.name: CH Birds Of Paradise For Him Carolina Herrera for men
perfumes_data.short_description: CH Birds Of Paradise For Him by Carolina Herrera is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. CH Birds Of Paradise For Him was launched in 2024. Top notes are Violet Leaves and Chamomile; middle notes are Driftwood and Fir; base notes are Cashmere Wood, Sandalwood and Tonka Bean.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Embark on an aromatic journey to the tropics with CH Men Birds of Paradise, a new limited edition men's fragrance from Carolina Herrera. This captivating eau de parfum will evoke a rainy and humid afternoon on a paradise island and transport you to sunny beaches and lush tropical landscapes with its exterior adorned with toucans and its aromatic blend of bergamot, violet leaves and cashmere wood.
Fresh top notes of Egyptian blue chamomile and violet leaves, which lead to the woody and aromatic heart notes of driftwood and fir balsam. Notes of Tonka Bean, cashmere wood and sandalwood make up a sensual and extremely addictive base.

perfumes_data.name: Signature AURUM Zaharoff for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Signature AURUM by Zaharoff is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Signature AURUM was launched in 2023. Top notes are Honeycomb, Cinnamon and Clove; middle notes are Walnut, Hazelnut, Almond and Coconut Milk; base notes are Praline, Vanilla, Tonka Bean and Amber.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
We went back in time, to one of the oldest desserts-BAKLAVA. Yes, that is correct, baklava!
The origins of baklava date back to ancient times. Around the eighth century B.C.E., people in the Assyrian Empire (which spread across parts of modern-day Iraq, Iran, Kuwait, Syria, and Turkey) arranged unleavened flatbreads into layers, with chopped nuts in-between, to be enjoyed during special events. Centuries later, the Ancient Greek and Roman baklava was a dish consisting of many layers of dough, filled with cheese and honey, and flavored with bay leaves. However, the earliest versions of baklava as we know it today came around 500 years ago, during the Ottoman Empire. In fact, one of the oldest Baklava stores still exists and claims to be 130 years old!

perfumes_data.short_description: Imperial Tea (2024) by By Kilian is a Aromatic Green fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Imperial Tea (2024) was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Calice Becker. Top notes are Green Tea, Bergamot, Seaweed and Laminaria; middle notes are Mate, Jasmine Sambac, Orange Blossom and Freesia; base notes are White Musk, Moss and Vetiver.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Imperial Tea is a fresh and modern homage to Jasmine Tea, inspired by the noble traditions of Chinese tea culture. This linear fragrance centers around a Green Tea accord infused with Jasmine Sambac absolute. The opening features Bergamot and Laminaria Seaweed, capturing the mist of ocean air, while rooted notes of Vetiver oil and Musk provide lasting depth. At its core is the timeless elegance of Jasmine Tea.
Top Notes: Bergamot, Laminaria Algae
Heart Notes: Mate Absolute, Jasmine Sambac
Base Notes: Musk, FloryMoss
Available in 50 ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Crystal Saffron Extrait features Myrrh Oil from Somalia, adding a textured note and a luminous black hue to the composition. The myrrh enriches the vibrant, radiant aspects of Crystal Saffron, offering a round and warm complexity.

perfumes_data.name: Pasha de Cartier Noir Absolu Cartier for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Pasha de Cartier Noir Absolu by Cartier is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Pasha de Cartier Noir Absolu was launched in 2023.

perfumes_data.name: Atmayatra Spiritica for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Atmayatra by Spiritica is a Aromatic Green fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Atmayatra was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Daniele Muratori Caputo. Top notes are Basil, Ozonic notes, Peppermint, Aquatic notes and Cardamom; middle notes are cannabis, Basil, Petrichor, Rain Notes, Frankincense and Benzoin; base notes are Earthy Notes, Patchouli, Vanilla, Mud, Mysore Sandalwood and Honey.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
The green and intoxicating notes of the Chiribasa valley lost among the peaks of the Himalayas, a few kilometers from Gomukh where the sources of the Ganges are located, mix with the surrounding environment creating a green, spicy, incensed and evocative mixture.
Atmayatra, a word composed of two Sanskrit terms Atma (soul) and Yatra (pilgrimage) wants to evoke a pilgrimage of the soul, a fragrance that is "not comfortable" and not simple, but certainly unique and memorable.
The green and sumptuous notes of an invigorating Holy Basil Tulsi and cannabis;
green plants that grow freely in the landscape of northern India, mix with the muddy smell of the Ganges river and notes of rain. Evolution then gives a glacial Himalayan storm that is released on these aromatic scents cooked by the sun. It is said that BABAJI still lives in those places, a hundred-year-old Sadhu who is said to have the power of immortality and guards the secrets of Vedic science.

An aromatic fruity mood created by Nicolas Beaulieu using sexy and mysterious notes.

Base notes: Indonesian patchouli, patchouli extract, concentrated vetiver

perfumes_data.name: Blue Mediterraneo Mirto di Panarea Limited Edition 2024 Acqua di Parma for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Blue Mediterraneo Mirto di Panarea Limited Edition 2024 by Acqua di Parma is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Blue Mediterraneo Mirto di Panarea Limited Edition 2024 was launched in 2024. Top notes are Italian Lemon, Bergamot, Myrtle and Basil; middle notes are Jasmine and Damask Rose; base notes are Amber, Cedarwood and Juniper.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Mirto di Panarea by Acqua di Parma is inspired by an island suspended in time, combining sparkling citrus accents with notes of myrtle and the freshness of juniper. The fragrance recalls the joyful spirit of summer with the aromatic warmth of myrtle, basil, and the sparkling citrus notes of lemon and Calabrian bergamot. Accents of sea breeze and fresh juniper meet with rose and jasmine, instilling a sensation of peace and harmony.
"An original motif of circles, triangles and swirls, created by Dorothée Meilichzon, decorates the special packaging of Mirto di Panarea eau de toilette in a tribute to the serene beauty of the sea and the vibrant energy of the sun that touches the waves. The fragrance recalls the joyful spirit of summer with the aromatic warmth of myrtle that combines with basil and the sparkling citrus notes of lemon and Calabrian bergamot. Accents of sea breeze and fresh juniper meet with rose and jasmine, instilling a sensation of peace and harmony.
Mirto di Panarea is presented in the unmistakable Acqua di Parma bottle, embellished with a decorated cap. An icon of Art Deco, the bottle is made of pure glass in shades of deep blue, which in a play of reflections evokes the transparency of the sea."

perfumes_data.name: The Envy of FOMO FOMO for women and men

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
FOMO Parfums' latest creation, The Envy of FOMO, is a masterpiece of rare ingredients and meticulous craftsmanship. Unlike typical fragrances designed to appeal to the masses, FOMO's The Envy of Fomo was created with a unique thought process: to captivate the discerning and passionate Fragrance Community. Let's delve into the entrancing essence of this exclusive fragrance.
Top: pepper, clove, bergamot, mandarin, and grapefruit
Middle: carnation, rose, violet, sandalwood, and cedar
Base: patchouli, vetiver, tonka, labdanum, vanilla, amber, and musk

perfumes_data.name: Lentezza Carezza Filippo Sorcinelli for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Lentezza Carezza by Filippo Sorcinelli is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Lentezza Carezza was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Filippo Sorcinelli. Top notes are prickly pear, Myrrh, Bergamot and Orange; middle notes are Green Accord, Cedarwood, Cyclamen and Jasmine; base notes are Musk, Benzoin, Vanilla, Sandalwood and Tonka Bean.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
I would like to get dirty slowly,
precious useless angel
slow sun fire
where the water rests with me
and caress the song of the skin.
A watch made of honey
with the hours marked by a warm wind
shadows of cicadas
silence of the prickly pear
in an orange
that stings the loneliness.
What does it mean today: "there is no hurry"?
In the obsession of the speed paradoxically the cognition of the time is lost. Here then the desire to stop to recognize and build the solitude of a sunny afternoon.
Slowness then becomes a necessary Caress, almost like boredom, to sink into the limits of silence and continue to listen to life in a way that has now become unknown.
Relying on the arms of a wind without running, which moves the earth burned by memories, is a courage of few, because bathing in this value revolutionizes and repairs.
Lentezza Carezza is a summer smell where loving each other becomes a tool for addressing others with new eyes and a reconstructed soul.
A perfume that transforms the perception of remaining motionless, becoming «a new form of resistance, in a world where everything is too fast. And where the greatest power is to decide what to do with one's time», as Sepùlveda says.

perfumes_data.name: Le Male Lover Jean Paul Gaultier for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Le Male Lover by Jean Paul Gaultier is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Le Male Lover was launched in 2024. Le Male Lover was created by Natalie Gracia-Cetto and Quentin Bisch. Top notes are White Pepper and Finger Lime; middle notes are Ambergris, Sea Notes and Musk; base notes are Vanilla and Woody Notes.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Le Male Lover, Jean Paul Gaultier's new sophisticated sailor. He joins the crew of Les Males, with his story captured on his tattooed torso. A tribute to one of Gaultier's fashion icons, Le Male Lover is shown naked without his sailor suit. Sensitive and daring. He is pure temptation forever tattooed in the hearts of those who cross his path. A big sensitive heart behind his virile appearance, Le Male Lover has arrived to make you stagger.
Dazzling sun and salt-kissed skin. With the sea as a horizon, Le Male Lover is so sensual. This eau de parfum captures the essence of wet skin on hot sand, caressed by the cooling ocean spray. Infused with an amber breeze spiked with a touch of pepper and finger lime. At its heart lies carnal ambergris with its soft, musky warmth. The sensuality climaxes with notes of wood and vanilla.

perfumes_data.name: From the Garden Maison Martin Margiela for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: From the Garden by Maison Martin Margiela is a Chypre fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. From the Garden was launched in 2023. From the Garden was created by Olivier Cresp and Sébastien Cresp. Top notes are Tomato Leaf and Green Mandarin; middle note is Geranium; base note is Patchouli.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
From the Garden is a part of the Replica collection - Reproduction of Familiar Scents and Moments of Varying Locations and Periods. It captures the essence of a sunny afternoon in a garden, where you can feel the earth in your hands and savor the aroma of ripe tomatoes while bees buzz in the air.
It combines the freshness of tomato leaf and green mandarin with the earthiness of patchouli and geranium, creating an elegant and crisp scent that brings back memories of those tranquil moments spent in a sun-drenched garden.
Perfumer Olivier Cresp drew inspiration from his own experiences, recalling cherished moments in his childhood garden and reliving them with his son, Sebastien, through the green and earthy notes of this fragrance.
Provence and Period: Puglia, 1998.
Available as a 100 ml Eau de Toilette.

perfumes_data.name: Stronger With You Limited Edition Giorgio Armani for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Stronger With You Limited Edition by Giorgio Armani is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Stronger With You Limited Edition was launched in 2023. Top notes are Pink Pepper and Cardamom; middle note is Sage; base notes are Marron glace, Vanilla and Amber.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Discover the limited edition of Stronger With You Eau de Toilette, a unique and addictive fragrance encapsulated in a new bottle adorned with the iconic Emporio Armani eagle, reinterpreted in a pixel design. An eau de toilette with spicy and amber notes.
The Marron Glacé accord, unprecedented in perfumery, expresses a surprising, magnetic, and generously masculine association with an extreme addiction. Vanilla, the olfactory signature of Stronger With You, is worked here in a very masculine way: woody, spicy, and smoky. In the background, notes of pink pepper combine with an aromatic heart of sage and give it a sensual and elegant trail.
Top note: Cardamom, Pink Pepper
Heart notes: Sage
Base Note: Essence of Vanilla & Marron Glacé Accord, Oriental
Available as a 50ml Eau de Toilette. Limited Edition.

perfumes_data.name: Dioriviera Dior for women and men

perfumes_data.detailed_description: DIORIVIERA is designed to convey modern and romantic impressions inspired by the rose garden near Château Noire, located in the South of France. Elegantly fruity green and floral, the fragrance combines the smells of rose, fig, and green notes with the slight warmness of a nice, sunny day. The fruitiness comes from both roses and figs.

perfumes_data.name: Lacoste Original Lacoste Fragrances for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Lacoste Original by Lacoste Fragrances is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Lacoste Original was launched in 2024. perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Lacoste Original is a modern fragrance with a unique and powerful signature: a woody fougère scent designed to stand out. The fragrance opens with citrus freshness enhanced with dazzling spices. The aromatic heart is revealed through an elegant duo of French ingredients - lavender and clary sage - enhanced by a lavandin absolute. Finally, the woody base mixes the sensuality of creamy sandalwood with the intensity of patchouli, with Orientalextreme adding a powerful vibration and tonka bean a subtle touch of seduction.
Available in 60 and 100 ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Tom Ford Amber Intrigue is a new fragrance for women and men launched in 2024 under the Private Blend collection. Amber Intrigue Eau de Parfum wraps the wearer in an earthy start of fiery cinnamon sprinkled on lush dates, while the warmth of vetiver and sandalwood oils takes center stage, paving the way for a dry down of golden amber laced with resinous labdanum.

perfumes_data.name: Rouge Chaotique Byredo for women and men

perfumes_data.detailed_description: The first oud gourmand fragrance in our Night Veils collection, Rouge Chaotique takes personal inspiration from Ben Gorham’s belief that accepting the chaos within any creative process can result in singular forms of expression.

perfumes_data.name: Cuir InfraRouge Maison Crivelli for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Cuir InfraRouge by Maison Crivelli is a Leather fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Cuir InfraRouge was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Jordi Fernández. Top notes are Raspberry, Cinnamon and Bergamot; middle notes are Orris, Osmanthus and Cedarwood; base notes are Leather, Vanilla, Oud and Patchouli.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Cuir InfraRouge by Maison Crivelli is a sophisticated fragrance crafted by perfumer Jordi Fernández. This perfume features a rich blend of notes, starting with vibrant top notes of bergamot, cinnamon, and raspberry accord. The heart reveals a warm combination of cedarwood, orris, and osmanthus, while the base is grounded with leather accord, oud accord, patchouli, and vanilla.

perfumes_data.name: Guidance Amouage for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Guidance by Amouage is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Guidance was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Quentin Bisch. Top notes are Pear, Hazelnut and Olibanum; middle notes are Osmanthus, Rose, Saffron and Jasmine Sambac; base notes are Sandalwood, Vanilla, Akigalawood, Ambergris and Labdanum.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
THE DELICATE STRENGTH OF FEMININITY
An ivory tower wreathed in shreds of clouds, dewy mists of fragile Pear, inviting Almond Milk and beads of Frankincense draw the outlines of a dreamful haven.
 
A princess whispers you in and leads the way to a lush garden where Osmanthus blossoms diffuse their heady apricot scent. A fountain gleams in the centre, its marble edge covered in scarlet roses whose voluptuous scent meets that of leathery Saffron threads laid on the floor.
 
Through Jasmine screens, sultry and spent, the woman walks and there comes with her a scent of dark Vanilla and skinlike Sandalwood, of ambery Labdanum and purring hints of regal Orientalgris: who are you, she asks, and you feel seen.
 
A spellbinding and novel interpretation of the Amouage triad of Rose, Frankincense and Orientalgris, Guidance reads like a poem, smells like an embrace, and feels like a word of wisdom.
pros: Long-lasting fragrance
Unique combination of pear, olibanum, and hazelnut
Beautiful and extraordinary scent
Pear note adds a subtle juicy nuance
Compliments from family, friends, and coworkers
Gourmand sweet with a strong hazelnut accord
Immediate love from the first test
Non-divisive and suitable for everyday use
cons: May not be suitable for those who prefer more masculine scents
Projection may be too strong for some
Not everyone will appreciate the nutty nuances in the base
May leave a strong white musk scent on clothes for days
May not be suitable for those who prefer more floral or woody scents
May smell too fruity for some
May not be suitable for those who are not fans of fruit salad scents
Some may find it similar to other rose-based fragrances by the same perfumer

perfumes_data.name: Nitro White Dumont for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Nitro White by Dumont is a Leather fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Nitro White was launched in 2024. Top notes are Juniper Berries, Iris and Cypress; middle notes are Myrrh and Patchouli; base notes are Honey, Vanilla, Amber, Musk and Leather.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Nitro White Dumont is a fragrance for men featuring a blend of intriguing notes. The composition opens with cypress, iris, and juniper berries, leading to a heart of patchouli and myrrh. The base is enriched with musk, amber, honey, vanilla, and leather.

perfumes_data.name: Gladiator Oud Electimuss for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Gladiator Oud by Electimuss is a Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Gladiator Oud was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Julien Rasquinet. Top notes are Saffron and Cumin; middle notes are Hay, Immortelle, Honey and Geranium; base notes are Agarwood (Oud), Ambergris, Patchouli, Atlas Cedar and Haitian Vetiver.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Inspired by the famed Gladiators of Ancient Rome, tactical warriors who dominated and entertained in the
Coliseum, Gladiator Oud opens with a powerful and thrilling accord of salty, elemental ambergris. Cardamom
combines with the cool of Egyptian geranium for an impression of steel and strength. Hay absolute, Haitian vetiver
and cumin seed capture the sun warmed earth of the gladiatorial arena. Oud oil and cedarwood bring nobility and
elegance to the battle, with the gold and glory of victory elicited through accords of intense saffron and honey.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: A bottle of boldness to cast off the shackles of shyness. Audacious orange blossom surprises vanilla and incense; how fancy! Spritz sparingly (or not – we dare you).

"An explosion of olfactory sensations, of joy, of serenity, which lift our spirits and isolate us from everyday life, in a precious moment that brings us well-being: Sweet Explosion is just this."

lime, grapefruit, coconut milk, white honey

perfumes_data.name: Teriaq Intense Lattafa Perfumes for women and men

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Dubai is a vibrant and culturally diverse city with amazing scents and experiences. One fragrance that captures the essence of this city is Haramain Amber Oud Gold 999.9, Dubai Edition. As you take in the city's amazing sights and smells, the fragrance begins to unfold like a journey through time. Each note reveals a different aspect of Dubai's rich heritage. From the top notes of pear, orange, bergamot, and lemon to the heartwarming scent of melon, pear, jasmine, cardamom, caramel, and green apple, every note is a chapter in the captivating story of this metropolis. And, as you breathe in the grounding base notes of amber, vanilla, patchouli, and cedarwood, you'll feel a sense of rootedness amidst the excitement. It's a scent that invites you to immerse yourself in its captivating story and discover the true essence of Dubai.

perfumes_data.name: APOM Maison Francis Kurkdjian for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: APOM by Maison Francis Kurkdjian is a Oriental Fougere fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. APOM was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Francis Kurkdjian.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: APOM, an acronym for 'A Part of Me', is a genderless fragrance by Maison Francis Kurkdjian. Originally introduced as separate fragrances for men and women in 2009, APOM has been reimagined by perfumer Francis Kurkdjian to combine the best elements of both versions. Inspired by the perfumer's visit to Lebanon, APOM is a flowery amber fougere built on a classic structure with a modern twist. The luminous top of orange blossom gives way to the beauty of aromatic lavender, leading to an alluring base of vanillic amber, comforting white musk, and the sunny smile of ylang-ylang.

Dolce far niente reaches its fullest  expression with the iconic SIESTA. 
A Mediterranean luxury synonymous with freedom.
We dream, we think, we relax or we seek pleasure.
There is no timetable, no protocol, the only rule that should never be broken is: Do not disturb.

perfumes_data.name: West Loop Michael Malul London for men

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
The Feeling: You and your date sit at a small round table illuminated by candlelight, enjoying old fashioneds and each other’s company. Her laughter and smile are contagious, leaving you feeling breathless and warm. On a small stage with velvet curtains, a four-piece band plays smooth jazz  – the perfect accompaniment to falling in love.
The Fragrance: Opening notes of almond blossom, toasted cinnamon, and vanilla orchid deepend into mid notes of myrrh, lavender, and tobacco leaf before drying into sweet, warm base notes of patchouli, amberwood, and tonka bean.

perfumes_data.name: Deified Tony Iommi Signed Edition Xerjoff for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Deified Tony Iommi Signed Edition by Xerjoff is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Deified Tony Iommi Signed Edition was launched in 2024. Top notes are Cinnamon, Saffron and Apple; middle notes are Leather and Rose; base notes are Papyrus, Moss, Patchouli and Musk.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Presenting an exclusive signed edition of the second chapter of the almighty collaboration between the greatest riff master of all time, Black Sabbath’s legendary guitarist and rock composer, Tony Iommi, and Xerjoff’s esteemed founder, Sergio Momo.
The Xerjoff Blends Deified experience plays on the palindromic nature of sound, scent, and sensorial sequences.
Deified Tony Iommi Perfume
Step into a parallel universe where mystery possesses the mind in a dark and decadent experience that casts subliminal shadows on the wearer.
Created on a duality of leather and spice, Deified plays in a loop with no beginning and no end, accompanying the wearer with its omnipresent aura.
Authentic and warm accents of saffron meet powdery and leathery facets that dance with the delicate touch of gourmand freshness. Cinnamon exalts spicier notes, complemented by gentle rose at the heart.
The woody base of papyrus and patchouli leaves the senses longing for more in a rhythmic exchange of back and forth.
Deified Tony Iommi Signed Edition
A true collector’s edition, Deified Tony Iommi Signed Edition features the finest black crystals on the flacon, including a rare skull crystal.
Tony Iommi and Sergio Momo have signed 100 Deified flacons, available while quantities last.
This limited edition of Deified perfume is available on Xerjoff.com and in selected stores.
OLFACTORY NOTES
Available as 50ml Parfum

perfumes_data.name: Eternal Wood Mancera for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Eternal Wood by Mancera is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Eternal Wood was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Pierre Montale. Top notes are Saffron, Laotian Oud and Davana; middle notes are Palo Santo, Guaiac Wood, Copal and Cashmere Wood; base notes are Toffee, Tonka Bean, Amber and Oakmoss.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Eternal Wood evokes the awakening of a unique inspiration where Palo Santo and White Copal impregnate the air with mystical magic. At the heart of this experience, the humid warmth of the skin blends with this exotic fragrance. Burnt Oud and Davana accentuate the sensuality of the sillage, while Red Saffron imparts a passionate touch. Woody notes evoke the dense jungle, and the sweet scents of Toffee and Tonka remind one of tropical delights. This sensory adventure, extracted from Amelie’s memories, crystallizes a moment where nature, warmth, and magic unite in an enchanting perfume. 🤎
As we journey from San Cristobal to the Chihuahuan deserts, the ethereal essence of Palo Alto gracefully envelops us, transcending the mundane. Eternal Wood materializes in our reverie, guided by Mayan incense and burnt Oud.
