perfumes_data.short_description: Inverness by Memo Paris is a Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Inverness was launched in 2023.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Its very name is intriguing, languorous: Inverness. A land of peat, heather and golden rain, beyond the senses, aptly known as the capital of the Highlands, the largest region in Scotland. Nature reigns free, unspoilt, extraordinary, and the River Ness forges its curves and mysteries. The odours of different varieties of wood rising up from this endless green and bracing empire, each more captivating and fragrant than the last.

perfumes_data.name: Comète Chanel for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Comète by Chanel is a Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Comète was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Olivier Polge. Top notes are Cherry Blossom and Aldehydes; middle notes are Iris and Heliotrope; base note is Musk.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Olivier Polge asserts: "At the beginning of each creation, an element of inspiration is necessary and, in COMÈTE, the starting point was the idea of stardust. The comet is a strong symbol for CHANEL, and I am thinking in particular of the Comète pendant from the 1932 high jewelry collection. "When worn open and placed directly on the skin, it evokes the enveloping effect of a perfume on the skin".
With intensely floral and luminous notes, COMÈTE explores a new olfactory identity in the LES EXCLUSIFS DE CHANEL collection. Rich, elegant, and complex in nature, the Eau de Parfum is infused with the refreshing aroma of cherry blossoms, and this touch of brightness and purity transforms into a halo with notes of heliotrope blending with iris extract and musk harmony. This captivating fragrance, which envelops the skin in a mysterious charm, pays homage to its unique personality.
COMÈTE is a trail of stardust and a celestial jewel that chooses its own path and never deviates from it, reflecting Gabrielle Chanel. It is a halo of light, spreading a force of optimism for those who are convinced that the planets will align with their lucky star.
More unique and valuable than any other collection, the LES EXCLUSIFS DE CHANEL collection is embodied in a bottle with excellent and simple design, focusing all attention on the fragrance. COMÈTE is packaged in a sleek and timeless glass bottle with a black cap signed with the brand's monogram. Its box brings simplicity to the level of luxury and sophistication, taking the form of an elegant white jewelry box with a black trim.
Resembling a heritage seal, this delicate two-tone aesthetic accompanies the launch of COMÈTE, a special limited edition: an embossed representation of the legendary Comète necklace, created in 1932, seductively embracing all four sides of the box. In a final tribute to the brilliance of diamonds and stardust, the Double C logo on top of the box is highlighted with silver ink.

perfumes_data.name: Cappadocia Memo Paris for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Cappadocia by Memo Paris is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Cappadocia was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Gaël Montero.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Here, in Cappadocia, at the heart of Türkiye, the earth retains the memory of an unblemished emotion, a shiver of saffron, sandalwood and myrrh surfaces on the skin. Impressive, ancestral formations rise up like exclamations to the sky. They are known as ‘fairy chimneys’, natural pillars of soft, friable rock shaped by volcanic eruption, the passage of time and the weathering of the elements. They watch over the mountains, craters, plateaus and gorges, over the underground and cave-dwelling cities.
The palette of Cappadocia is organic, carnal: white jasmine, ochre benzoin, Turkish rose, gold vanilla and tawny sandalwood. Come nightfall, a purple iris arrives and then the chimney tops secretly open, releasing the caressing perfume of flowers, resins and woods: a message to the stars. A multi-coloured hot-air balloon appears on the horizon; the passengers in its basket sail above the landscape’s varied facets, swept away by its airy, scent-filled beauty. The fragrance Cappadocia makes this a dream come true.

Extremely powerful and intense, experience 1Million Golden Oud, a fragrance as precious as gold enriched with the most luxurious perfume ingredients. The brilliant emerald gem sparkles brilliantly to echo the gem of royalty—an intense amber expression of absolute elegance for men.

perfumes_data.name: like an Egyptian... Miller et Bertaux for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: like an Egyptian... by Miller et Bertaux is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. like an Egyptian... was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Lucien Ferrero. perfumes_data.detailed_description:
"Like an Egyptian," the 17th Eau de Parfum from Miller et Bertaux, beckons you to traverse both time and space. This scent is a captivating journey, transporting you in a moment to the birthplace of fragrances—the era of the Pharaohs. Conceived as a mystical tribute to ancient aromatic concoctions, the perfume is daringly reimagined for contemporary sensibilities by Lucien Ferrero, marking his triumphant comeback to Miller et Bertaux. This heavenly elixir draws inspiration from the ancient Kyphi formula, decoded from an age-old papyrus scroll.
Top notes: Black Pepper, Peruvian Pink Pepper
Heart notes: Indian Cypriol, Oud Boya, Oriental Xtreme
Base notes: Indian Sandalwood, Labdanum Absolute, Oriental, Ambrocenide, Indian Vetyver

perfumes_data.name: L'Eau d'Issey pour Homme Solar Lavender Issey Miyake for men
perfumes_data.short_description: L'Eau d'Issey pour Homme Solar Lavender by Issey Miyake is a Aromatic Spicy fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. L'Eau d'Issey pour Homme Solar Lavender was launched in 2024. Top note is Sichuan Pepper; middle note is Lavender; base note is Cedar.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Born under the rays of springtime sun, this masculine fragrance is a wake-up call of contrasts where water meets matter to create a modern interpretation of lavender. An aromatic woody spicy fragrance for men. A celebration of nature, L'Eau d'Issey pour Homme Solar Lavender reveals a solar encounter between lavender and aquatic notes.
Sichuan pepper enhances the aromatic freshness and warm facets of 100% natural French lavender. In the base, a cedarwood accord intensifies the sillage of this aromatic woody perfume. A perfume committed to nature. Created with a patented design, the innovative 100% wood cap requires no plastic, reducing environmental impact.
The bottle is made with 20% post-consumer recycled glass. The box is made from material from responsibly managed forests certified by FSC™ and other controlled sources. L'Eau d'Issey pour Homme Solar Lavender is a vegan-certified fragrance made with 93% natural origin ingredients.
A perfume bottle inspired by lavender. Infused with lavender both inside and out, the bottle and box of L'Eau d'Issey pour Homme Solar Lavender are bathed in a light, sunny purple hue. The transparent glass bottle reflects the purity of water, while the 100% wood cap evokes the density of matter.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Let Oriental’s complexity cradle you in a concerto of origins and richness. From the first spray, silence prevails. Brazilian Pink Pepper and Japanese Yuzu lead in a lively staccato, guided by Calabrian Bergamot. Warmth rises, embracing Cedar, Sandalwood, Violet. Oriental’s melody crescendos, enveloping in warmth.

In this golden moment, Orientalful resonates endlessly, inspiring peace and balance.

perfumes_data.name: Chandigarh Express Ex Nihilo for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Chandigarh Express by Ex Nihilo is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Chandigarh Express was launched in 2024. perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Mid-fifties, North of India, the Sivaliks, on the foothills of the Himalayan Mountains. From a vanguard vision will rise an ideal city: Chandigarh. Union between India and France where, alike bandmasters, visionary architects designed, ex nihilo, this modernist utopia in the midst of a tropical jungle.
CHANDIGARH EXPRESS is a journey through secular traditions and modernity. An immersion into a wide palette of exotic colours, textures and smells.

perfumes_data.name: Dodo Jackfruit Edition Zoologist Perfumes for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Dodo Jackfruit Edition by Zoologist Perfumes is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Dodo Jackfruit Edition was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Yves Cassar. Top notes are Jackfruit, Turmeric, Bergamot and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Lavender, Turmeric, Orange Blossom, Geranium and Orris; base notes are Tonka Bean, Sandalwood, Vetiver, Patchouli and Labdanum.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
The sun sparkled across rippling waves, its morning dance upon the Indian Ocean rousing the dodos from their carefree slumber. Stumbling drunkenly across the forest floor they feasted on overripe fruit where it lay, dropped for them by the lush island paradise that nurtured them. For generations, the predator-free and bountiful shores lulled them into such a state of complacency that their wings grew idle, and flight was lost – even to memory. Ultimately evolution would betray them, but while it lasted, the dodos enjoyed an existence marked by ease and comfort.
In Zoologist Dodo, notes of jackfruit and bergamot border a winding path dappled with aromatic turmeric and pink pepper. Venture along it to the heart of an island forest where hints of powdery orris emerge from beneath a potpourri of lavender, geranium, and orange flower. Soothed by the comforting florals, you’ll soon surrender, sinking into the loam where woody tonka and sandalwood sprout from an earthy base of patchouli and vetiver.

perfumes_data.name: Empiryan Xerjoff for women and men

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
The Xerjoff K Blue perfume collection is based on the influential philosophical tradition of the alchemy associated with the holistic, ecological, and ethical methods of biodynamic philosophy.
Biodynamic agriculture and biodynamic gardening is how to integrate science with the spirit of nature.
Each perfume from the Kemi Blue collection is unique in the way it contains one or more ingredients obtained from biodynamic agriculture. Cosmic forces are important ingredients to complete the circle of the Xerjoff K Blue collection with a precise astrological perfume production calendar.
Inspired by ancient cosmologies and what is known as the “highest heaven”, Empiryan opens to earthy notes of cypriol and the warm yet sweet herbaceous notes of tobacco leaves. An experience that grounds the wearer with green, earthy notes gradually transports the senses to an ethereal state of calm and sacredness as incense and cedar are released at heart. Delicate yet compelling, Empiryan’s base of vanilla, labdanum, and amber perfectly rounds up this divine scent.
OLFACTORY NOTES

The composition is grounded by a warm and sensual base of vanilla, tonka beans, patchouli, cedarwood, incense, and amber, leaving a lasting and memorable impression. His Confession combines freshness with warmth, making it versatile for any occasion, whether day or night. This fragrance is the perfect choice for men who seek to exude confidence, elegance, and a touch of mystery, ensuring they make a statement wherever they go.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: No much words—discover the best aromatic fougère out there. Introducing “SEXIEST FOUGERE,” seamlessly blending sensuality and timeless elegance. Lavender from Grasse, Rosemary, and Petitgrain create an invigorating journey, leading to a full-hearted fusion of Neroli, Clary Sage, and exquisite Geranium from Egypt. As it settles, a gourmand base emerges with Tonka Beans and Vanilla, forming a seductive alliance. This olfactory masterpiece, enriched by Vetiver, Sicilian Lemon, Calabrian Bergamot, and Cedarwood Texas, is a captivating dance between balance and power. An aromatic vanguard that combines a traditional fougère feel with a slightly gourmand base, and a short touch of sensual pineapple. Immerse yourself in the sophistication of passion and undeniable charm

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Born in Roma Rockstud Noir is a fougère aromatic fragrance inspired by Rockstud Noir color, combining the intensity of sage with the sensuality of an ambergris accord. Born in Roma Rendez-Vous fragrances are limited editions with new designs and scents, only available in limited time and limited quantities.
"In 2023, you are welcomed to the Valentino monochromatic world, inspired by the bold Rockstud Noir. Born in Roma Rockstud Noir writes its signature with an intense fougère aromatic fragrance, orchestrating the fusion of rich sage and sensual ambergris accords. The perfect blend of deep aromatic notes.
Rendez-vous 2023 dresses the iconic rockstud bottles in strong monochromatic colors, celebrating the uniqueness of everyone and many vibrant ways to be you."
A Color Top Note: The fragrance starts with fresh aromas from the burst of Italian bergamots. A Couture Heart Note: Aromatic sage brings a natural depth to the heart of the fragrance. A Cool Base Note: The ambergris accord settles in the fragrance with its amber and musky facets for a powerful and addictive base.
Key Note: Italian Bergamot, Sage Heart Provence, Orientalgris Accord
The bottle pays tribute to the iconic Valentino Rockstud. This edgy pyramidal design, inspired by Roman architecture, is a house signature of Maison Valentino.
Available as a 100ml Eau de Toilette.

perfumes_data.name: Light Blue Pour Homme Summer Vibes Dolce&Gabbana for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Light Blue Pour Homme Summer Vibes by Dolce&Gabbana is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Light Blue Pour Homme Summer Vibes was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Alberto Morillas. Top note is Sicilian Lemon; middle note is Cypress; base note is Amberwood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Light Blue Summer Vibes reinvents the two iconic fragrances for him and her. Made in Italy  using only the highest quality raw materials, these fragrances are brought to life by the  craftsmanship and attention to detail inherent in Dolce&Gabbana’s DNA, characterized by  the majolica print that embellishes the iconic bottles.
A creation of the famous nose Alberto Morillas, the Light Blue Summer Vibes Pour Homme fragrance,  which is part of the woody aquatic aromatic fragrances family, boasts an aromatic freshness thanks  to an infusion of Cypress and an additional note of Sicilian Lemon that gives it a sharp but sweet  liveliness. As a finishing touch, the pleasant woody warmth of amber.
Light Blue Summer Vibes comes in an elegant rectangular glass bottle, while Light Blue Summer Vibes  Pour Homme comes in a trapezoidal bottle with soft lines. Both feature the classic silhouette of Light  Blue fragrances and are embellished with a white cap.
The campaign is an homage to spontaneity and passion. The protagonists, the iconic couple Bianca Balti and David Gandy under the shade of the Faraglioni amidst the crystal-clear waters surrounding the spellbinding Capri Island. From the boat to the shore, right up to the sun-drenched terrace steeped in scents of lemon trees, the couple shares intimate moments of smiles, jokes, and passion. An intense and profound attraction that captures the energy of summer on the seaside. Director Steve Brahms unveils intimate glimpses of a shared life full of tenderness and love with the notes of the song Parlami d’amore Mariù in the background.

perfumes_data.name: HÆC DIES Filippo Sorcinelli for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: HÆC DIES by Filippo Sorcinelli is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. HÆC DIES was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Filippo Sorcinelli. Top notes are Aloe Vera, Bergamot, Jasmine and Orange; middle notes are Peach, Myrrh, Cedar and Rose; base notes are Musk, Vanilla, Sandalwood, Amber and Patchouli.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: The new fragrance from Filippo Sorcinelli is being unveiled today right on the heels of Easter events. Filippo emphasizes these moments by interpreting in olfaction some passages from Mark's Gospel, particularly the moment of the Women's astonishment and fear when they realize that the stone of the Sepulcher has rolled away. In an ideal image to describe this moment, the bottle the very expensive aloe- and myrrh-based aromatic oils that they had prepared to anoint Jesus' body is dropped to the ground the moment they saw not only the stone rolled away, but all the white linen cloths that wrapped the body. Hence the announcement of a young man dressed in blazing white.... The bottle along with the four "wings" that open as "ritual" are covered with sand, with dust, just to remind us of the steps, the road and the place. But the attention-blocking element is the cap that mimics the stylistic features of the tombstone that has rolled away, just as they used to be built. The artwork is covered in its entirety by a white linen veil, on which the name of the fragrance is reproduced: HÆEC DIES. The outside of the packaging is also covered with the same linen.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Ferragamo Red Leather is a sensual EDP telling the story of a man who explores his own desires and embraces his authenticity with ease.
This fragrance is a sensual Citrus Aromatic Leather eau de parfum. Inspired by the most powerful color, it expresses engagement, Italian easiness and sensuality.
This EDP opens with the freshness of natural Ginger adding vibrancy to Italian Bergamot and Mandarin Pulp. At the heart, we find the inherent strength of Jasmine Absolute, Orris and Rosemary. Sustainable Vetiver and Sandalwood anchor the base in a sensual blend of masculine woods. A Soft Leather accord completes this powerful creation.

perfumes_data.name: Encens Precieux Van Cleef & Arpels for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Encens Precieux by Van Cleef & Arpels is a Aromatic Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Encens Precieux was launched in 2024.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Wrapped in mystery and inspired by the land of its birth, this new creation encapsulates the scorching heat of the desert.
Like the crackling of the first flames of a bonfire, the fragrance opens with a sharp, airy note of spicy pepper that melds with incense to awaken the senses.
Slowly, the flames grow brighter, releasing thick, dense smoke. Myrrh and leather blend together to create this recognizable atmosphere, imparting the perfume with its character and charisma.
With time, the smoke will dissipate. Like an invisible fragrance, incense and tobacco continue to hover over the surrounding amber base, accentuated by a touch of vanilla. Reflecting the complexity and surprising contrasts of incense, this perfume perfectly embodies the many mysteries of its main ingredient.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Created by Anne Flipo, this scent uses the finest of ingredients to reconstruct the luscious gardens of the master French perfumer's childhood. Distilling her recollections and passionate love of nature into a modern composition, this fragrance has fresh, floral and woody notes, blending rich basil with bouquets of jasmine and lily of the valley, which are then balanced out by balsamic notes of galbanum and spiced jasmine.

perfumes_data.name: The Language Of Glaciers Imaginary Authors for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: The Language Of Glaciers by Imaginary Authors is a Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. The Language Of Glaciers was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Josh Meyer.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
SYNOPSIS: 
Have you ever stood alone atop a mountain with chunky snowflakes swirling all around? Such is the splendor you will experience within The Language of Glaciers, a romantic epic which reaches incredible heights and inspires one to leave no moment unappreciated. From the stillness of a moonlit snowshoe excursion, to the rush of witnessing an avalanche safely from above, the recollections of our unnamed narrator will captivate you the same way the solitary song of the snow owl captivated them. Find comfort in the cold and begin to see the world from stunning new perspectives. Critics have called it “A slow-paced story that will burrow straight to the center of your soul” and “Sharp as ice and smooth as a glacial lake.”
NOTES:
White Pine, Lilac, Cashmere, Juniper, Forget Me Not, Blue Bugle, Virgin Snowfall.

perfumes_data.name: Lineage Amouage for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Lineage by Amouage is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Lineage was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Karine Vinchon Spehner. Top notes are Ginger, Sichuan Pepper, Peruvian Pepper and Saffron; middle notes are Olibanum, Myrrh and Fenugreek; base notes are Olibanum, Myrrh, Labdanum, Benzoin, Vetiver and Patchouli.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
THE MINERAL SHORES OF MASIRAH
A dream of faraway. Sundrenched horizons, empty lands, the mineral tang of Sichuan Pepper, the pulsing radiance of Ginger and a whiff of sea spray that altogether smell like the promise of breaking free from the world.
On a desert island, wrought of golden Myrrh and Frankincense, a silhouette lies beneath the sun, beneath the sky. A waft of suntan skin catches you unaware, a whiff of Fenugreek, like maple sweet, more gourmand than summer.
It beckons you closer. The warmth sunsets, the saltiness of Myrrh and Frankincense absolutes appears at last under maroon strikes of Benzoin and Labdanum.
A song of salty incense, of mineral warmth and summer meditations, Lineage is the scent of travelling far from home to get closer to yourself.

perfumes_data.name: Caspian Cherry Electimuss for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Caspian Cherry by Electimuss is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Caspian Cherry was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Kevin Mathys. Top notes are Black Cherry, Amaretto and Dark Chocolate; middle notes are Coconut, Cinnamon, Coffee, Honey and Vetiver; base notes are White Chocolate, Tonka Bean, Sandalwood and Patchouli.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Electimuss Caspian Cherry is a new fragrance for women and men launched in 2024. Caspian Cherry is a rich and seductive fragrance, evoking the lush allure of cherries framed by an elegant gourmand accord. It opens with the playful charm of almond liqueur and the juiciness of black cherries, balanced by the depth of bittersweet dark chocolate. As the fragrance unfolds, a warm note of spiced honey drizzles over soft coconut, adding complexity. The gourmand richness intensifies with a bold hit of coffee, softened by the gentle warmth of vetiver. Powdery tonka keeps the cherry note alive throughout, while creamy sandalwood and smooth white chocolate create an irresistibly delectable drydown.

perfumes_data.name: Afternoon Delight Maison Martin Margiela for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Afternoon Delight by Maison Martin Margiela is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Afternoon Delight was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Carlos Benaïm.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Afternoon Delight is a gourmand, sweet perfume that captures the memory of delectable self-indulgences. The madeleine accord blends with the woody notes of sandalwood, whipped vanilla, and musk to create a rich and creamy unisex fragrance that will evoke your sweetest memories.

perfumes_data.name: Speed Legends Night Drive Ex Nihilo for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Speed Legends Night Drive by Ex Nihilo is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Speed Legends Night Drive was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Jordi Fernández. Top notes are Bergamot, Sage, Ginger and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Labdanum and Blackcurrant; base notes are Patchouli, Amberwood, Tonka Bean and Vetiver.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Ex Nihilo's Speed Legends Night Drive perfume is inspired by the thrill of high-speed racing, reflecting the adrenaline-fuelled rush in olfactory form through invigorating bergamot, vetiver, and tonka bean. This rendition, produced in collaboration with photographer RIOCAM, puts a twist on the scent with sensual notes of wood and amber, embodying the thrilling cinematic views of a midnight race.

perfumes_data.name: Scoville Obvious for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Scoville by Obvious is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Scoville was launched in 2024. perfumes_data.detailed_description: The fragrance takes its name from the Scoville scale, a measure of the heat level of chili peppers and hot sauces based on their capsaicin content.

perfumes_data.name: Né Il Giorno Né L'Ora Filippo Sorcinelli for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Né Il Giorno Né L'Ora by Filippo Sorcinelli is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Né Il Giorno Né L'Ora was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Filippo Sorcinelli. Top notes are Cardamom, Lemon, Bergamot, Lily of the Valley, Galbanum and Cedar; middle notes are Marine notes, Iris, Jasmine and Rose; base notes are Musk, Tonka Bean, Sandalwood and Amber.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
I hope you will turn into an obsession,
because you aid life.
You block false reality,
acting in the shadows,
erasing limits.
The twelfth fragrance in the monolithic UNUM collection is designed to confront the most heightened of emotions: fear. Almost as per tradition, the starting point inspiring it is an extract from the Gospel of Matthew, the parable of the ten virgins. The story – which also gives the fragrance its name – is that of ten women who prudently save oil so they can burn their lamps as they await the bridegroom’s arrival. We know that of the ten, only five – described as very wise - participate in the wedding party; the others, having gone to find more oil for their lamps, find the door closed to them. “Lord, open to us”, they say upon arriving, receiving the response: “Truly I say to you: I do not know you”. We also know that, while they were awaiting the groom’s arrival, they too fell asleep, but were ready to wake up and rejoice: "stay awake, therefore, because you know neither the day nor the hour", we read in Matthew.
This is just the start. The idea is to go beyond the evangelism of these words and face our fears on a deeper, more intense level, evoking conflicting emotions and experiencing the seductive charm of danger – an "amor fati" as Nietzsche claimed – or at least, the presence of things beyond our control. This is a characteristic feature of horror literature (and more); it’s the power of the uncontrolled over us. Yet the existence of fear always requires something else: not lack of courage, but the presence of what we most desire. What remains most men’s highest aspiration is also a harbinger of trouble: freedom.
The perfume conveys the idea of destruction, the choice to be silent, and the introspection needed to delve into the depths of the skin’s most remote existence.
Yet seeking to control it stirs attraction and even feelings of pleasure towards that sought-after, desired fear.
Man is caught in a horrific fate, and our society, with the violent approval of the mob, tries to daze itself and deny the truth, or rather Being-for-death.
Only in this way does man become I in his darkest, unspoken shadow, displaying his true nature made up of contradictions and desires. Faced with fear, seemingly chaotic primordial needs composed of dormant, hidden, and dangerous eroticism are triggered, making the impossible possible.
The packaging is in line with the UNUM collection; this time it is sealed with a cold transparent film and a silver label. The bottle (also silver) is placed in a "silent" black velvet bag, sealed in a heat-shrunk sheath which needs to be cut physically using the metal scissors contained in the box.
Following his religious fall into the realm of dust, faced with life on a fragile planet, and having lost all his bearings, man is inextricably connected to fear, forced to wander in the dark side of the soul. Inside that room, he perceives a dim light that reveals deformed limbs sharing monstrous things that seek to destroy respectability and take pleasure in suffocating souls, no longer reckoning with life’s balance sheets but with a form of salvation that’s ever more distant.

perfumes_data.name: The Mariner's Rhyme Francesca Bianchi for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: The Mariner's Rhyme by Francesca Bianchi is a Oriental Fougere fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. The Mariner's Rhyme was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Francesca Bianchi. Top notes are elemi, Bergamot, Grapefruit and Lavender; middle notes are Ozonic notes, Iris and Orange Blossom; base notes are Oakmoss, Frankincense, Patchouli and Amber.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
The ozonic theme corresponds to the style and artistic vision of Francesca Bianchi. The perfume has a fresh and cheerful aspect, but also complex and dramatic. The ozonic accord works thanks to the strong presence of amber. The transparency of the ozonic chord is converted into an opaque and iris into an opaque and dense note by the iris and has an almost sacred and mystical character evoked by elemi and incense.
This unisex fragrance is fresh and transparent on the one hand and dense and structured on the other. The citrus and ozonic opening has a crisp and modern character, enhanced by the sharp edge of the aldehydes.

perfumes_data.name: Ajayeb Dubai Lattafa Perfumes for women and men

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Ajayeb Dubai captures the essence of tradition and modernity, evoking a sensation of unparalleled warmth and sophistication.
Notes
Top : Saffron, Pineapple
Heart : Coffee Arabica, Violet Leaves
Base : Sandalwood, Vanilla, Butterscotch

perfumes_data.name: Molecule 01 + Black Tea Escentric Molecules for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Molecule 01 + Black Tea by Escentric Molecules is a Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Molecule 01 + Black Tea was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Geza Schoen.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: “There’s not only one black tea in the world. I wanted to bring out the various facets of this complex aroma to make my own accord using an extract of black tea as an infusion together with a maté tea absolute. What I love about black tea is its subtlety. The way the airiness plays against the earthiness and the bitter, fresh notes play against the floral aspect, all with a light touch,” said perfumer, Geza Schoen.

perfumes_data.name: Louis XV 1722 Xerjoff for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Louis XV 1722 by Xerjoff is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Louis XV 1722 was launched in 2024. Top notes are Grapefruit, Champagne, Plum and Saffron; middle notes are Hazelnut, Lavender, Rose, Coffee and Cocoa; base notes are Sandalwood, White Musk, Cashmeran, Incense and Leather.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
A synergy of tradition, passion and expertise collide resulting in a unique fusion of artistic exploration with the House de Venoge, one of the most important wine libraries in Champagne.
Louis XV 1722 perfume is emblematic of a true celebration, a fresh and original composition which lifts the spirits and stirs the senses. The irresistible, woody blend opens with metallic notes, mirroring the sensation the champagne creations instil in the senses, slowly revealing warmer, seductive nuances on the skin as time goes by.
The cultural exchange of ideas and experiences in the creation of a new perfume with the House de Venoge also sees a new drink creation so rare and unique, the grapes were specifically selected to perfectly blend with the Champagne’s dosage selected by Sergio Momo alongside the de Venoge Master Blender, with three exceptional creations; Blanc de Blancs, Blanc de Noirs and Rosé.
OLFACTORY NOTES
Grapefruit, Plum, Saffron, Liquor, Aromatic Notes
Coffee, Lavender, Rose, Cocoa, Hazelnut
Amber , White Musk , Cashmere Wood, Leather, Sandalwood, Incense

perfumes_data.name: Oud in White Laboratorio Olfattivo for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Oud in White by Laboratorio Olfattivo is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Oud in White was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Julien Rasquinet. Top notes are Raspberry, Ginger and Pear; middle notes are Jasmine Sambac, Osmanthus and Virginia Cedar; base notes are Cambodian Oud, Sandalwood and Labdanum.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Oud in White by Laboratorio Olfattivo is a refined fragrance that combines the hypnotic and seductive power of jasmine with the multifaceted essence of oud. The scent opens with pear peel, ginger, and raspberry, leading to a sensual heart of jasmine, cedar wood, and osmanthus. The drydown reveals a deep resinous duo of labdanum and dense leathery oud, complemented by a warm milky sandalwood.

perfumes_data.name: Eternity for Men Reflections Calvin Klein for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Eternity for Men Reflections by Calvin Klein is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Eternity for Men Reflections was launched in 2023. Eternity for Men Reflections was created by Carlos Viñals and Alienor Massenet. Top note is Absinthe; middle note is Chocolate; base notes are Oakmoss and Sandalwood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
From the blazing sunshine and into the reflective waters.
An exhilarating summer romance with your soulmate is about to begin.
Get ready to make memories of a lifetime.
This season, Calvin Klein Fragrances introduces two fresh summer additions to the iconic Eternity fragrance pillar: Eternity Reflections for Men Eau de Toilette and Eternity Reflections for Women Eau de Parfum.
The Calvin Klein Eternity Reflections fragrances are inspired by the spontaneous, intimate moments shared between a couple at the beach. Against the backdrop of a hot summer day, the campaign captures two lovers indulging in acts of playfulness, creating memories in the sparkling waves and salty sea air. The quintessential summer romance.
The Eternity Reflections flacons pay tribute to the colors of summer. A tranquil blue men’s bottle and a serene seafoam green women’s bottle are made from lacquered glass and topped with silver caps, evoking the summer sky and sea while remaining true to Calvin Klein’s minimalist aesthetic. The black and white outer packaging glistens with ocean-like sparkles to symbolize the reflections of summer love shared between a couple. Both cartons share the same design, further linking the men’s and women’s fragrances.
To reimagine the men’s fragrance, perfumers Carlos Vinals and Alienor Massent of Symrise were inspired to create a smell and feel like liquid magic with a mint chocolate and absinthe signature.
Crisp. Surprising. Fresh.

Calvin Klein Eternity Reflections for Men Eau de Toilette, an aromatic woody fougere, opens with a green fairy absinthe. At heart, an addictive chocolate note adds an unexpected center. Oak moss swirled with sensual sandalwood provides a substantive structure, a key signature of the Eternity fragrance line.

perfumes_data.name: Spice D'Arno Electimuss for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Spice D'Arno by Electimuss is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Spice D'Arno was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Celine Barel. Top notes are Cardamom, elemi, Bergamot, Lemon and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Bran, Iris, Orange, Leather and Thyme; base notes are Vanilla, Myrrh, Cashmeran and Oud.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Spice D'Arno by Electimuss is a rhythmical composition inspired by the flow of the Arno river. Opening with invigorating tones of bergamot, lemon, and pink pepper, it evokes the lively energy of a new adventure. The heart features thyme, cistus, and bran absolute, while the base is enriched with vanilla, oud, and myrrh, creating a warm and embracing scent.

perfumes_data.name: Annacamento Toskovat' for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Annacamento by Toskovat' is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Annacamento was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is David-Lev Jipa-Slivinschi. Top notes are Blood Orange, Verbena, Orange and prickly pear; middle notes are Pancake, Whipped Cream, Rum, Raisin, Frangipani and Broom; base notes are Mastic or Lentisque, Cypress, Oak, Cistus Incanus, Cedar, Crithmum and Poplar buds.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Today I remembered travelling…
my favorite place to visit – the past. The sweet allure of it.
The destination of predestination. Going nowhere, fast.
I recall the image of the Tyrrhenian, while we were on tower tops. I looked at you like a kid seeing the sea for the first time.
Or me seeing it the last.
If you look back at that beauty, you’ve most likely already lost it. Or is it me?
Douce melancholy breeze, of summers never lived, of places never been, of sunshine melting skin –
You cast such a shadow.
Take a seat. Have a treat. Hurry up.
We are late.

perfumes_data.name: Decembrie 89 - Freedom elixir Adi Ale Van for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Decembrie 89 - Freedom elixir by Adi Ale Van is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Decembrie 89 - Freedom elixir was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Jimmy Bodin. Top notes are Apple, Orange and Lemon; middle notes are Vanilla Bean and Hazelnut; base notes are Madagascar Vanilla, Vanilla Absolute and Rum.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
I barely remember small fragments of those frosty winter days, with the snow as you can only see today. It was my first vacation as a schoolboy, back home in my childhood village with my grandparents. I was just a child who was just beginning life with shy steps, not knowing that soon the great storm of change will spread over the whole country. An old radio placed on one of the walls of our old room, where we sat by the stove, told us about the street fights from all over the country. All I remember is a big snowman I made in the yard with charcoal eyes, a morocov nose and the old store in the village of the cooperative. An old house with a high ground floor and old wooden counters dulled by time and dusty, which for me seemed like a paradise from another world. It was the first year when I saw and ate oranges and chocolate, which I kept on our old dresser, and for me they were worth their weight in gold. Those smells remained imprinted in my memory, being transposed now in an olfactory journey like no other.
Life passes, the beautiful moments and everything we once loved with them disappear in the mist of time.

perfumes_data.name: Choco Raptor Lorenzo Pazzaglia for women and men

perfumes_data.name: Vibrant Leather & Sandalwood Elixir Zara for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Vibrant Leather & Sandalwood Elixir by Zara is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Vibrant Leather & Sandalwood Elixir was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Jérôme Epinette. Top note is Cardamom; middle note is Carrot Seeds; base notes are Sandalwood and Woody Notes.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: A masculine fragrance pushed to the limit, where rich and robust sandalwood is elevated by a refined hint of spicy cardamom and a powdery touch of carrot to highlight a deep woody base.

perfumes_data.name: Deziro Nishane for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Deziro by Nishane is a Aromatic Aquatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Deziro was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Alberto Morillas. Top notes are Mandarin, Sea Notes and Ambrox Super; middle notes are Mint, Star Anise, Cypriol, Geranium and Carrot Seeds; base notes are Ambrettolide, Haitian Vetiver and Sandalwood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Embodies the force of Desire, an elemental emotion with the power to shape destinies and forge connections across the unfathomable depths of human experience.
The freshness of a Marine Accord blends seamlessly with the coolness of Mint, evoking the sudden, refreshing crash of a wave. Anchoring this exhilarating introduction are notes of Vetiver and Cypriol, drawing from the Earth to provide depth and balance. Star Anise and Sandalwood provide a warm and sweet embrace reminiscent of the sun’s glow on sea-worn sand while Ambrettolide and Carrot Seed introduce a faintly carnal twist, echoing the raw, primal essence of nature’s undirected desires.
Designed for those who are drawn to the mysterious depths of relationships and emotion, DEZIRO offers a refreshing yet profound experience that appeals to the adventurous spirit within.
TOP NOTES: Italian Mandarin, Marine Accord, Ambrox Super
HEART NOTES: Star Anise, Carrot Seed SFE, Cypriol, Mint, Geranium
BASE NOTES: Ambrettolide, Haitian Vetiver, Australian Sandalwood

perfumes_data.name: Vetiver Glacier Montblanc for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Vetiver Glacier by Montblanc is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Vetiver Glacier was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Nathalie Lorson. Top note is Vetiver; middle note is Juniper; base note is Sandalwood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Embark on an olfactory adventure with Vetiver Glacier, a fresh and invigorating eau de parfum inspired by the majestic Mont Blanc. This fragrance embodies the spirit of exploration and the pursuit of excellence, with notes of bitter vetiver, spicy ginger and nutmeg, and warm cedarwood and sandalwood. A touch of white musk adds a modern touch, while the raw woody quality of sandalwood wraps the fragrance in a comforting embrace.

perfumes_data.name: KHAMZAT Smesh Superz. for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: KHAMZAT Smesh by Superz. is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. KHAMZAT Smesh was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Hüseyin Erdoğmuş. Top notes are Blood Orange, Lavender and Neroli; middle notes are Spices, Cashmeran and Cinnamon; base notes are Vanilla, Vetiver, Moss, Amber, Tonka Bean and Cedarwood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Khamzat Chimaev used to use the well-known word "Smesh" for his wrestling, and wherever this word is spoken, Khamzat's endless and amazing dominance appears, the like of which the spectators have perhaps never seen before in the history of MMA. The perfume was created in exactly the same way. Extremely stylish and dominant. A scent that gives you great strength to achieve your goals. In addition to the cedar wood, the hot spices ensure that the fire never goes out in the wearer. The vanilla-tonka bean notes make it attractive, and the blood orange makes it really explosive.

perfumes_data.name: Mangomacumba Spiritica for women and men

perfumes_data.name: Patchouli Ink Montblanc for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Patchouli Ink by Montblanc is a Woody fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Patchouli Ink was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Fabrice Pellegrin. Top note is Bergamot; middle note is Ink; base notes are Patchouli and Vanilla.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Immerse yourself in the rich heritage of Montblanc calligraphy with Patchouli Ink, a captivating fragrance that captures the essence of ink on paper. The smoky, earthy notes of patchouli mingle with delicate musk and vanilla, creating a unique olfactory experience that evokes the sensation of writing with a fountain pen.

perfumes_data.name: Leather Jardin Zara for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Leather Jardin by Zara is a Leather fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Leather Jardin was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Jo Malone. Top note is Grapefruit; middle note is Rose; base note is Leather.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Eau de parfum. The fragrance pyramid includes notes of grapefruit, rose, and leather.

"From the dawn of the blue sky to the amber-hued desert sunset, every moment is imbued with this precious fragrance and its dazzling presence. Love Jo X." - Jo Malone CBE, founder of Jo Loves.

perfumes_data.name: A Wondrous Flight Mes Bisous for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: A Wondrous Flight by Mes Bisous is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. A Wondrous Flight was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Özge Erdoğmuş Altınel. Top notes are Grapefruit, Bergamot, Lemon and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Ginger, Pink Pepper, Jasmine and Iris; base notes are Musk, Moss, Patchouli, Vetiver, Amber and Leather.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
About The Lead Character
No wonder A Wondrous Flight souls always lift your spirits; after all, they get the energy from the sun. It is the sun that can turn a gloomy day into a joyous one; it is the life force that energizes and fills you with hope. But what good is the sun if it weren’t for the moon that shies away during the day and reflects the sun’s light to Earth at night, showing her love for him?
This is a harmonious dance of the sun and the moon, led by eternal infatuation.
Let A Wondrous Flight unleash your charismatic bright side, and join this dance that will sweep you off your feet.
Olfactory Notes
The citrusy notes of A Wondrous Flight are like a partner who inspires and energizes you to live to the fullest. Complemented by earthy notes such as patchouli, leather, amber and musk, the bold and spicy notes of pink pepper, jasmine, iris, and ginger make this perfume “the one” for the naturally charismatic souls.
The poem of the perfume:
Infatuation’s dance,
An enchanting trance.
You are my sun,
Ever shining, ever light.
Enchanted by you,
Our souls take flight.

perfumes_data.name: 1907 Boadicea the Victorious for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: 1907 by Boadicea the Victorious is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. 1907 was launched in 2024. Top notes are Cardamom, Lemon, Cinnamon and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Violet, Nutmeg, Cashmeran and Sage; base notes are Tobacco, Musk, Amber, Cedarwood, Benzoin, Tonka Bean and Moss.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: 1907 by Boadicea the Victorious is a unisex fragrance released in 2024. This sweet-floral scent features a blend of cardamom, cinnamon, lemon, and pink pepper in the top notes; cashmere, nutmeg, sage, and violet in the heart; and amber, benzoin, cedarwood, moss, musk, tobacco, and tonka bean in the base. The fragrance offers above-average longevity and a balanced composition that does not lean towards either masculinity or femininity.

perfumes_data.name: Star Chaser Thomas Kosmala for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Star Chaser by Thomas Kosmala is a Woody Aquatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Star Chaser was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Thomas Kosmala. Top notes are Neroli, Sea Notes and Green Apple; middle notes are Dry Wood and Tonka Bean; base notes are Sandalwood and Labdanum.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Star Chaser from Thomas Kosmala is a daring scent that invites you to dive head-first into a world of adventure. This perfume embodies the person who wishes to roam free, navigating the world at their own pace without the confines of societal pressures.

Top notes: Asphalt, gasoline, burnt match

perfumes_data.name: The Icon Attitude Antonio Banderas for men

perfumes_data.name: New Look 2024 Dior for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: New Look 2024 by Dior is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. New Look 2024 was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Francis Kurkdjian. Top note is Aldehydes; middle note is Frankincense; base note is Amber.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Exemplified by Christian Dior's iconic Bar suit of 1947, the New Look revolutionized fashion with its bold and elegant silhouette. Today, Francis Kurkdjian, Dior Parfum Creative Director, has reinvented this precious legacy as a daring Dior perfume for women and men, born of a bold creative approach that pushes the traditional boundaries of the amber fragrance.

Composed by Francis Kurkdjian, Dior Perfume Creative Director, the New Look olfactory silhouette revolves around an amber note and a fresh, highly concentrated aldehyde note. A vibrant frankincense accord envelops this new luxury perfume creation from La Collection Privée Christian Dior.
KEY NOTES:
Aldehydes, frankincense, ambery accord
"More than a legacy, more than a silhouette, the New Look is a state of mind, a way of viewing and reinterpreting the world. This powerful mindset has transcended time. True to Christian Dior who wanted Dior perfume to be an olfactory mirror of his couture, I strove to retain this perfect symbiosis between fashion and fragrance with incredible daring. I wanted to create a Dior fragrance that echoes the spirit, nuances and essence of the New Look today."
Francis Kurkdjian, Perfume Creative Director, Parfums Dior
Available as 125ml and 250ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: Caipi d' Argent Condé Parfum for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Caipi d' Argent by Condé Parfum is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Caipi d' Argent was launched in 2023. Top notes are Lime, Boozy Notes, Lemon Verbena, Sicilian Lemon, Bergamot and Litsea Cubeba; middle notes are Mint, Peppermint, Lavender, Rhubarb and Basil; base notes are Ambroxan, Coumarin, Vetiver, Virginia Cedar and Guaiac Wood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Inspired by the Brazilian heritage of drinks, the caipirinha, the Caipi d´Argent perfume is the newest creation by Condé Parfum.
Fábio Condé emphasizes the originality of the fragrance and the bottle by choosing the silver color, represented by the cocktail shaker.
The perfume is an aromatic fougere, invigorating with a cold look but with the proper taste of the drink.
Its opening brings Sicilian lemon, alcoholic notes, lemon verbena, lime, bergamot and litsea cubeba.
The body is composed of lavender, mint, mint, rhubarb and basil.
The base he sought to bring the sugary aspect of the drink with coumarin and woody at the same time with an accord of guaiac wood, vetiver, ambroxan and virginia cedar.
Cheers!
Top notes: Boozy notes, Sicilian Lemon, Verbena, Lime, Bergamot and Litsea Cubeba.
Middle Notes: Lavender, Mint, Mint, Rhubarb and Fig Leaves.
Base Notes: Coumarin, Guaiac Wood, Vetiver, Virginia Cedar and Ambroxan

perfumes_data.short_description: Suscepto by Spiritica is a Aromatic Aquatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Suscepto was launched in 2024. perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Tinos, Greece, the Aegean breeze that blends with the balsamic and invigorating notes of the eucalyptus that grow lush throughout the island. A monastery at the top of a hill, where you can hear the silver ticking of votive
offerings moved by the warm Mediterranean wind. The smell of beeswax candles fills the rooms of this sacred place and mixes with frankincense.

We are in one of the most sacred and precious Orthodox monasteries in all of Greece where people come on their knees to give thanks for the numerous miracles received. Suscepto is a hymn to the mysterious and unique sacredness of this place, where the impenetrable silence is the background to numerous paranormal manifestations. EX VOTO SUCEPTO, is the Latin phrase that means UNDERTAKING an ex voto, a spiritual thanks.

perfumes_data.name: Arabians Musk Montale for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Arabians Musk by Montale is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Arabians Musk was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Pierre Montale. Top notes are Honey and Bergamot; middle notes are Dates and Orange Blossom; base notes are Musk, Sugar, Tonka Bean and Vanilla.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Following the remarkable success of Arabians Tonka, Montale proudly unveils the next addition to its Arabians collection: Arabians Musk. This fragrance, while staying true to the captivating magic of the Orient, highlights the sensual and mysterious essence of musk. As with Montale’s previous creations, Arabians Musk is more than just a scent; it is a journey through the Moroccan desert, where each moment offers as much enchantment as the final destination.
The Fragrance Notes:
Arabians Musk is a sophisticated composition that artfully blends rare and luxurious ingredients, creating a fragrance experience that is both powerful and delicate. The journey begins with the golden sweetness of Sweet Honey, capturing the warmth of the day, while Bergamot Zests add a fresh, citrusy burst that awakens the senses. The richness of Tasty Medjool Dates evokes the caramelized scent of sun-drenched dates, grounding the fragrance in an opulent warmth.
A delicate floral breeze comes through with Tunisian Orange Flower, inspired by the blossoms found in a Moroccan oasis, adding a touch of lightness and elegance. The comforting sweetness of Vanilla Sugar follows, evoking a sense of indulgence. Venezuelan Tonka Beans bring a balsamic richness to the composition, enhancing its depth and sophistication. At the heart of the fragrance lies Warm Musk—sensual, enveloping, and unforgettable—tying together the luxurious notes and leaving a lasting impression.
Arabians Musk transports you to a summer evening on a winding road through the Atlas Mountains, leading toward the vast Sahara desert. The air is tinged with the familiar, glycerine-like scent of leather care products, evoking memories of horse-riding gear from a nearby stable. At the foot of the Atlas lies a stable owned by a dear friend, where the legendary horse CALAFETE, a stunning figure known worldwide from Montale’s Arabians Tonka campaign, is cared for. As daylight fades and the mystical blue hour sets in, you stop in front of an endless palm grove. The scattered dates on the ground, nearly caramelized under the day’s scorching sun, release a deep, intoxicating aroma. Nearby, an oasis emerges, surrounded by orange blossoms, their delicate fragrance filling the twilight air. This journey, much like the fragrance itself, serves as a metaphor: sometimes, the destination is less important than the path taken, where every moment becomes a source of joy and wonder.
The bottle of Arabians Musk is an elegant work of art, offering a striking contrast to the deep-toned bottle of Arabians Tonka. This new release is encased in a soft lacquered brown, reminiscent of the smooth sweetness of ripe dates and the delicate white flowers found in Moroccan oases. This lighter hue reflects a balance between strength and softness, subtly connecting the robustness of horse-riding leather gear to the fragrance’s delicate sensuality. The bottle’s soft, glycerine-like finish mirrors the tactile smoothness of leather cared for with fine oils, a nod to the noble equestrian world. This smooth texture, combined with the warm, luminous brown, evokes both the sweetness of dates and the light floral notes of orange blossom, creating an object that is as sensual to the touch as the fragrance is to the senses.
Arabians Musk is not merely a fragrance; it is an invitation to a sensory journey, where each olfactory note is a new step on the path to discovery. Inspired by magical Moroccan nights and the world of noble horses, this fragrance is a captivating blend of musky sensuality and floral, sugary notes, offering a deeply luxurious and evocative experience. The bottle, with its soft lacquered brown hue, perfectly encapsulates the contrast between the rugged nobility of purebred horses and the delicate sweetness of the scent. Arabians Musk celebrates freedom, sensuality, and elegance, reminding us that the beauty of the journey is as much in the moments along the way as in the final destination.

Depth of the soul. Deep in the soul. This is one of my interpretations of Oudh.
I wear it on my chest and it accompanies me all day like a second skin, and it has the "power" to enter me deeply inside on an emotional level like few things can do. I allow that, and it makes me feel good. It enters “into the depths of my soul”. I hope the same will happen to those who decide to wear it.

perfumes_data.name: Ajyal The Spirit of Dubai for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Ajyal by The Spirit of Dubai is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Ajyal was launched in 2023. Top notes are Sea Notes, Grapefruit, Mint, Bergamot, Rain Notes, Lime, Apple, Lemon, Plum, Green Notes, Pear, Black Pepper and Rhubarb; middle notes are Loukhoum, Amberwood, Lavender, Cherry Blossom, Jasmine Sambac, Jasmine, Carnation, Sandalwood, Lily of the Valley, Magnolia, Mimosa, Orchid, Ylang Ylang, Freesia, Immortelle, Heliotrope and Osmanthus; base notes are White Musk, Musk, Brown sugar, Amber, Cedarwood, Vanilla, Tonka and Patchouli.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
In the golden realm of Dubai, where sunbeams dance upon the dunes, behold “Dubai Ajyal”, an aromatic ode to generations past, present, and yet to come. Like the Ghaf tree, majestic and unyielding, it stands as a beacon of fortitude amid the desert's embrace. Its essence, a tapestry of yellow and blue, unveils the eternal dance of day and night, homage to the sun's radiant embrace and the starry canvas above. With each fragrant note, “Dubai Ajyal” whispers the tales of resilience, optimism, and kinship that flow through the veins of this storied land, beckoning all to partake in its scented symphony.

Embrace the timeless essence of Dubai with Dubai Ajyal. This exquisite fragrance captures the spirit of generations to evoke optimism, energy, and joy. It opens with a jubilant bergamot and plum and flows into a heart of delicate cherry blossoms and soothing lavender. While it closes with a cedarwood and vanilla bouquet. Inspired by the iconic Ghaf tree, it symbolizes resilience and continuity. Let the harmonious fusion of scents transport you to the golden sands, where the past, present, and future unite in a captivating fruity, floral, and oriental olfactory journey.

Holding this majestic fragrance is a gilded glass bottle, topped with a gold crown and a sleeve of yellow and blue. It comes enveloped in a sunshine yellow pouch, placed within a yellow box that’s framed with burnished gold.
Top Notes - Bergamot, Plum, Green Note, Petrichor, Marine Note, Pear, Mint, Rhubarb, Black Pepper, Grapefruit, Lime, Lemon, Candied Apple
Middle Notes - Cherry Blossoms, Osmanthus, Carnation, Mimosa, Ylang, Jasmine Sambac, Heliotrope, Magnolia, Freesia, Lavender, Helichrisum, Jasmin, Lily Of The Valley, Orchid, Indian Sandalwood, Orientalwood, Rose Loukoum
Base Notes - Cedarwood, White Musk, Musk, Patchouli, Tonka, Vanilla, Intense Oriental,
Brown Sugar

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Les Abstraits - Des Cendres (from ashes). Des Cendres symbolizes a newly invigorated self, represented by a
symphony of brisk woods, sumptuous florals, and animalic leather. Rising from the ashes of pain and loss, a new person emerges, like a phoenix. “Des Cendres was inspired by the connection to wild life, finding myself in nature among trees, flowing water, and animals,” says Les Abstraits founder and creative director Eugen. “The harmony of nature, I learned, could be reflected within.”

Des Cendres starts off with a green herbal blast of violet leaf and fresh tuberose cut with bracing galbanum and anise. The tuberose mellows into velvety, sensual lushness, settling onto a bed of smoky, resinous birch tar and leather, with a judicious visitation by hyraceum.
Everything we need, Des Cendres seems to say, is already right here. - A note from the brand.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
The night was not yet over, and the first rays of sunlight delicately enveloped the colourful stalls. A loud, cozy aroma filled the air, heightening the excitement. These are the moments when simplicity takes on a mystical meaning and everyday life becomes a unique experience. The 𝗣𝗼𝗹𝗶𝘀𝗵 market, which looked like a stage with a variety of crops, was the heart of the local community - every Wednesday it pulsated to the rhythm of trade. Every Wednesday morning, local farmers and craftsmen gathered, creating a magical space that came to life. These moments were like journeys deep into the soul, where every scent brought a new discovery.
As a child, I loved these ritual trips to the market with my grandparents. It was not everyday shopping, but an incredible journey where every colour, every energy, every scent, every hue and every selection of the best crops radiated magic. 𝗣𝗼𝘁𝗮𝘁𝗼𝗲𝘀, the golden treasures of the 𝗣𝗼𝗹𝗶𝘀𝗵 countryside, rested in jute sacks and wicker baskets. Their earthy skin, still damp from the morning dew, radiated a deep, sensual chord. Every touch of these tubers reminded me of my connection with nature, of the cycle of life that goes on forever. I captured these in the 𝗣𝗢𝗟𝗜𝗦𝗛 • 𝗣𝗢𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗢𝗘𝗦 composition, which transports me back to those special memories, sensual experiences, and the unique magic of simplicity. - Michał Gilbert Lach | Creative Director
TOP NOTES | Leather, Grass, Wheat, Beetroot, Pine
HEART NOTES | Polish Potatoes, Rose, Heliotrope, Clove
BOTTOM NOTES | Patchouli, Birch, Soil, Earthy Notes, Oud, Amber, Vanilla, Honey, Hay, Labdanum, Benzoin

perfumes_data.short_description: 4711 Acqua Colonia Peony & Sandalwood by 4711 is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. 4711 Acqua Colonia Peony & Sandalwood was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Fanny Bal.

perfumes_data.name: Zelen Boka for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Zelen by Boka is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Zelen was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Boris Zrnic. Top notes are Lime, Yuzu and Bergamot; middle notes are Pink Pepper, Beeswax and Cardamom; base notes are Haitian Vetiver, Virginia Cedar and Mysore Sandalwood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
“Zelen” translates to “green” in Serbian. This scent is Vetiver, as it was meant to be celebrated.
It is refined, elegant, and classic. Teeming with balanced bittersweet Pink Peppercorn and Italian Bergamot spice, underscored by effervescent Green Cardamom. Delicate yet demanding. Transcendent Mexican Lime and fragrant Beeswax Absolute bound in the warm, musky embrace of Haitian Vetiver, Mysore Sandalwood and Virginia Cedar. Capped with Italian Carrara marble, Zelen is perennial and epicene.
Perfume is often cited as the most intense form of memory. It conjures images and events, a cinematic experience all of your own making.
The Serbian heritage of our founder and perfumer, Boris Zrnic, defines Boka’s entire lexicon. “Boka” is the affectionate childhood nickname used by his family and immediately became the working title of our scent collection.
Boris spent much of his childhood in nature—the other primary pillar of the brand. The world’s natural wonders seep heavily into our scents, as nearly every fragrance note derives from an element found in nature.
We hope these scents spark your sense of nostalgia in nature.
TOP NOTES: Italian Bergamot, Mexican Lime, Japanese Yuzu
HEART NOTES: Pink Peppercorn, Green Cardamom, Beeswax Absolute
BASE NOTES: Haitian Vetiver, Virginia Cedar, Mysore Sandalwood

Zelen is available as a 100ml Extrait de Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: Aridal Xerjoff for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Aridal by Xerjoff is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Aridal was launched in 2023. Top notes are elemi, Cypress, Nutmeg and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Patchouli, Orris Root, Cashmere Wood and Jasmine; base notes are Sandalwood, Papyrus, Benzoin and Dry Wood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Scouring the smoldering sands of the Western Sahara, Moroccan truffle hunters came across an awe-inspiring discovery.
Scattered in the sand, a lunar meteorite whose name has been given to the latest perfume in the Shooting Stars collection was found: Aridal.
Aridal opens to soft spicy nutmeg and pink pepper specks, distinguishing yet graceful, alluring the senses to a charismatic heart of orris, cashmere wood, and jasmine that caresses the skin. Papyrus, benzoin and dry woods at the base perfectly round up this dusty, dreamlike scent.
Aridal is enthroned in a luxurious case embedded with a certified meteorite fragment.
OLFACTORY NOTES

perfumes_data.name: 'Ilm Xerjoff for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: 'Ilm by Xerjoff is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. 'Ilm was launched in 2023. Top notes are Laotian Oud, Gurjan balsam and Australian Sandalwood; middle notes are Laotian Oud, Ambergris, Oakmoss and Atlas Cedar; base notes are Laotian Oud and Amber.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Alchemy is an influential philosophical traditional from antiquity – the magic sense of transformation. Based on this philosophy, Kemi is the collection of unique perfumes created from pure natural raw elements through cryptic distillation techniques. Perfume as we know it could not have taken shape without alchemic studies and practices or skilfully converting ordinary inputs into noble substances. Kemi straddles the line between the tangible and the intangible, the earthly and the ethereal, the real and the magical.
Taking its name from the Arabic word for knowledge, Ilm is a tribute to the golden age of chemistry. A simple yet intoxicating blend of aged Indian Assam oud, Laotian oud and Bangladesh oud, Ilm is warm and sweet set alight with flaming balsamic notes. Kemi is a collection of perfumes created from natural raw elements using innovative distillation techniques.
OLFACTORY NOTES

perfumes_data.name: Amberbomb Laboratorio Olfattivo for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Amberbomb by Laboratorio Olfattivo is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Amberbomb was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Arturetto Landi. Top notes are Coffee, Plum, Coconut, Strawberry and Apple; middle notes are Iris, Jasmine, Lily of the Valley and Rose; base notes are Leather, Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha, Cedar, Sandalwood, Patchouli, Amber, White Musk, Tonka Bean and Vanilla.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Power, opulence, creativity, originality, high quality. This is Orientalbomb. The very first collaboration between Laboratorio Olfattivo and Arturetto Landi. A fragrance made to impress – able to amaze and fascinate. Orientalbomb, with its mix of fruity, floral, dry woody and amber notes, intrigues and seduces. A long-lasting perfume with a great projection. Its vibrant opening with fruity notes is diluted by bitter notes of coffee, which give depth while melting with an enveloping floral heart, composed of powerful flowers such as rose, iris, jasmine and lily of the valley. This floral harmony reveals an ethereal and refined scent that softens the base: that’s the deepest secret of the fragrance. The warm and sensual notes of amber and vanilla match the earthy, woody notes of patchouli and sandalwood, while leather and nagarmotha provide mystery and seduction. Orientalbomb draws attention while leaving a memorable trail.
Luxury and magnetism…
«This new fragrance is the result of the collaboration between Laboratorio Olfattivo and Arturetto Landi and it introduces a brand new collection, the Extreme Collection. Extreme because these fragrances will be characterized by richer and more expensive raw materials, powerful and exclusive formulas, in line with the style of Laboratorio Olfattivo.» Roberto Drago.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
The intoxicating Hemp Accord meets the mysterious notes of prized Black Oud to give collectors an unprecedented, sometimes irreverent EdP. Indian Oud, exclusive to Mohammed Abu Nashi, with a definite spicy scent that veers to white pepper, and a slightly animalized finish, joins the Hemp accord that emphasizes the green and aromatic declination of the fragrance while also giving a resinous olfactory accent in the base. An extraordinary blend, for collectors who prefer the selected Crop The House of Oud every year.
Available in 507 numbered pieces.

perfumes_data.name: Oud Republic Pana Dora for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Oud Republic by Pana Dora is a Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Oud Republic was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Ibrahim Al Zoabi. Top notes are Saffron, Jasmine, Thyme, Graperfuit and Geranium; middle notes are Woody Notes, Rose, Amber, Lavender, Cardamom and Cypress; base notes are Agarwood (Oud), Amber, Vanilla, Fir Resin, Sandalwood, Cedar, Musk and Vetiver.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Oud has always been the favorite perfume of the heroes of ancient mythologies due to its scarcity, difficulty in extracting it and its magical scent. That is why the perfumer, Ibrahim Al Zouabi, used to call it the liquid gold.
On a cold Swedish winter night, while the perfumer was sitting by the fireplace and reading an ancient myth, he decided to design a warm fragrance that reduces stress, calms the heartbeat, restores inner peace, and stimulates the hormones of happiness. At the same time, it's inspired by the scent of princes, kings, and nobles of the Middle Ages.
He planned to build an Oud fragrance, but with a unique and different feeling from all the existing Oud perfumes. The blending of jasmine and saffron with Bulgarian roses and amber, in addition to oud, musk, and vanilla, took the fragrance to a sensual, imaginative, exciting, and attractive space, to be the new imaginary woody perfume from the house of Pana Dora.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Kajal IV is a celebration of nomadic exoticism, echoing the wilderness of the African Savannah. An inviting opening reveals the mysterious warmth of Davana Gaze, infused with a vibrant blend of Cassis, Rum, and cardamom. At the heart, the exotic sweetness of Jasmine and Palm flowers merge deliciously with a tranquil Leather richness. The base notes lead to a wild, natural paradise where lush palm trees bear delectable Kholas Dates, adding a fruity freshness to a seductively charismatic combination of Musk, Woods, and Vanilla.
TOP NOTES
Davana, cardamom, cassis, rum
HEART NOTES
Jasmine, leather, palm flower
BASE NOTES
Kholas dates, musk, wood notes, vanilla

perfumes_data.name: Patchouli Sauvage Houbigant for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Patchouli Sauvage by Houbigant is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Patchouli Sauvage was launched in 2023. Patchouli Sauvage was created by Luca Maffei and Antoine Lie. Top notes are Bergamot and White Grapefruit; middle notes are Patchouli, Labdanum and Dried Fruits; base notes are Cedar, Java vetiver oil, Sandal, Amber and Tonka Bean.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
When the wind blows, the leaves of patchouli rustle with a gentle sound, liberating an inebriating perfume simultaneously woody, earthy, and dry with smoky accents. The sumptuous Patchouli Sauvage represents the freedom of nature.
The fragrance opens with sparkling, luminous top notes of bergamot, grapefruit and a hint of pink pepper that flow into a sumptuous, precious heart built on notes of patchouli linked to labdanum and a crunchy dried fruit accord. In conclusion, cedar wood and golden amber are combined with vetiver and tonka bean for greater longevity.
Let yourself be carried away by the almost palpable scent of Patchouli Sauvage. Feel the wind blowing gently, hear the soft rustle of leaves, Patchouli Sauvage symbolises the freedom of nature.

perfumes_data.name: Rauque Roberto Greco for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Rauque by Roberto Greco is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Rauque was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Christopher Sheldrake. Top notes are Violet Leaf and Cassia; middle notes are Narcissus, Myrrh, Acácia, Mushroom and Osmanthus; base notes are Leather, Ambrarome and Pine tar.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Rauque - the French word for “hoarse” - because like a somnolent voice, I answered with foggy scenes the silences of a daily life that prohibitions let out of breath. January 2021, in my Parisian flat the time was numb, the days uncertain to the point of losing touch with our senses and with the others because they meant danger; in that enclosure I brought spontaneity into play to create a diversion and belie my thoughts. From this introspection – sometimes feverish, sometimes exhilarating, “Rauque” was born: a series of photographs blending suspended compositions and captured portraits. A?er all, freedom is not asked for, it is searched for and seized like an antidote.

With a glass plate device that dissolves the contours of my subjects, I wanted to engage in a dialogue with absence and presence, indoor and outdoor. The obliteration of the object which, through the viewer's imagination, takes shape, stimulating peripheral awareness. A struggle then begins between the image and its disappearance

The image is a flat envelope, not enough for me to fully translate the essence of my allegories. So, since 2014, I've been incorporating an olfactory dimension into my photographic series. This allows the viewer to access sensory perceptions additional to those of sight. Thus, “Rauque – L’Objet parfumant” - “the perfuming object” - created in close collaboration with perfumer Christopher Sheldrake, comes to dress, or be dressed by, the photographic series.

“Rauque – L’Objet parfumant” was born from my encounter with perfumer Christopher Sheldrake. We have elaborated the olfactive creation as I was working on my visual creation. Not forbidding ourselves anything, we wanted to be driven by artistic baldness, and if our alphabet was made up of words and images, it sometimes included music and taste as well. « I would like the smell of a body about to implode! » this is how our olfactory exchange started. The waxy basement of a mushroom farm, a doughy Alep soap, a sticky piece of leather left in the back of a stable, the muzzle of a cow, an old box of Japanese incense smelling of ancient and dust, flowers marked by the patina of time or forgotten fruits with carnal accents, we censored nothing to best convey the idea of a feverish body surrounded by sleepy lives. Odd ideas and risky materials abound, but Christopher’s mastery was the safeguard, nothing was to fear, everything would be enhanced.

perfumes_data.name: Téméraire Givenchy for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Téméraire by Givenchy is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Téméraire was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Nicolas Bonneville. Top notes are Clove Leaf and Cardamom; middle notes are Tuberose, Jasmine and Iris; base notes are Ink, Cade oil and Benzoin.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Téméraire, from Givenchy's Private Collection, embodies audacity and intrepidity. Its main note,  tuberose, dares to venture into the darkness of an unexpected ink accord. It also features spicy notes of cardamom and clove leaf which exacerbate the intensity of tuberose.
This carnal and narcotic bouquet blends with iris and jasmine before bonding with inky scents – a blend of leathery, woody, and smoky notes – warmed by amber cade and benzoin.
L'Accord Particulier, the signature fragrance of the collection, amplifies the personality of Téméraire, intensifying the contrast between luminous tuberose and the darkest ink accord.
Téméraire is also distinguished by its new case. Its bottle features a deep black cap, adorned with a metallic ring, which accentuates its architectural silhouette.
Available as a 100ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: Ambre Rubis Houbigant for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Ambre Rubis by Houbigant is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Ambre Rubis was launched in 2024. Top notes are Red Berries, Pink Pepper, Orange and Incense; middle notes are Cherry, Rum and Jasmine; base notes are Ambergris, Woody Notes, Cedar and Fir Resin.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Collection Les Ambres captures the most precious and emblematic elements of the Orient region through a sophisticated and contemporary olfactory alchemy. Inspired by the exceptional craftsmanship, cultural richness and unrivalled beauty of the Orient, this collection celebrates power and elegance through innovative and captivating olfactory compositions.
Created in four hands with Luca Maffei and Antoine Lie, each fragrance is a unique creation that blends multi-faceted amber with an avant-garde touch, offering a timeless sensory immersion.
Ambre Rubis Eau de Parfum by Houbigant, released in 2024, is classified as a fragrance for women and men and belongs to the Oriental family. The composition opens with notes of orange, incense, and pink pepper (red berries), followed by a heart of rum, cherry, and jasmine. The base consists of woody notes, cedar, grey amber, and fir resin (balsam).

perfumes_data.name: Aurum Xerjoff for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Aurum by Xerjoff is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Aurum was launched in 2023. Top notes are Bulgarian Rose, Brazilian Orange, Calabrian bergamot and Lemon; middle notes are Chocolate, Strawberry, Incense and Labdanum; base notes are Agarwood (Oud), Madagascar Vanilla, Oakmoss, Singapore Patchouli and Heliotrope.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Alchemy is an influential philosophical traditional from antiquity – the magic sense of transformation. Based on this philosophy, Kemi is the collection of unique perfumes created from pure natural raw elements through cryptic distillation techniques. Perfume as we know it could not have taken shape without alchemic studies and practices or skilfully converting ordinary inputs into noble substances. Kemi straddles the line between the tangible and the intangible, the earthly and the ethereal, the real and the magical.
Best described as the olfactory equivalent of gold, Aurum is as decadent as its name sake. Irresistibly romantic and seductive, tempting rose, chocolate and strawberry all conjure the most sensual notes. Like the most precious metal from which it takes its name, Aurum captivates and entices as it warms against the skin, revealing hints of its opulent character as time goes by.
OLFACTORY NOTES
