perfumes_data.detailed_description:
It is the encounter with the extraordinary, like what happens through the grotesques of the Domus Aurea Raffaello ee Emperor Nero. There is genius and recklessness in this fragrance which is particularly suitable for those who love beauty and excess.
In this essence "excesses and madness" are exalted with the use of raw materials, often in "overdoses". This is the case for the fruity and sugary accord that accompanies the entire composition... and for the warm, sweet and animalic base.
Top notes: Coconut, Saffron, Raspberry.
Heart notes: Cane Sugar, Tonka Bean, Maracuja.
Base notes: Vanilla, Oud, Leather.

perfumes_data.name: Lavande 31 Le Labo for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Lavande 31 by Le Labo is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Lavande 31 was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Daphné Bugey. Top notes are Neroli and Bergamot; middle note is Lavender; base notes are Musk, Tonka and Amber.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Le Labo invites us on a bold journey with LAVANDE 31—a captivating twist on lavender that reshapes our perceptions and redefines the tradition of this scent.
LAVANDE 31 revitalizes lavender, shedding its nostalgic connotations and elevating it to new heights. Infused with bergamot and neroli essential oils, it unveils an unexpected freshness, accentuating the purity of lavender flower buds through vertical distillation. The perfume's base, a Le Labo signature, mixes amber, musk, and tonka, creating a uniquely classic yet rebellious scent.
According to the brand, LAVANDE 31 exemplifies perfume as art, reinventing familiar notes into olfactory masterpieces that ignite the senses and inspire the mind.
Releasing on 1st October 2023, Lavande 31 is available as a 100ml Eau de Parfum.

SUPER NOVA
2024 Spicy Mineral

Fresh — Cosmic — Interstellar

Born from explosion, born to glow bright. Chaos-to-order. Cosmic violent beauty bursts through the dark to light; a teal blaze smears the horizon. Open your eyes. Inhale the night. Discover the mineral abyss of space through subtle metallic accords entangled with frosty aromatic nuances and a deep, dusky mix of oud and grey amber.
Mineral notes, Artemisia, Green pepper
Ozon, Gunpowder, Oud
Cashmeran, Grey amber, Metallic notes

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Ruy Lopez captivates as a distinctive and enthralling fragrance, designed for inquisitive visionaries. Harmoniously blending black tea and exotic spices with tantalizing undertones of succulent black cherry, supple leather, and aged oakwood, this perfume scent exudes an air of inscrutable sophistication. Celestial whispers of rose and davana bestow an added layer of opulence and refinement, weaving together an olfactory tapestry that is simultaneously reminiscent of the familiar, yet undeniably extraordinary.
"Ruy Lopez paints a picture of dark and mysterious sophistication. Black Tea leads the fragrance with kisses of black pepper and cherry, delivering a deep, wine-like fruitiness with a hint of spice. A thread of patchouli and notes of dark plum come together along with rich leather to wrap the fragrance in an aura of boozy, elegant suede." -Christelle Laprade, Perfumer.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Immerse yourself in the captivating aura of this smoky fragrance—an opulent olfactory experience that unfolds in layers. Opening with top notes of oud, smoke, and the sweet embrace of maple syrup, it sets the stage for a journey into luxury. As the scent evolves into its heart, a rich blend of sandalwood, guaiac wood, cedarwood, vanilla, and a hint of cotton candy creates a luxurious and comforting symphony.
Finally, it gracefully settles into a base of amber, labdanum, vanilla, and musk, leaving you with a super-warm and enduring closure that lingers for long hours.

perfumes_data.name: Pur Ambre Louis Vuitton for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Pur Ambre by Louis Vuitton is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Pur Ambre was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Jacques Cavallier Belletrud.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
With Pure Perfumes, Louis Vuitton imagines a way of personalizing one's fragrance signature with a gesture of absolute refinement. Inspired by the tradition of layering several fragrances, these intense compositions can be used as a finishing touch to your perfume ritual. Woven from exceptional essences and concentrated to the extreme, they celebrate the raw beauty of legendary ingredients in perfumery.

A traveling material by its very nature, ambergris has fascinated mankind since the dawn of time. Jacques Cavallier Belletrud pays tribute to the absolute sensuality of its scent by marrying an infusion of natural ambergris with the woody, musky, velvety vibrancy of Ambroxan. A scintillating burst of freshness gradually reveals a complex scent shimmering with animalic, woody and iodized facets. Endowed with an unparalleled power of attraction, Pur Ambre captures the utmost mystery of ambergris, captivatingly exuding seduction in successive waves.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Queening is a celebration of achieving one's goals, symbolizing a journey through challenges, and overcoming obstacles to emerge stronger and renewed. This exquisite perfume fragrance combines the royal scent of Orris with the sweetness of vanilla, creating an uplifting opening, followed by aged rum and saffron. Dedicated to daily successes, major accomplishments, and the rewards they bring, this captivating scent empowers all current and aspiring Queens.
"Undeniably loved by all, Queening brings the most desirable notes of clean cotton, creamy orris and vanilla together in a dreamy, cocooning blend. Fluffy musks, rum and coconut embody the enveloping gourmand elements of comfort and nourishment." - Christelle Laprade, Perfumer.

perfumes_data.name: Jimmy Choo Man Extreme Jimmy Choo for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Jimmy Choo Man Extreme by Jimmy Choo is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Jimmy Choo Man Extreme was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Anne Flipo. Top notes are Red Thyme and Black Pepper; middle notes are Sage, Geranium and Nutmeg; base note is Woody Notes.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Jimmy Choo introduces a bold new chapter in its men’s fragrance collection with Jimmy Choo Man Extreme, an intensified reinterpretation of the original Jimmy Choo Man, first launched in 2014. Rooted in the brand’s signature aromatic-woody DNA, this dynamic scent takes sophistication to the next level.
Designed for the modern adventurer, Jimmy Choo Man Extreme embodies strength, confidence, and an unrelenting thirst for new experiences. This powerful fougère composition is crafted for men who take control of their destiny, embrace challenges, and seek excitement in the great outdoors.
At its core, the fragrance ignites with fiery red thyme and black pepper, creating an exhilarating opening. The heart unfolds into an aromatic blend of fresh geranium and clary sage, adding depth and refinement. Finally, the base lingers with the warmth of amber woods, the creamy richness of tonka bean, and the earthy intensity of vetiver, resulting in a seductive, long-lasting masculine signature.
Jimmy Choo Man Extreme is a fragrance that captures intensity and passion, inspired by the rich, dynamic shades of red.
"When creating this fragrance, I imagined different shades of red and thought about how to represent them in the fragrance. One ingredient immediately came to mind: red thyme oil, with its burning freshness, which brings incredible intensity to the fragrance." – Anne Flipo, Master Perfumer, Jimmy Choo
With a modernized take on the classic fougère structure, the composition balances fiery and sensual elements for a bold and unforgettable scent.
"Our intention was also to modernize the classic fougère composition, using the sensual warmth of tonka bean and amber woods to create a real signature." – Tanguy Guesnet, Perfumer, Jimmy Choo
The fragrance is housed in a striking bottle that reflects its powerful essence. Retaining the original square silhouette of Jimmy Choo Man, the flacon is now enveloped in a vibrant scarlet lacquer, symbolizing its bold intensity. The silver-embossed name, along with a red leather-effect cap, adds the finishing touch to this daring and dynamic design.
Available as 30ml, 50ml and 100ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: Fanfare Thameen for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Fanfare by Thameen is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Fanfare was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Bruno Jovanovic. Top notes are Lemon, Neroli, Bergamot and Floral Notes; middle notes are Vermouth, juniper berry and Rosemary; base notes are Vetiver, Musk and Patchouli.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Reimagined as Cologne Elixir with more faceted nuances layering over the classical structure of cologne, Fanfare evokes memorable sillage and seductive longevity.
Fanfare is inspired by the Flower Market in Covent Garden, which has been immortalised by film and musical representations, and most recently upcycled into a functional annex for entertainment. Chong explains, “I love the lineage of how George Bernard Shaw’s Pygmalion has been regarded as a timeless masterpiece interpreted into different medium. It has been an amazing opportunity to have the chance to contribute to this evolution with an olfactive representation by collaborating with French perfumer Bruno Jovanovic.”

perfumes_data.name: Bohemia Acqua di Praga for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Bohemia by Acqua di Praga is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Bohemia was launched in 2023. Top notes are Grapefruit, Tangerine, Ginger and Cardamom; middle notes are Aquatic notes, Violet, Rose and Jasmine; base notes are Leather, Sandalwood, Nutmeg and Amber.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Acqua di Praga Bohemia is a sensual journey that defines the freedom and independence that characterize every bohemian.
Acqua di Praga is created from the finest fragrance ingredients using traditional techniques. The result is a masterpiece that celebrates the bohemian spirit and the art of perfumery. From the citrus notes of grapefruit and mandarin to the warm, woody scent of oud and sandalwood. Each ingredient tells its own story and contributes to the harmonious composition of the fragrance.
Acqua di Praga is a challenge
"With Acqua di Praga, we invite you to go beyond the ordinary and discover a fragrance that truly captures the essence of our city, its history, and its spirit. "
Acqua di Praga is a gender-free fragrance that is more than just a scent; it's a reflection of your individuality and your personal style. By wearing Acqua di Praga, you're making a statement about who you are and what you stand for. You're embracing the art of self-expression and showing the world your true self.
Whether you're exploring the streets of Prague or simply enjoying a night out with friends, Acqua di Praga is the perfect accessory for any occasion. It's a fragrance that exudes confidence, elegance, and sophistication, and it's sure to leave a lasting impression on everyone you meet.

perfumes_data.name: Oud Taiwan Areej Le Doré for women and men

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Oud Taiwan is an exquisite fragrance inspired by extraordinary oud oil distilled from highly matured oud, naturally grown in Taiwan. The composition opens with a bitter green leaves accord, full of vibrant verdant and slightly fresh nuances, with a tropical indolic touch. The heart notes feature extremely condensed, matured, and complex Taiwan oud radiating a bitter green medicinal aura, enhanced by boronia absolute. The base notes include smoky and leathery fossil amber, seaweed, spices, sandalwood, and animalic musks, creating a vision of tropical mossy woods and a photorealistic transportation to a night jungle.

perfumes_data.name: Bonne Étoile Baby Dior Dior for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Bonne Étoile Baby Dior by Dior is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Bonne Étoile Baby Dior was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Francis Kurkdjian. Top note is Green Pear; middle note is Wild Rose; base note is White Musk.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
"The evocation of sweetness, an invitation to the tenderness of childhood, the age when the senses awaken, where a child's laughter enchants and dreams reign. In 1970, a fragrance line called Baby Dior was born: today, it is reborn with a collection full of softness, inspired by the "Bonne Étoile" (Lucky Star).

Bonne Étoile is the scented water for babies and children from Baby Dior, a poetic co-creation born of the encounter between Francis Kurkdjian, Dior Perfume Creative Director, who composed the fragrance, and Cordélia de Castellane, Artistic Director of Baby Dior, who imagined the dreamy decor of the bottles.

This scented water is formulated without alcohol and with 98%* natural-origin ingredients. It is a childhood memory that comes to life in soft notes of pear, wild rose, and white musks.

The pastel-coloured bottle of Bonne Étoile is adorned with an imaginary and fantastical garden of Granville, featuring a menagerie and colorful hot air balloons, a Toile de Jouy pattern specially created for the occasion.

More than a scented water, it is an object imbued with reverie that can be personalised with the colored ribbon of your choice to accompany your child like their lucky star."
Pear Note: A juicy, dewy, and green note.
Wild Rose Note: A soft floral note.
White Musk Note: A cottony, velvety note.
"For Baby Dior, I wanted to create a scented water for little ones that is as simple as they are. A child says 'yes,' says 'no,' 'I like' or 'I don't like.' A formula imposed itself, like an impulse, a smile. I wanted to bypass the inevitable orange blossom, which has long been the signature scent of childhood, and find a soothing fragrance in a different formula: a dewy and green pear note, brightened by wild rose, wrapped in soft, cottony, protective musks.”

Francis Kurkdjian, Perfume Creative Director, Parfums Dior
Available in two shades (pink and green) as 100 ml Eau de Senteur.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
This fragrance represents an unprecedented milestone, where the creator has transcended the boundaries of their own style, aiming beyond.
“OVER STYLE” is a symphony. Every note finds its place without ever dominating: incense elegantly envelops the composition, accompanied by hints of orange and honey that lend a subtle sweetness.
A touch of mint refreshes the blend, while flowers and spices, interwoven with woods and resins, add a depth that gently caresses the senses.
It is a refined and timeless creation, a meeting of harmony and restraint, designed for those seeking something truly distinctive.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
‘SOLUTION NO. 6’ TO WANTING MORE
It’s like rolling in caramel. But if you don’t know how that feels like, the SOLUTION NO. 6 is to try it. ‘Focus on the solution, not the problem’ as they say, is in its essence an Off-White unraveling of rum, chocolate, patchouli, black pepper, rose, vanilla, bergamot, distinguished by a caramel color. And if you pair it with any of your favorite 1 to 10 Solutions, you’ll strike more versatility in your signature scent.
FOR THE FEW
The ECCENTRIC is an unconventional lover of niche whose legacy and purpose is to celebrate her/his individualities and differences from the others. And with an eccentric mood, attitude, vision, view and an eccentric-self, the perfume choices are alike and extra-fueled by one purpose only, to be as distinct as possible.

perfumes_data.name: Vieri Mind Games for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Vieri by Mind Games is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Vieri was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Christelle Laprade. Top notes are Lemongrass, Lemon and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Tea, Red Fruits, Peony and Camellia; base notes are Musk, Amberwood and Incense.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Vieri, the nobleman who captivated Lionora's heart with grace and prowess, transports you to the breathtaking Mediterranean landscape where their love story flourished. A surge of crimson lemongrass, vivacious citron, and effervescent pink pepper initiates the perfume's fragrance. As the scent of the perfume evolves, floral notes of lush peony and camellia tea emerge against a backdrop of enticing musks, mystical incense, and rich Orientalwood, reflecting Vieri's subtle virility and avant-garde approach to love. Allow Vieri to enchant you with its captivating first impressions and enduring charm that withstands the test of time.
"A duality of contrasts. Bright, uplifting and warm, Vieri pairs our natural Lemongrass Madagascar with sparkling citron and pink pepper around a heart of Camellia Tea. To enhance the natural warming effect, we finished it with a smoky, Orientalwood and musk effect for allure and trail." - Christelle Laprade, Perfumer.

perfumes_data.name: Vivamor Navitus Parfums for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Vivamor by Navitus Parfums is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Vivamor was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Jorge Lee. Top notes are Pineapple, Lemon, Palisander Rosewood and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Patchouli, Saffron, Oakmoss and Rose; base notes are Sandalwood, Leather, Musk and Amberwood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Vivamor All Over Spray is an uplifting way to wear the Vivamor Extrait De Parfum fragrance. Layer over Vivamor Extrait De Parfum or wear the Vivamor All Over Spray on its own. Enjoy the specially designed atomiser ensuring wider application all over.
From the Latin words of Viva meaning Life and Amor meaning Love, Vivamor is a celebration of life and love. Vivamor Parfum is the perfect expression to keep you confident and alluring. Invigorating freshness is introduced through pink peppercorn, lemon, rosewood and pineapple adding brightness which is then joined by a sensual rose, saffron, patchouli and oakmoss heart. Sandalwood, Leather, Dark Orientalwoods and Musk thereafter bring out allure and complexity to the fragrance lasting for many hours and taking the wearer on a blissful journey.
Created by Master Perfumer Jorge Lee in collaboration with Rashed Belhasa (MoneyKicks).

perfumes_data.name: White On White Xerjoff for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: White On White by Xerjoff is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. White On White was launched in 2023. Top notes are Fig and Bergamot; middle notes are Patchouli, Tolu Balsam and Cedarwood; base notes are Sandalwood, Musk, Vanilla and Amber.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
A scent that will forever hold the poetic portrayals that were received from our dedicated Xerjoff clients who took the time to test and trial the creations within the exclusive White on White set.
A perfume whose aura echoes the poise and passion that was attained from your input when selecting the scent.
White on White commences with fresh hints of bergamot and earthy undertones of fig leaf, which settle down to reveal a soft cloud of fig milk, with cedarwood, patchouli and Tolu balsam at the woody heart.
Soothing and sophisticated, White on White radiates a comforting blend of amber, musk and Bourbon vanilla that lull the senses to a dreamlike state at the base.
OLFACTORY NOTES

perfumes_data.name: Encens Cuivre Eau de Parfum Ojar for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Encens Cuivre Eau de Parfum by Ojar is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Encens Cuivre Eau de Parfum was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Jordi Fernández. Top notes are elemi and Brazilian Rosewood; middle notes are Frankincense, Myrrh and Patchouli; base notes are Musk, Ambergris and Vanila.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Founded by Sheikha Hind Bahwan, OJAR is a masterful tribute to the ancient artistry and rituals of MiddleEastern perfume craftsmanship. It weaves a passionate and inspiring tapestry, a sensorial experience, that transcends time and borders, achieved through a fusion of fragrances from both the East and West.
This niche perfume Maison takes its name from "HOJARI" signifying the purest essence of Frankincense found exclusively in the Sultanate of Oman. Frankincense, steeped in profound history, serves as a revered cornerstone of OJAR's fragrant collection. This sacred resin is renowned not only for its captivating perfumed scent, but also for the powerful and elevating impact it bestows upon the body, mind, and spirit when burned. Introducing ENCENS CUIVRE, the latest gem in OJAR's captivating Frankincense collection— a fragrance that melds the enchantment of Arabian tales with modernity, culminating in an oneiric masterpiece. Inspired by age-old legend, Encens Cuivre embarks on an olfactory journey, crafting a narrative from three treasures from the depths of the Earth, captivating all who dare to explore the mystical realms of the East: Frankincense, Myrrh, and Gold. These rare gifts encapsulate ancient stories of spirituality and opulence, across centuries. Imagine the fusion of these precious natural resins: Frankincense, a sacred offering from Oman's landscapes; Myrrh, a mystical gem from the heart of Africa; and Elemi, a secret treasure from the depths of Asia. This harmonious symphony of notes unfolds on your skin like a majestic coronation. Combined with the finest natural Vanilla essence, also referred to as 'the Gold of the perfumers', and a base of Musk, this fragrance transforms into an elixir of unparalleled luxury, enveloping you in a warm, comforting embrace that evokes an everlasting allure. Encens Cuivre is an exquisite unisex Vanilla fragrance, magnetized by smoky Incense notes and caressed by the velvety touch of Musk. It weaves a hypnotic, radiant sillage—a fragrant trail that bears the soft murmurs of ancient tales.
Top notes: Elemi, Rosewood
Middle notes: Patchouli, Myrrh, Frankincense
Base notes: Orientalgris, Musk, Vanilla
PERFUMER Jordi Fernández

Available in Absolute perfume oil and Eau de Parfum 100ml.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
"An amalgamation of the words British and Cologne, the classic cologne structure is re-imagined and magnified with complex chords and accords with intensive projection and longevity. All fragrances in this collection are categorised as Cologne Elixir defining an inventive and playful interpretation.

The logo is inspired by British heraldry and cypher. The two calligraphed “t” pay respect to heritage with the left “t” and creating the classics of tomorrow with the right “t.” 

The cube shaped bottle is in clear frosted glass, signifying Thameen London’s luxury order of heralding and defining a new era of olfactive zeitgeist. Blue letterings are used on the bottle making a nod to the brand’s signature blue. It’s adorned with a solid gloss silver magnetic cap.

Embracing a sustainable practice of presenting responsible luxury, the hinged box has less components, more compact in size, and recyclable in one piece. Made with a removable inner frame, the box is created to be reused to store one’s personal valuables, such as rings, earrings, necklaces or cufflinks. A sleeve with abstract photography will cover the box to identify the fragrance."

perfumes_data.name: Leather Malaki Chopard for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Leather Malaki by Chopard is a Leather fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Leather Malaki was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Dora Baghriche. Top notes are Bergamot and Black Pepper; middle notes are Cedar, Cypress and Spicy Notes; base notes are Leather, Mineral notes, Labdanum and Amber.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Leather Malaki by Chopard is a fragrance inspired by incense and the main perfume ingredients of the Middle East. It opens with hints of bergamot and black pepper, followed by a mixture of cedar notes with woody and spicy nuances, emphasized by a leather accord, mineral, and smoky notes.
"The fragrance opens with a biting note of bergamot essence and black pepper, evoking an intensely aromatic breeze sweeping across the land. Alaskan cedar essence chiseled with woody, spiced traits lends structure and radiance to the leathery-mineral accord. This accord unveils a unique, profound olfactory duality wherein warm, smoky notes contrast with a compelling minerality. Created for modern wayfarers who are irresistibly drawn to wide-open spaces and dizzying heights, Leather Malaki is an exhilarating, boundless breath of life."
Available in 80ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: Wavechild Room 1015 for women and men

Top notes are Mandarin Orange, Orange and Lemon; middle notes are Watermelon and Coconut; base notes are Ambergris, Amberwood and Cacao.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Immerse yourself in an olfactory journey and embark on tribute to Surf Culture, riding the olfactive waves of Orange, Watermelon, Coconut and Orientalgris. From the legendary Huntington Beach to the surf gangs, bikers, and the electrifying blend of edginess and creativity, Wavechild is a celebration of the art of surfing. Stripped to the core, the perfume in your hands is a raw, wire-to-wire, rebellious burst of energy . Open your nostrils, expand your mind, and become the Wavechild
Top Notes: Orange, Mandarin, lemon 
Heart Notes: Watermelon, Coconut 
Base Notes: Oriental Woods, Cocoa, Orientalgris

perfumes_data.name: Desert Dawn Byredo for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Desert Dawn by Byredo is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Desert Dawn was launched in 2024. perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Desert Dawn by Byredo is a celebration of nature’s creative juxtapositions, offering a universal take on the woody olfactive family. This scent opens with the inviting sweet spices of cardamom and rose petals, before giving way to the enveloping warmth of sandalwood, cedarwood, and carrot seeds at the heart. An enticing finish of vetiver and silk musk is enlivened by the crisp, clean scent of papyrus, invoking the dry heat of the desert and the warmness of the first rays of dawn.
Byredo Desert Dawn is available in 50 ml and 100 ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: Sogni Meo Fusciuni for women and men

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
One day, a long time ago, I thought or dreamed of being able to create a perfect woody perfume, where the different woods would tell the story of time, of the passing of life itself, again a challenge, a perfume that could be unique, exciting and involving.
Sogni is the realisation of my desire, an immediate experience, incredibly close to reality and the nature of things. Aesthetic devotion to nature.

perfumes_data.name: Santal Intense Floris for men

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Santal Intense pays homage to the rich and captivating scent of sandalwood. The smooth sandalwood note is elevated by facets of spicy cardamom and black pepper that merge with the lavender in the heart, creating a classic woody fougère fragrance. An intensified amber woody base unfolds with a blend of amber and frankincense to deliver a richer, more enduring scent. The subtle combination of vanilla with tonka bean, adds a hint of sweetness and warmth, while the amber and frankincense provide a mystical quality that adds to the allure.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: "Khair Pistachio by Paris Corner is a luxurious and captivating fragrance that combines carefully curated ingredients to create a scent that not only lingers but also leaves a distinctive mark. This fragrance opens with top notes of Italian bergamot, pistachio ice cream, hazelnut, sweet rum, and cardamom, offering a delightful freshness and warmth. The heart features a lush and floral layer with notes of geranium, white peony, muguet, jasmine, raspberry, white peach, and pear, adding a vibrant and refined dimension. The base notes of whipped cream, marshmallow, cotton candy, Turkish delight accord, cocoa, cedarwood, sandalwood, and tonka bean bring a deeper and sensual complexity, making the scent irresistibly attractive.' -Brand info.

perfumes_data.name: Love for Sale Francesca Bianchi for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Love for Sale by Francesca Bianchi is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women and men. Love for Sale was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Francesca Bianchi. Top notes are Red Berries and Aldehydes; middle notes are Peach, Iris, Violet and Rose; base notes are Leather, Oakmoss, Cotton Candy, Vanilla, Vetiver and Heliotrope.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Love for Sale is a limited edition created as an expression of gratitude for the invaluable support from Francesca Bianchi's friends and partners.
"Love For Sale has a very special genesis. Some time ago, I crafted a unique piece of fragrance for a dear friend and artist, Sands Murray-Wassink. He won a prestigious award (Jeanne Oosting Prijs) and I gave him this exceptional experiment on the day of the award ceremony. I designed a special packaging for it, stealing my daughter’s glue and glitter to craft it. I know he likes kitsch – I do too. I called it I am not for sale, as a tribute to his artistic integrity. For the fragrance, I used my The Lover’s Tale as base, infused with a rose accord. I was aware that my friend had a particular fondness for that perfume of mine, and I wanted to make him feel special." - Francesca Bianchi.
Aldehydes, Red Berries
Peach, Violet, Rose, Iris
Leather, oakmoss, vetiver, heliotropin, cotton candy, vanilla
Only 800 pieces have been made. Available as a 30ml Extrait de Parfum.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Lost In Paris by Roja Parfums is a gourmand fragrance that captures the essence of Parisian high society. This perfume blends rich and sumptuous raw materials, creating a luxurious gourmand accord. The scent features notes of caramelized oranges, butter, brown sugar, rum, vanilla bourbon, and ambergris.

perfumes_data.name: Lovers Fragrance Du Bois for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Lovers by Fragrance Du Bois is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Lovers was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Shadi Samra. Top notes are Passionfruit, Plum, Ginger and Bergamot; middle notes are Rose, Saffron and Jasmine; base notes are Patchouli, Cashmere Wood, Cedarwood, Sandalwood and Vetiver.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Crafted for Lovers, this aromatic aphrodisiac reflects the unadulterated bliss of romantic interludes and shared pleasure. Passion fruit penetrates the pause, colluding with juicy plum and fiery ginger before acclimatising into an intimate clinch of jasmine and saffron. Classic rose caresses the skin, leaving the faintest fragrant trace of its fragile petals behind. Temperatures soar as cashmeran woods and milky sandalwood envelop in their embrace. Reassuringly sensual, gratifyingly decadent - a softly seductive and potent warm woody fragrance that settles on the skin like the golden glow of new unions.

perfumes_data.name: Jany Sora Dora for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Jany by Sora Dora is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Jany was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Margaux Le Paih Guérin.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Once upon a time... A middle summer garden afternoun. The calm of a sunny nap. And the children’s snack. Jany. She’s getting busy in the kitchen, between sugar and flour. What she loves to prepare, above all other delicacies, is tarte tatin. The butter melts on the glass. She drops grains of brown sugar into it, in the silence of a fine, icy rain. Its scent swirls around the room, echoes to the veranda, travels to the path. Baked apples and cinnamon sticks fade into the exhalations of puff pastry. Then come caramel, almonds and vanilla, powerful aromas that linger into the evening.
Antoine’s daughter, Jany carries the fragrance of his recipes, cakes, madeleines and cookies. An original childhood pastry, Jany delivers the aromatic memories of all our unforgettable delicacies. Here’s to your emotions.

perfumes_data.name: In Extremis Astrophil & Stella for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: In Extremis by Astrophil & Stella is a Leather fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. In Extremis was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Giuseppe Imprezzabile. Top notes are Birch, Galbanum, Chamomile, Angelica and Mastic or Lentisque; middle notes are Incense, Musk, Osmanthus and Magnolia; base notes are Leather, Oud, Guaiac Wood, Ambergris, Vetiver, Patchouli and Oakmoss.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
In the midst of darkness that dances with light, a fragrancecaptures the essence of a genius who challenged his Time,turning contrasts and passions into eternal masterpieces.
IN EXTREMIS is dedicated to Caravaggio, observer of humanity, imperfect Master. A tribute to his art, a journey that delves into the depths ofexpression. For those who live passionately, embracingcontrast as a source of inspiration.
Our love for Caravaggio pays homage to his revolutionaryart, his restless spirit, and his ability to transform thecanvas into a mirror of the soul. A genius that transcendstime, an artist who has left an indelible mark on the heartsof those, like us, who find continual inspiration in his work.
This perfume is an invitation to travel beyond the bounda–ries of the known, to explore the depths of the humanspirit, to live every moment with fierce passion..

perfumes_data.name: Stupefacente Bruno Perrucci Parfums for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Stupefacente by Bruno Perrucci Parfums is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Stupefacente was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Bruno Perrucci. Top notes are Flowers, Anise, Orange and Cognac; middle notes are Lily of the Valley, Flowers, Lavender, Green Tea, Geranium and Rose; base notes are Gray Musk, Vetiver, Patchouli, Amber, Myrrh and Vanilla.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Stupefacente (Astonishing) is the fusion between a fougère base and an accord of narcotic flowers with orange peel and cognac.
The basic idea is: to merge two worlds I love, fougère and narcotic, to give life to a new smell and make it unisex.
The name is an alternative to the more overused “narcotic”, and I liked its duality of meaning: You realize that it's narcotic, so you expect it to surprise you.

The Blooming collection is an ode to the most celebrated flowers in the world of perfumery. Irresistible Iris pays homage to the velvety touch of the iris flower, enhanced by spicy and woody notes. The warm notes of vetiver and tonka bean, added at the top of the fragrance, create a deeply elegant and versatile scent that can be worn at any time of day.

Olfactory family: Woody Spicy. Olfactive notes: vetiver, cardamom, tonka bean, orris.

perfumes_data.name: Ocean Eyes Who is Elijah for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Ocean Eyes by Who is Elijah is a Aromatic Aquatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Ocean Eyes was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Raquel Bouris.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
WHO IS ELIJAH is thrilled to announce the launch of their latest olfactory masterpiece, "OCEAN EYES," a unisex fragrance designed to captivate the senses and transport individuals to the depths of the crisp, blue ocean. OCEAN EYES is set to make waves in the fragrance industry, embodying a unique blend of citrusy, salty, and fresh notes that evoke the sensation of a deep plunge into the invigorating depths.
Unveiling a harmonious fusion of grapefruit and mandarin orange, OCEAN EYES opens with a burst of brightness, enlightening the senses with an exhilarating citrus symphony. The addition of Sea Salt and Juniper encapsulates the essence of a refreshing oceanic experience, stimulating the energy that courses through the body. As the fragrance unfolds, lingering notes of musk and amberwood provide a gentle warmth, akin to the caress of the sun on the skin during moments lost in the deep blue eyes of the ocean.
“I love the ocean, and I love the feeling of home – both have always been so intertwined to me growing up and living in the coastal town of Cronulla, Sydney, my whole life”, said Raquel Bouris, Founder & Creative Director. “My Dad has always asked me for a fragrance that was more his type of scent (less wood heavy), and OCEAN EYES pays tribute to and is inspired by both my home and my Dad.”

perfumes_data.name: Ajwad Pink to Pink Lattafa Perfumes for women and men

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Guided by the sharpness of its namesake mathematical formula, rule of 72 combines the muted elegance of saffron and geranium with vigorous natural Thai oud and creamy guaiac wood. Leather notes, along with vetiver and pachouli, whisper confidence rather than scream it — for a scent as resolute as it is ambitious.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Coral Blush by Maison Alhambra is a unisex fragrance from the oriental fruity family. It combines the delicate sweetness of fruit with deep and enveloping notes. perfumes_data.name: ARC Mallo for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: ARC by Mallo is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. ARC was launched in 2023. ARC was created by Antonio Lasheras and Rajesh Balkrishnan. Top notes are Pine Tree, Rosemary, Thyme and Basil; middle notes are Lavender and Jasmine Sambac; base notes are Siam Benzoin, Styrax, Oakmoss and Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: ARC represents a confluence of Eastern and Western natural perfumery. Perfumers Antonio Lasheras and Rajesh Balkrishnan combine rare to obtain natural absolutes and create a fantastical mythical flowering plant that is fully contained in the bottled juice only as a unique fougere. Calming and spiritual, ARC takes its wearers to distant mountainous places where wild herbs and flowers caress the lofty pines.

perfumes_data.name: Dom Pour Homme Flora Pura for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Dom Pour Homme by Flora Pura is a Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Dom Pour Homme was launched in 2024. Top notes are Sicilian Bergamot, Pepper and Rosemary; middle notes are Neroli and Rosemary; base notes are Vetiver and Tonka Bean.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: It is a classic, bold and energetic combination. Its opening notes feature the elegance of Italian bergamot with a vibrant touch of pepper and rosemary. In its heart we find refined notes of Neroli and Rosemary, which provide elegance and class. Finally, the powerful and sophisticated combination marked by notes of Vetiver and Tonka Bean, which make this fragrance suitable for all occasions.

perfumes_data.name: Skydive Gallagher Fragrances for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Skydive by Gallagher Fragrances is a Floral Aquatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Skydive was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Daniel Gallagher.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: As Skydive develops, a hint of Pink Sugar sweetens the air, echoing the pleasure of sipping your favorite refreshing drink while gazing at the endless horizon. An enduring Sea Mist blends with the earthy notes of Vetiver, enveloping you in a fresh, verdant embrace that grounds your senses. Inspired by relaxing afternoons spent outdoors as hummingbirds dart and butterflies flit among the wildflowers, Skydive is a sensorial journey through beautiful spring days, where the sky stretches limitlessly, and the comforting warmth of sun is ever-present.

perfumes_data.name: Soho Superz. for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Soho by Superz. is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Soho was launched in 2024.

perfumes_data.name: Pur Santal Louis Vuitton for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Pur Santal by Louis Vuitton is a Woody Floral Musk fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Pur Santal was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Jacques Cavallier Belletrud.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
With Pure Perfumes, Louis Vuitton imagines a way of personalizing one's fragrance signature with a gesture of absolute refinement. Inspired by the tradition of layering several fragrances, these intense compositions can be used as a finishing touch to your perfume ritual. Woven from exceptional essences and concentrated to the extreme, they celebrate the raw beauty of legendary ingredients in perfumery.

Sacred in many cultures, sandalwood is a key ingredient in the perfumer's palette: powerful yet delicate, its creamy, velvety scent can evoke that of the skin itself. Fascinated by its rare sophistication, Jacques Cavallier Belletrud elevates it majestically in Pur Santal, which combines an extraordinary Sri Lankan essence with two ethereal, musky floral notes endowed with exceptional diffusion. In their radiant presence, sandalwood reveals the incomparable elegance of its character.

perfumes_data.name: Mojave Ghost Absolu Byredo for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Mojave Ghost Absolu by Byredo is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Mojave Ghost Absolu was launched in 2024. Top notes are Sapodilla and Ambrette; middle notes are Magnolia, Sandalwood and Violet; base notes are Amber, Musk and Cedarwood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Sandalwood, familiar ingredients are extracted in a higher concentration to create a longer-lasting scent with profound depths. 

The celebration of artisanship is visualised through a new perfume bottle which features a striking textural cap, inspired by traditional woodwork. Opening to reveal an atomizer spray engineered with more industrial leanings, considered juxtapositions craft a study in contrasts – a rarefied reinterpretation that stays true to the original signature.

perfumes_data.name: Pompelmo Laboratorio Olfattivo for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Pompelmo by Laboratorio Olfattivo is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Pompelmo was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Jean-Claude Ellena.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
“Pompelmo has taken my olfactory journey inspired to Italian Citruses to the end.
Born in Asia, where considered a sacred fruit to be offered to Gods, Grapefruit, as most citrus fruits, first appeared in Spain, in Seville, around the XII-XIII century during the Arab domination.
Probably, one of the greatest citruses, I particularly appreciate Grapefruit for its bitter flavour.
Unlike sweet scents which I find to be obvious and uninspiring, bitter represents, in my opinion, one of the brightest scents. This may be the result of my Italian background, where several beverages celebrate bitterness.
To make Pompelmo a unique and different fragrance, I have worked on both the lively and sour freshness of Grapefruit, while stressing its bitter scent.” Jean-Claude Ellena

perfumes_data.name: Ilhabela Le Couvent Maison de Parfum for women and men

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Ilhabela by Le Couvent is a fragrance featuring notes of Black Vanilla and Ambroxan. Inspired by the paradisiacal island off the Brazilian coast, this perfume captures the enchanting scents of spices and vanilla found within its lush jungle.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Kopi Luwak by Fragrance World invites you into a world of opulence and mysterious aromas. Freshly roasted coffee beans wake you up, the heart hides an unexpected floral secret with delicate rose, and the base notes reveal the true magic of the Orient with oud, cistus, and patchouli.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Monolith is directly inspired by peat, a material used in the production of certain malt whiskies. It presents a resolutely fumy profile with a nuanced and articulate development and fade. This limited release fragrance, with only 180 bottles available, is known for its divisive and challenging nature.
This fragrance was originally released as Psychoterratica III.

perfumes_data.name: Jest Andrea Maack for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Jest by Andrea Maack is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Jest was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Julien Rasquinet. Top notes are Apple, Plum and Cardamom; middle notes are Rum, Chocolate and Heliotrope; base notes are Vanilla, Musk and Ambroxan.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Artist Andrea Maack launches Jest in March 2024.
"JEST is that happy state that carries us into the moment where the soft, warm spring seems right around the corner. Along this exhilarating path of exploration, the sweetness of the plum and apple soon gives way to the feverish power of the Rhum and chocolate. An experience of all senses that the smooth vanilla and the wild musk enrich with their earthy envelope."
Created by perfumer Julien Rasquinet, this 'sweet boozy' fragrance also features cardamom, heliotrope, and ambroxan notes.
Available in a 50 ml Extrait de Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: A Parfum Ann Demeulemeester for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: A Parfum by Ann Demeulemeester is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. A Parfum was launched in 2023. Top notes are Cloves, Calabrian bergamot, Ceylon Cinnamon, Cumin and Sicilian Lemon; middle notes are Leather, May Rose, Birch Tar and Jasmine; base notes are Patchouli, Sandalwood, Vetiver and Palisander Rosewood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
The elemental fragrance of Ann Demeulemeester centres around the cypher A, the designer’s initial and the first letter of the alphabet. A symbol founded in core and constancy, it is employed to signify the essence of an expression: a visual and emotional language distilled into a singular genderless parfum.

Crafted personally by Ann Demeulemeester through a lifelong instinctive study of notes and associations, the fragrance transmits the poetic purity and structural serenity of the designer’s enduring oeuvre. It is a unique and intriguing composition embodied by the primordial and mysterious obscurities of nature.

Created from instinct, it is a beguiling fragrance refined from ingredients in their rarest, purest form. This perfume was created from essential oils derived from the cold pressing of the finest quality of natural, raw materials.

perfumes_data.name: Madawi Gold Edition Arabian Oud for women and men

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Madawi Gold Edition is a luxurious unisex fragrance released to mark the 40th year anniversary of Arabian Oud. It features a sumptuous design and a vibrant, graceful scent. The fragrance combines fruity-floral notes with hints of tonka and patchouli, topped with a tasteful vanilla nuance, offering a perfect balance of freshness and gourmand flavors.

perfumes_data.name: SoBold Intense Pepe Jeans London for men

perfumes_data.detailed_description: SoBold Intense takes flight with a fresh and airy opening, blending aldehydes with citric notes. The fragrance incorporates leather into its elegant lavender heart for immediate seduction and tenacity. Strong and virile, yet it evolves into a comforting sensation, with tonka notes and a harmonious amber, culminating in a delicate musk finish. A fragrance that seduces for its strength as well as its sensitivity, shattering the codes of masculine sensuality .

perfumes_data.name: Infinite Blue for Him Oriflame for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Infinite Blue for Him by Oriflame is a Aromatic Aquatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Infinite Blue for Him was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Clement Gavarry. Top notes are Rosemary, Lavender and Nutmeg; middle notes are Eucalyptus, Sea Notes and Citrus; base notes are Patchouli, Amber and Cedarwood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Infinite Blue for Him by Oriflame is a fragrance that captures the essence of the deep sea. Created by perfumer Clement Gavarry, this scent features a blend of aromatic and woody notes, designed to evoke a sense of vast oceanic expanses.

perfumes_data.name: Weon Spiritica for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Weon by Spiritica is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Weon was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Daniele Muratori Caputo. Top notes are Pisco Sour cocktal and Coca; middle notes are Ice cream, Mint, Milk, Vanilla and Copahu Balm; base notes are Ozonic notes, Sea Salt, Metallic notes and Earthy Notes.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
We are in the Valley of the Moon, a ghostly, mystical and unusual landscape in northern Chile.
The warmth of the red earth blends with the alcoholic reminiscence of the Pisco sour (a typical South American cocktail) and the bitter notes of coca leaves (a plant that is legally and habitually used by the native populations to
make up for the lack of energy due to the high altitude of the Andean plateau).
Numerous paranormal phenomena of the most disparate nature occur here. WEON, an ancient word coming from the Indian language, and widely used throughout Chile: its primary meaning is that of "friendship". A bit like saying
"compà" in southern Italy.

Weon is a hymn to the spiritual mysteries of a memorable place that can generate very strong internal shocks.
The subsoil of the Atacama desert is rich in lithium, a mineral used in drugs that stabilize mood. In the sky of this red desert, it is common to observe lights and strange shapes moving quickly in space. A specific area of this desert has been used to listen to the "sounds of the universe" through numerous receptive phono dishes, the purpose of which is to go in search of the primordial sound of the bigbang, or perhaps, who knows what other unknown mysteries.

perfumes_data.name: Oud for Greatness Hair Perfume Initio Parfums Prives for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Oud for Greatness Hair Perfume by Initio Parfums Prives is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Oud for Greatness Hair Perfume was launched in 2024.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Oud for Greatness Hair Perfume by Initio Parfums Prives, released in 2024, is classified as a unisex fragrance and belongs to the woody and oriental families. The composition includes notes of lavender, musk, patchouli, saffron, and oud.

perfumes_data.name: Take me to Church Toskovat' for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Take me to Church by Toskovat' is a Aromatic Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Take me to Church was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is David-Lev Jipa-Slivinschi. Top notes are Elemi resin, Dust, Black Pepper, Aldehydes, Solar Notes, Pink Pepper, Saffron and Cloves; middle notes are elemi, Pepper, Olibanum, Frankincense, Candle Wax, Myrrh, Resin, Flowers, Leather, Cedar and Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha; base notes are Stone, Tar, Ambrette, Guaiac Wood, Musk and Sandalwood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
This is a story of grief, luck and grind. Everything is a part of me and my message can be perceived by all senses that touch your soul: visual, tactile, flagrant and musical.
The story of the name is a mystery that you can read only on the back of the label, through the oil. My grandma’s passing had a strong impact on me, as a 7 year old boy and the feeling of grief inspired me to create this perfume.
The smell of incense and summer flowers that are slowly drying in the sun are remembered in the fragrance.
The leather label represents the pain that I endured and overcame, becoming stronger every day.
The peppercorn smell compliments the aroma well and 7 of them can be found in the bottle as my lucky number is 7. The motto is placed casually on the front of the bottle but delivers the strongest message: God is everywhere and I believe in Him.

The box has been packed with the same attention to detail that characterize the product, containing 6 hand made postcards. Each image was crafted by my tattoo artist and is imprinted in my skin.
You can also find my favorite playlist to fully immerse you in the experience.

perfumes_data.name: Montabaco Cuba Ormonde Jayne for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Montabaco Cuba by Ormonde Jayne is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Montabaco Cuba was launched in 2024. Top notes are Bergamot, Orange, Freesia, Mandarin Orange and Juniper; middle notes are Dry Wood, Tea, Magnolia and Jasmine; base notes are Tobacco Leaf, Tonka, Iso E Super, Ambergris, Suede, Sandalwood and Vanilla Absolute.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Originally inspired by Selfridges with its vibrant innovation and international appeal, Montabaco Cuba captures the essence of Latin America with a gourmand twist of mandarin. Infusing notes of bergamot, magnolia and jasmine bedded down with sandalwood and vanilla absolute allowing Cuba to be a standout scent that’s not to be missed.

perfumes_data.name: Triumphant The Dua Brand for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Triumphant by The Dua Brand is a Leather fragrance for men. Triumphant was launched in 2023.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Triumphant by The Dua Brand is an exquisite fragrance crafted by the same renowned nose who brought us iconic scents like Davidoff's Cool Water and Creed's Green Irish Tweed. This fragrance pays homage to the timeless Kouros by Yves Saint Laurent, a statuesque release from 1981 that continues to captivate fragrance enthusiasts today. Although there have been reformulations over the years, resulting in decreased performance, at The Dua Brand, we ensure that every fragrance we release showcases our traditional strength. Triumphant, our inspired expression of this aromatic fougére fragrance, outperforms the original with its opening of bright aldehydes and smooth coriander. Its heart of aromatic carnation and artemisia exudes class and sophistication, while base notes of oakmoss and leather evoke the greatness that characterized perfumes in the 1980s. With Triumphant, you will feel elevated to victorious heights, encompassing pride and dignity.
Key Notes: Aldehydes, Coriander, Clary Sage, Artemisia, Bergamot, Patchouli, Carnation, Vetiver, Cinnamon, Geranium, Jasmine, Orris Root, Civet, Honey, Leather, Musk, Oakmoss, Oriental, Tonka Bean, Vanilla. Triumphant belongs to the olfactory group of Aromatic Fougére fragrances.

perfumes_data.name: Untamable Imaginary Authors for women and men

The nose behind this fragrance is Josh Meyer. Top notes are Leather, Cumin and Tonka; middle notes are Cactus Flower and Floral Notes; base note is Animal notes.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Imaginary Authors Untamable is a new fragrance for women and men launched in 2024. This unisex fragrance boasts a precious, wild blend of a spicy, resinous duo of pungent leather saddle and warm tonka resin, heightened by fragrant Texas yellow star, and the sweet, melon-like aroma of saguaro blossom. Tumbleweeds add a fresh herbaceous, green aroma contrasting with the spiciness of cumin and the animalic vibe of paso fino.

This unisex fragrance features a blend of Australian sandalwood, Ceylon cinnamon, frankincense, Madagascan ylang-ylang, musk, oud, Tahitian vanilla, and tobacco. perfumes_data.detailed_description:
"Set off for Ithaca, that mythical island in the Ionian Sea, home to the epic tale of Ulysses and Penelope. An island of encounters at the heart of the archipelago, where the strength of cedar, vivacity of bergamot and sweetness of blackcurrant come together as one.
About the flacon: The plate of Ithaque is inspired by a typical life scenery from ancient Greece, where nature is blooming at every corner."
Available as 75 ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: Tag Him Uomo Rosso Armaf for men

perfumes_data.name: Eudora H Flow Eudora for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Eudora H Flow by Eudora is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Eudora H Flow was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Tamara Mannina. Top notes are Watery Notes, Pink Pepper and Bergamot; middle notes are Salt, Sage, Vetiver and Sea Notes; base notes are Musk, Patchouli and Amber.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
If you, like Eudora H, believe that life is too short to be lived on autopilot, get ready for a fragrance that invites you to relive experiences.
Eudora H Flow brings an explosion of freshness with personality, ideal for those who seek to live new adventures at every moment.
Inspired by the waves of the sea and their movement, its watery fougère notes invite you to relive the feeling of freedom equal to a dive in the sea.
The Eudora H Flow fragrance has an initial explosion of bergamot, with the exclusive Sea Salt accord: a fusion of the mineral notes of sea salt with the aromatic rosemary, which combined with the watery notes bring an intensified freshness. Finally, patchouli, musk and amber bring contrast and comfort to the fragrance.
Olfactory Family: Watery Fougère

perfumes_data.name: Eternal Touch Maison Alhambra for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Eternal Touch by Maison Alhambra is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Eternal Touch was launched in 2024. Top notes are Tobacco Leaf and Spicy Notes; middle notes are Vanilla, Cocoa, Tobacco Blossom and Tonka Bean; base notes are Dried Fruits and Woody Notes.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Eternal Touch by Maison Alhambra is a rich and seductive unisex fragrance from the oriental family. It opens with an intriguing mix of tobacco leaf and spices, creating a warm and inviting olfactory experience. The heart of the fragrance features a delicious accord of vanilla, cocoa, tonka bean, and tobacco flower, enriching the scent with velvety sweetness and spicy warmth. The base notes of dried fruits and precious woods add a sophisticated depth, with a robust and persistent base that lingers on the skin for hours. This fragrance is suitable for men and women looking for a balance between sweetness and intensity, ideal for any occasion.

perfumes_data.name: Avant Garde Riiffs Perfumes for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Avant Garde by Riiffs Perfumes is a Floral fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Avant Garde was launched in 2023. Top notes are Citrus and Bergamot; middle notes are Cardamom and Jasmine; base notes are Amber, Musk and Vanilla.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Avant Garde by Riiffs is a fragrance that transcends the ordinary, crafted for those who seek a unique scent experience. It opens with invigorating top notes of zesty bergamot and vibrant citrus accords. The heart reveals exotic florals and captivating spices, with jasmine petals and spicy cardamom adding depth. The base notes include warm amber, velvety musk, and smoky vanilla, leaving a lasting impression. The sleek and modern bottle design reflects the avant-garde nature of the fragrance.

perfumes_data.name: Ocean Blue Zara for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Ocean Blue by Zara is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Ocean Blue was launched in 2024.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Ocean Blue by Zara is a new fragrance for men, released in 2024. It is part of the 'Ocean Selection' collection and features a blend of aromatic notes, cinnamon, lavender, resins, vanilla, and woods.

perfumes_data.name: Thermae Imperiali Floridia Parfum for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Thermae Imperiali by Floridia Parfum is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Thermae Imperiali was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Giovanni Festa. Top notes are Cardamom and Rose; middle notes are Cedar, Sandalwood, Tonka Bean and Labdanum; base notes are Olibanum Sacra Resin Green, Ambrette and Musk.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Floridia leads us to the ancient thermal baths of Baia, with precious marble tubs, precious mosaics and regenerating waters to make us relive thousand-year-old purification rituals. The fragrance opens its curtain between the spicy notes of cardamom and the queen of flowers of the Roman Empire: the Gallic rose. In the heart, the presence of archaic essences such as cistus and resins fade into the sweetness of tonka bean. At the end of the olfactory journey we find a veil of eucalyptus, pungent enough and lively musky notes.
The perfume evokes the favorite places of those who want to relax the mind and remove stress.

perfumes_data.name: Malbec Elegant O Boticário for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Malbec Elegant by O Boticário is a Woody Floral Musk fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Malbec Elegant was launched in 2023. Malbec Elegant was created by Christophe Raynaud and Hernan Fígoli. Top notes are Mandarin Orange, Juniper and Pepper; middle notes are Floral Notes, Woody Notes and Geranium; base notes are Light Amber, Akigalawood and Cedar.

perfumes_data.name: Occident' 90 - Expat Potion Adi Ale Van for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Occident' 90 - Expat Potion by Adi Ale Van is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Occident' 90 - Expat Potion was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Jimmy Bodin. Top notes are Blood Orange, Rum, Bitter Orange and Raspberry; middle notes are Cedar and Vanilla; base notes are Saffron, Musk and Patchouli.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Occident' 90 is inspired by the early 1990s, when most Romanians dreamed of leaving the Country for a better life in the West. Many of them left everything behind in order to try to send to their families all that they had laboriously collected in those foreign lands, but many feel homesick and homesick for their native places. The design of this perfume, as of the entire Mirrors of time collection, is based on my childhood in my grandparents' house in the country, where on the walls hung some old mirrors made by my great-grandfather Tica Vanu, which I reinterpreted. Each mirror is like a time machine, looking in it you will go back in time and it makes you think, how many other generations before you have looked in it, which you only got to know from stories.
Nose: Jimmy Bodin
Artistic vision, story & craft: Adi ale Van.
Concentration – extrait de parfum 27%
Each piece is hand made and unique in Romania, like all Adi ale Van products.
Any imperfection is the proof of artisanal work.
Adi ale Van supports finding, preserving and promoting old Romanian musical traditions and long-forgotten Romanian crafts from rural areas.

perfumes_data.name: Fire of God Alexandria Fragrances for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Fire of God by Alexandria Fragrances is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Fire of God was launched in 2023. Top notes are Mango, Red Berries, Ginger and Lemon; middle notes are Coumarin and Jasmine; base notes are Oud, Amber, Musk and Woody Notes.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Fire of God is a luxurious fragrance that captures the transformative power of flame and light, inspired by the mythical Aztec deity of fire and illumination, Xiuhtecuhtli. The scent opens with sun-kissed mango, zesty lemon, and playful rosy berries, complemented by a touch of invigorating ginger. As it evolves, azure coumarin and jasmine add a mysterious and sensual bloom, while aged woods provide a grounding presence. The core features rich oud, intertwined with earthy nagarmotha and soft musk, enhanced by warm golden amber.

perfumes_data.name: Mocha Wood Fragrance World for women and men

perfumes_data.name: Erba Pura Le Prestige for women and men

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Erba Pura, a limited edition fragrance released in celebration of National Day, is a captivating amber scent designed for both women and men. This unisex perfume, presented in a 50ml Eau de Parfum, is a versatile option suitable for all occasions and times.
The fragrance opens with a vibrant combination of Sicilian Orange, Calabrian Bergamot, and Sicilian Lemon, offering a refreshing and invigorating top note experience. In the heart of the fragrance, a delightful fusion of fruits emerges, adding a touch of liveliness and allure.
The base notes of White Musk, Madagascar Vanilla, and Oriental create a warm and inviting foundation. These elements infuse the fragrance with depth, sensuality, and a captivating aura.
Erba Pura is a unique and alluring fragrance that leaves a lasting impression. Experience the harmonious blend of notes in this limited edition scent, and let it enhance your presence with its fascinating allure.

perfumes_data.name: Unique House of Iyrah for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Unique by House of Iyrah is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Unique was launched in 2023.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Indulge in the unique fragrance of our perfume oil that captures the perfect blend of sweet and sensual notes. With the perfect combination of rose, lemon, peach, vanilla, and honeysuckle, this perfume oil is sure to turn heads wherever you go. The base notes of musk, floral notes, amber, and resins provide a long-lasting and seductive aroma that will leave you feeling confident and alluring. Our perfume oil is perfect for any occasion, whether you're heading out for a romantic evening or just want to add a touch of luxury to your everyday routine. Try it out today and experience the magic for yourself

perfumes_data.name: PositaniSSimo Ricardo Ramos Perfumes de Autor for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: PositaniSSimo by Ricardo Ramos Perfumes de Autor is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. PositaniSSimo was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Jorge Lee. Top notes are Lemon, Bergamot, Mandarin Orange and Grapefruit; middle notes are Neroli, Jasmine, Patchouli and Atlas Cedar; base notes are Seagrass, Ambergris, Dry Wood and Musk.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: "This perfume is an olfactory ode that seeks to represent the characteristically relaxed glamor of the charming city of Positano (Italy) during spring/summer, where the sea breeze invites the “Dolce Far Niente" and coincides with the season of its famous lemons. PositaniSSimo is refreshing and clean, with a classic, effortless chic aesthetic and a rebellious spirit, reminiscent of traditional Mediterranean citrus fragrances, but on this occasion, an accent of both the sea and mountains together marks its vital and dynamic character." -Brand website.

perfumes_data.name: Ralph's Club Eau de Toilette Ralph Lauren for men

Ralph's Club Eau de Toilette is described as an effortlessly refined and incredibly fresh blend. The scent bursts open with fruity and vibrant notes of grapefruit, balanced with rich lavandin and clary sage that reveal an exceptionally polished aromatic core. The sparkling top notes give way to the elegant essence of geranium, bringing a floral air to the scent. To further enhance its composition, the fragrance uncovers a perfect balance of opulent woods refined by the delicacy of musks for an added intimacy, embracing the spirit of elegance and sophistication.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Poivre Rubis is an invitation to a sensory journey where the exoticism of Timut pepper and the tangy sweetness of raspberry blend together. From the very opening, bergamot and black pepper awaken the senses, revealing a vibrant heart of Sichuan pepper and pink berries while a fresh and juicy raspberry accord unveils its character and almost ingenuous sweetness. The base, lightly woody with notes of olibanum incense and cashmere, establishes a velvety and captivating depth. Poivre Rubis is a fragrance that celebrates the art of blending spices and berries, offering an explosion of piquancy and sensuality.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Discover Bois Pacifique, a spicy woody fragrance that embraces earthy woods and invigorating spices. Notes of silvery pink cardamom, fresh saffron and akigalawood™ warm the resin of fiery frankincense.
The vitality of incredibly strong and multifaceted woods – cedar, oak and sandalwood – is rooted in rich notes of amber and vanilla. Bois Pacifique is a journey to a sense of infinite freedom and vitality. The essence of cardamom is reminiscent of a sun-kissed glow. The exquisite akigalawood™ highlights fresh and aromatic notes of saffron in a blend of wood and spices that instantly evoke a fresh sensuality. As the scent of the perfume blends with the soft, calming and rich aroma of frankincense essence and orris butter, you will lose yourself in the majesty of nature. Edges of sandalwood, cedar and oak form the Bois Pacifique forest, a forest of impressive majesty illuminated by inspiring rays of sunlight radiating from the auspicious horizon.
Fragrance notes: Turmeric essence, Sandalwood essence, Oak absolute, Akigalawood™, Cardamom essence, Frankincense essence.

perfumes_data.name: Incenso Notturno Extrait de Parfum Lorenzo Pazzaglia for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Incenso Notturno Extrait de Parfum by Lorenzo Pazzaglia is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Incenso Notturno Extrait de Parfum was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Lorenzo Pazzaglia. Top notes are White Pepper, Elemi resin, Lemon Peel and Bergamot; middle notes are Agarwood, Oud, Black Pepper, Patchouli, Nutmeg, Damask Rose and Cinnamon; base notes are Incense, Ambergris, Sandal, Musk, Vanilla and Cedar.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Lorenzo Pazzaglia x House of Merlo: Incenso Notturno perfume is an olfactory sacred, the most sublime fragrance in the artist's achievements to date, filled with an electrifying aura of mystery. Anyone who got to know House of Merlo a little better quickly noticed our fascination with mysticism and everything mysterious. It will therefore come as no surprise that the result of this unique Polish-Italian cooperation is an incredibly enigmatic scent, thoroughly incense-like, completely enveloped in wisps of thick smoke.
From the House of Merlo diary: “The dreamlike opening looms like a dreamy priest just after dusk, looking at the smoking elemi resin in which fragments of refreshing bergamot and lemon peel have congealed. The first aromas announcing the beginning of the ancient ritual quickly gain intensity when freshly ground pepper enters the censer, first a slightly more subtle, white variety, and then giving space to a much more wild and untamed black variety. The all-encompassing darkness encourages you to look towards the infinite universe, from the depths of which the ancient starlight illuminates the gray ribbons rising towards them, emerging from the glowing noble agarwood resin covered with damask rose petals, intricately combined with patchouli, cinnamon, and nutmeg. Just before dawn, when the night becomes darkest and everything around is pitch black, powerful, dark Frankish incense supports the ceremonial vigil. Arranged on cedar and sandalwood, wrapped in vanilla, sensual amber, and seductive musk, it recalls ancient times when man discovered fire and simultaneously experienced the extraordinary phenomenon of escaping smoke. Since the dawn of time, we have associated it with divinity, spirituality, and energy, and by observing it we believe that man is part of something bigger, not only the universe perceived through the senses. We are no longer surprised that in most parts of the world, the rite of incensation has become part of the most important ceremonies and rituals. The synergy of these completely spectacular essences brings scent-provoking metaphysical experiences, for all initiated hearts who have always "see more", but also for open minds who dare to break conventions and constantly look for answers hidden in the universe.
Top note
white pepper, elemi resin, lemon peel, bergamot
Heart note
black pepper, patchouli, oud (agarwood), cinnamon, nutmeg, damask rose
Base note
incense, cedar tree, sandal tree, vanilla, ambergris, musk

Incenso Notturno Extrait de Parfum is exlusive for House Of Merlo Perfumeria Niszova store, as 50ml Extrait de Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: The Heart of Leo Gucci for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: The Heart of Leo by Gucci is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. The Heart of Leo was launched in 2024. Top note is Black Currant; middle note is Olibanum; base note is Myrrh.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Gucci’s The Alchemist’s Garden is a Luxury Collection of sophisticated Eau de Parfums, Perfumed Oils, and Acque Profumate inspired by the art of alchemy. Captivated by the star-studded sky, the Gucci alchemist dreams of a new olfactory Gucci fragrance honouring the brightest star from the Lion constellation - Gucci The Heart of Leo. Guided by his brightness, the lion leaps from the sky in search of the world’s most precious ingredients. Knowing that resinous incense brings opulence to those who possess it, the lion jumps to the Arabic peninsula where Olibanum grows. Here, the noble creature encounters the tears of weeping trees, the bark exuding an unexpected, spicy scent that warms his heart. A symphony of balsamic resin traverses continents through golden winds, beckoning the lion to return to his homeland, Africa. As he follows the scent to yet another tree, he encounters the balsamic nectar of myrrh and its liquorice smoky undertones that liberate his soul. To sweeten his journey back to the moon, the lion garlands his mane in a blood-red blackcurrant accord. With the promise of dawn nearing, harmony returns as the lion resumes his position in the sky. Happy with the lion’s fabled journey, the Gucci alchemist carefully encases the fruity, ambery elixir– and its night-sky-inspired story – in a black lacquered bottle. Much like the alchemist's ability to transform all that he touches into newfound wonders, this unisex Gucci fragrance is manufactured using alcohol made from 100% recycled carbon emissions.
Capturing the spirit of nature and distilling it into exquisite elixirs, The Alchemist’s Garden collection is composed of customisable Gucci fragrances intended to be layered together.
Each olfactory creation draws on a hero ingredient that changes and magnifies its character when worn with other Gucci scents.
The beauty of alchemy lies in the transformation: layered aromas that become new expressions of art and unfold the magic of unseen worlds.
The Gucci Heart of Leo unisex Gucci Eau de Parfum offers six recommended layering combinations, each designed to bring out the richness and opulence of its warm facets captured by its golden mane.
Create a warm incense with Gucci The Eyes of The Tiger.
When applied with Gucci The Heart of Leo, the blend of Incense, Myrrh & Oriental captivates with its golden intensity.
Envision a floral tapestry woven with the opulent Damask Rose essence of Gucci A Reason to Love.
Incense, Myrrh & Rose-infused Oud Accord summon sultry depths, revealing a gourmand and floral bouquet of aromas.|Add a touch of sweetness to the Myrrh with Gucci A Chant for the Nymph.
Infuse floral undertones into Incense & Myrrh with the Frangipani accord to create a sweet incense.
Enhance the Gucci fragrance’s rich character with Gucci A Forgotten Rose Perfumed Oil.
A fresh Rose combined with Incense & Myrrh enriches the composition with its symphony of warm and fresh aromas.
Envelop yourself in the magic of the night with Gucci Moonlight Serenade Acqua Profumata.
A Musky Lavender invigorates the ambery blend of Incense & Myrrh, infusing a sense of freshness into the composition.
Unveil the richness of the ambery facets with Gucci A Forgotten Rose Perfumed Oil and Gucci Moonlight Serenade Acqua Profumata.
Rose & Lavender introduce floral hints to the Incense & Myrrh in this ambery aromatic olfactory creation.

perfumes_data.name: Imagine Guerlain by Shourouk Rhaiem Guerlain for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Imagine Guerlain by Shourouk Rhaiem by Guerlain is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Imagine Guerlain by Shourouk Rhaiem was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Thierry Wasser. Top notes are Orange Blossom and Orange; middle note is Benzoin; base note is Sandalwood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Maison Guerlain presents an exclusive, limited-edition Christmas rendezvous: Imagine Guerlain, in collaboration with Shourouk Rhaiem, the renowned French jewelry designer. To celebrate the festive season with sparkle and magic, Shourouk Rhaiem unveils her dazzling, multi-colored world. For the 2024 vintage, the iconic Flacon aux Abeilles is adorned with a radiant jewel—a wearable cuff bracelet that can be worn on the wrist. This exceptional piece encases the Imagine Guerlain Eau de Parfum, an amber-colored nectar with floral and woody notes, perfect for adding a festive touch to the holiday season. This exclusive fragrance is available only on Guerlain.com and in select Guerlain boutiques.
The Imagine Guerlain Eau de Parfum is an extraordinary creation designed to capture the magic of Christmas with grandeur. Luxurious and timeless, it opens with majestic floral notes, highlighted by a hint of zesty orange. As the fragrance develops, it reveals rich, vibrant woody notes, culminating in an intense, magical scent with a warm and sensual composition.
For 170 years, the Flacon aux Abeilles has been a symbol of craftsmanship and artistry. Produced by the glassmaker Pochet du Courval, the bottle is decorated with intricate festoons and golden bees, meticulously enhanced with fine gold detailing. The signature cord, tied by hand by the skilled Dames de Table at the Guerlain Workshops, adds a final touch of elegance. This year, the shimmering jewel envisioned by Shourouk Rhaiem elevates the bottle's design, allowing wearers to take a piece of this exceptional creation with them.
For the first time ever, the iconic Flacon aux Abeilles is adorned with a striking creation that doubles as a wearable accessory. The large cuff, encrusted with sparkling rhinestones, features an imaginary flower at its center, with Guerlain's double G emblem blooming from its heart. The petals of this enchanting flower shimmer in bluish hues, making the jewel an embodiment of festive magic and sparkle.
Shourouk Rhaiem, a jewelry designer who began crafting her first crystal-covered pieces in her Parisian studio over fifteen years ago, draws inspiration from her Tunisian roots, the pop culture of the 1980s, and the glamour of Hollywood films. Her playful and poetic approach to design transforms ordinary objects into extraordinary creations, embellished with a myriad of crystals in various sizes and colors.
This exclusive, limited-edition release consists of 3,310 numbered pieces. Each 125 mL bottle comes with a 30 mL spray and a funnel, allowing you to carry this exceptional fragrance with you wherever you go.
