perfumes_data.detailed_description: A charming slice of paradise can be found at the southernmost tip of Corsica - Sperone. When the land breeze picks up in the evening, the fragrances of the maquis are heightened, and the bushes of labdanum cistus and immortelles release their scents, both lively, warm, and sensual. At this point, one can simply relax and be soothed by the gentle lapping of the waves against the rocks.

perfumes_data.name: Kamikura DI SER for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Kamikura by DI SER is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Kamikura was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Yasuyuki Shinohara.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Kamikura by DI SER is a Clean Citrus Woody and Aromatic fragrance. Kamikura is launched in 2024 as a limited edition celebrating the 20th anniversary of Swedish brand GENTS, specializing in niche perfumes and barber products.
Kamikura is a tribute to spiritual and physical purification, Nordic tradition, and masculine beauty rituals. In Japanese culture, "Kamikura" is a sacred place and a home for gods and spiritual beings. At these sacred sites, purification rituals are held, dances and songs are performed, and offerings are made to Kami, the human's higher state after death. The perfume was created with the intention of bringing hope of happiness, success, and peace, and by spraying the perfume, the place you find yourself in transforms into a sacred Kamikura. Therefore, it is a fragrance that is meditative, spiritual, and calming with a natural minimalism.
Kamikura opens with fresh, crisp citrus notes and balsamic Ezo-pine and Todo-pine (Abies sachalinensis). The heart features hints of aromatic camphor and lavender, along with soapy oakmoss, while the base consists of woody, earthy accords. It is a scent that initially reveals the typical Japanese roots of Di Ser but then evolves into a classic woody perfume with a European touch, as a nod to Swedish nature and the culture of purity.

perfumes_data.name: Overdose Aphrodisiaque Korloff Paris for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Overdose Aphrodisiaque by Korloff Paris is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Overdose Aphrodisiaque was launched in 2023. Top notes are Ambrettolide and Saffron; middle notes are Ylang-Ylang and Incense; base notes are Cashmeran, Ambroxan and Musk.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: This fragrance reaches the height of transgression, defying taboos, claiming freedom. Thirsty for independence, the anti-conformist who wears Overdose Aphrodisiaque is boldly confident. Temptation and impudence fly against the gates of the Garden of Eden, while impertinence and nonchalance urge you to go farther than ever. Driven by a duality of ylang-ylang and saffron, over a mineral base, the fragrance wavers in perpetual tension … At its heart, frankincense pushes back the limits. Meanwhile, in the base notes, moss and ambrox intertwine to further captivate and break the rules. Provocative and daring, its trail delicately whispers all the sins that you dream of committing.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Intense Sandal is the aroma of the earth that refreshes the soul from within. This peppery fragrance blended with a hint of Ceylon cinnamon, sandalwood and white musk accord is a little stronger and stays on for hours. This fragrance is for the bold and beautiful, the more musky, the more intense you are.

Enjoy this breathtaking stroll through time in the fascinating atmosphere of Middle East, Oud Or awakens your senses with its rich warm woody and smoky facets.
A fresh and sparkling start where rose, raspberry and orange blossom blend into a rich and full-bodied heart composed of nuanced notes such as labdanum, saffron, patchouli and geranium. Guaiac Wood, Oud and Cedar Wood mingle with Vanilla in an opulent and elegant base.
Feel the captivating atmosphere that surrounds you, feel the rich history of people who have lived through the centuries and kept the tradition alive. Oud Or is a breathtaking journey back in time, into the fascinating atmosphere of the Middle East.

Erba Gold, a limited edition fragrance released in celebration of National Day, is an alluring amber scent crafted for both women and men. This unisex perfume, presented in a 50ml Eau de Parfum, is a captivating addition to any occasion or time.
The fragrance opens with a burst of Sicilian Orange, Calabrian Bergamot, and Sicilian Lemon, creating a vibrant and refreshing top note combination. As it develops, a delightful blend of fruits emerges, infusing the fragrance with a lively and enticing quality.
In the base, White Musk, Madagascar Vanilla, and Oriental come together, enveloping the senses with a warm and inviting aura. These base notes add depth, sensuality, and a touch of sophistication to the overall composition.
Erba Gold is a fragrance that captivates with its unique blend of notes, leaving a lasting impression wherever you go. Experience the allure of this limited edition scent and embrace its fascinating charm.

perfumes_data.name: Hexensalbe Stora Skuggan for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Hexensalbe by Stora Skuggan is a Aromatic Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Hexensalbe was launched in 2023. Top notes are Licorice and Wormwood; middle notes are Angelica, Rosemary, Belladonna and Tuberose; base notes are Patchouli, Black hemlock or Tsuga and Oakmoss.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Hexensalbe is a dark floral fragrance, rooted in the botanical underworld of witchcraft.
Hexensalbe, also known as witches’ flying ointment, was a hallucinogenic salve used in witchcraft in the middle ages. It was a mixture of extremely poisonous ingredients that produced an ecstatic trance with powerful sensations of flying, images of otherworldly creatures and a primal sexual hunger.
The ointment was so poisonous that eating it would be directly fatal, instead it was applied to other soft membranes of the body, armpits and more commonly the genitals. Because of the erotic effects of the high, the salve would often be rubbed directly onto a phallic object like the end of a staff or a broomstick. And so the popular image of witches riding on broomsticks has survived into our times, even if they rode them in a rather different sense. There are records from the 1200’s and forward where women have been found naked in a delirious trance, pleasuring themselves with the spicy devil’s dildo.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Egypt has always been a unique spot in the world, with trade routes, pharaohs, domination, and prosperity across history.
The Nile was an ever lasting part of the Egyptian Joy and Existense way far from being an ephemera.
Melding the ancient and the modern we used a nocturnal dose of ambergris with a daylight joyful dose of orange blossoms faceted with muguets and blooming citruses,
with courtesy to other ancient civilizations we dosed some ginger for the Chinese souls to portray a universal depiction of the Nile.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Gambit is designed for the modern player, daring and inspiring, with virile energy that takes command and pursues victory from the out-set. A confident and unapologetically fiery scent with distinctive notes of spice tossed with hints of fruity sweetness and wrapped in a soothing warmth. Bursts of fresh geranium linger in a deep haze of lavender before settling into the glowing base notes of sandalwood and amber.
"Gambit delivers a modern masculine boldness, contrasting the soothing, soft floralcy of geranium and lavender against the distinctive spice of clove and cardamom with a hint of patchouli. The warm fruity spice notes melt into a back of sandalwood and Ambrostarradiating with layers of warmth." - Carlos Viñals, Perfumer.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Ribot is named after the famous  British-bred, Italian-trained racehorse (1952-1972). It is the first fragrance of the Emerald collection. Ribot contains hay extract, leather, animalic, woody, and floral notes.

perfumes_data.name: Cherry Cherry Mancera for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Cherry Cherry by Mancera is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Cherry Cherry was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Pierre Montale. Top notes are Black Cherry, Bergamot and Lemon; middle notes are Patchouli, Heliotrope, Orris Root and Jasmine; base notes are Vanilla Pod and White Musk.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Cherry Cherry stands as a refined and modern alternative to other iconic classics in the world of perfumery. While many fragrances captivate with playful femininity and sweet gourmand notes, Cherry Cherry sets itself apart through its intensity and depth. Its composition is richer and more nuanced, offering a complex and enveloping olfactory experience that appeals to those seeking something beyond the ordinary.
Where other perfumes charm with their sweet and floral dominance, Cherry Cherry embraces a more mature and sensual intensity. The cherry note, reimagined as a luxurious liqueur, delivers an addictive richness from the first spray, while floral and musky undertones add layers of depth that evolve beautifully on the skin. This pronounced intensity makes it an ideal choice for those who desire a fragrance that not only allures but also leaves a strong, lasting impression.
Cherry Cherry is a bold statement of modern elegance, meticulously crafted to be an unforgettable fragrance that lingers in memory and transcends time. It is an indispensable addition to the collection of those who appreciate true luxury and sophistication.
Head notes: Black Cherry, Sparkling Bergamot & Lemon from Calabria.
Heart notes: Orris & Lush Jasmine, Sweet Heliotrope, Earthy Patchouli from Sumatra.
Base notes: Vanilla Pods from Madagascar, White Musk

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Inspired by the drawers of the sacristy of the Paris cathedral.
It is the olfactory memory of Philip in Paris, during his visits to the sacristy of the cathedral. The person in charge of the sacristy loves to prepare an ever-changing mixture of incense, according to the numerous anniversaries of the liturgical year.

perfumes_data.name: Defy Parfum Calvin Klein for men

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
"Calvin Klein Fragrances introduces Calvin Klein Defy Parfum as the latest addition to its men’s fragrance portfolio. Following the successful launch of Calvin Klein Defy Eau de Toilette and Calvin Klein Defy Eau de Parfum, this new fragrance continues to celebrate the evolving journey of defiance.
The new fragrance builds on the same woody olfactive profile as its predecessors, creating a more intense scent that defies expectations. Unexpectedly warmer, Calvin Klein Defy Parfum reveals the most powerful facets of the Defy man, while still highlighting his contrasting vulnerability and strength. The fragrance opens with a bright and luminous pink pepper note. At the heart, lavender adds a natural freshness. Responsibly sourced upcycled cocoa shell is the base and star ingredient of the fragrance, adding a rich gourmand depth, while reusing previously discarded cocoa shells."
Available in 200 ml, 100 ml, 50 ml, and 10 ml travel spray.

perfumes_data.name: Authentic Self Man Abercrombie & Fitch for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Authentic Self Man by Abercrombie & Fitch is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Authentic Self Man was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Frank Voelkl. Top notes are Cypress, Ginger and Cardamom; middle notes are Violet Leaf, Freesia and Geranium; base notes are Madagascar Vanilla, Virginia Cedar and Tonka Bean.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
This fragrance is a fougère amber scent that is magnetic and vibrant, designed to encourage individuals to show their authentic selves to the world. The inspiration behind the AUTHENTIC SELF perfume line is to empower people to be confident in their uniqueness and express it boldly.
The fragrance opens with refreshing cardamom, adding depth to the geranium flowers, while the Fève Tonka provides a rich and infinite dimension to the scent. The resulting aroma is invigorating and uplifting, perfect for those looking for a fresh and dynamic fragrance.
According to Frank Voelkl, the Master Perfumer who created this fragrance, it was inspired by the "luminosity of a summer morning" and the energy it brings for new perspectives. The fragrance itself is described as a "revigorating" scent with bold amber accents, and a mix of cardamom and geranium for added depth. The fève tonka note gives the fragrance an "infinite richness".
The AUTHENTIC SELF men's perfume bottle is designed with the brand's signature elegance, featuring a thick and heavy blue glass bottle that is both modern and timeless. The metallic and magnetic cap adds to the sophistication of the design, while the cork-inspired label with the Abercrombie & Fitch logo adds a touch of uniqueness and originality to the overall aesthetic.
The overall message of the Authentic Self fragrance is to encourage people to be themselves without hesitation and to embrace their unique experiences and achievements.
TOP NOTES: Chinese ginger, cypress, Guatemalan cardamom
MIDDLE NOTES: freesia, violet leaf, Egyptian geranium
BASE NOTES: Madagascar vanilla, cedar from Virginia, tonka bean from Brazil.

perfumes_data.name: Tabac du Jour Aromas de Salazar for women and men

The nose behind this fragrance is Michael Salazar. perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Discover the captivating allure of Tabac Du Jour, a sophisticated blend that evokes warmth and depth. At its heart lies rich tobacco absolute, renowned for its lush, earthy aroma that brings a sense of comfort and nostalgia.
Complementing this is the bold essence of Rum C02, which adds a sweet, spirited twist, inviting you to savor the richness of aged oak and caramel notes.
As the fragrance unfolds, the subtle sweetness of dried fruits emerges, enhancing the complexity with hints of sun-ripened figs and apricots. Together, these elements create a harmonious balance, enveloping you in an indulgent, velvety embrace that lingers throughout the day.
Notes:
Top: Blonde Tobacco Abs, Virginian Tobacco Abs, Poplar Buds, Dried Fruits
Heart: Sweet Basil, Turkish Rose, Immortelle Abs
Base: Ambergris Infusion (House Made), Rum C02, Cinnamon C02, Tonka Bean Abs, Bee Propolis Infusion (House Made), Thai Oud (Koh Chang), Castoreum Abs

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Delicate spirits can definitely change the world!

Heroine takes its inspiration from women who overcame adversity, broke through barriers and in doing
so, making the world a better place. Her name can be Frida, Sabiha or Mahsa… The composition built around the strength and energy associated with female empowerment. Sparkling and exotic character describes the duality of being both fragile and predatory.
Opens with a voluptuous bouquet of cognac, a lingering veil of iris represents a preternaturally gifted aura. The harmony of earthy vetiver and creamy sandalwood infused with incense and vanilla extract gives the iris flower a unique powdery texture. Heroine is a powerful yet delicate perfume that is part of the skin to celebrate all the sensuality and confidence concentrates on the dark and mystical side of the iris.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Celebrating 13 years of our remarkable fragrant creations with a tribute to our customers’ most beloved perfumes.
Crafted with the same admired notes of White and White Oud –White Overdose opens with vibrant Lemon freshness, that fades into the delicate heart of Iris, lending a soft and powdery floral touch. At its core, White Overdose features an overdose of Agarwood (Oud) in its most concentrated form, which grounds the composition in its lush, smoky warmth.
Amplifying every note with an overdose of unforgettable impressions, we’re revering our journey with a fragrance that continues to define it.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: To remember a moment or place or imagine a moment or place, swing between now and the memory of the past and the passion of the future, with Tobacco perfume with its composition based on mystery and curiosity of discovery, the intense and ancient scent flowing with the lightness of a nostalgic breath, the intertwining destinations that suggest the ability to contemplate the scene from many angles, space. Our story that flows inside us with every breath, and appears on our features and around us like glare, beautiful confusion and seductive numbness that we dive deep into the details we feel until we are certain that we touch them.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Whispered in reverence, the name Tafaseel denotes meticulous craftsmanship and attention to detail. At its inception, incense blends with the zesty pink pepper and bergamot. The heart notes reveal the earthy allure of orris roots, oud, sandalwood and patchouli, while the base notes of amber, vanilla, cedarwood and vetiver lend a subtle sensuality to your enigmatic persona. Together, they narrate a scintillating story of opulence.

As you hold the bottle in your hand, you can feel the weight of its significance. An emblem of elegance, the regal shade of burgundy, and the silver accents on the packaging cast a spell of enchantment upon those who behold it.

Launched in 2023, it was crafted by perfumers Hamid Merati-Kashani and Ilias Ermenidis. The scent opens with a fresh and spicy blend of bergamot, cardamom, orange blossom, and cinnamon. In the heart, Orris Concrete, Benzoin Resin, and Cypriol Heart weave a tapestry of sophistication and passion. The base notes of Oud Assafi, Sandalwood Spicatum, and Sensual Musks lingers, creating an indelible trail, like the lingering touch of a lover.

This fragrance is perfect for those wanting to exude confidence and positivity. It features top notes of apple and caramel. The middle notes consist of oakmoss, white woods, and a touch of pepper, adding a subtle earthiness to the fragrance. The bottom notes feature iris and amber, providing depth and sophistication to the overall scent.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: "To create City Rhythm’s Red Line 2654, we are delighted to honor the inundation of requests from our customers by combining two of their City Rhythm favorites into one. Closing the distance of the 2,654 miles between San Diego’s Pacific coastline and Miami’s Atlantic beaches, Red Line carries the best of both worlds in its cargo. This flawless fusion allows the notes of two City Rhythm classic fragrances, Miami and San Diego, to enhance and play off of one other for an utterly unique experience. The juniper berries and blood orange of San Diego shine brightly next to Miami’s coconut and lime notes in the opening, before Miami’s floral and rum notes merge seamlessly with San Diego’s sea breeze and ambergris, to create a fantasy beach you can take with you wherever you go."

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
‘’ Symbol of a captivating and enigmatic night full of haziness. ‘’
The top notes of spice, cinnamon and bergamot ignite the senses, creating a lively introduction.
As the fragrance evolves, the heart reveal the earthy depth of patchouli, the soothing embrace of sandalwood and an unexpected twist with the intriguing essence of gasoline, adding a touch of haziness to the composition.
Finally, the base notes of vanilla, tonka bean, white musks and amber close the composition with a lasting impact.

perfumes_data.name: AMG Black Thrill Mercedes-Benz for men
perfumes_data.short_description: AMG Black Thrill by Mercedes-Benz is a Oriental Woody fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. AMG Black Thrill was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Fabrice Pellegrin. Top note is Mandarin Orange; middle note is Clary Sage; base notes are Tonka Bean, Leather, Amber and Woody Notes.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Discover absolute freedom with BLACK THRILL, one of three new fragrances from AMG Parfums. BLACK THRILL is the meeting of leather, addictive tonka, the aromatic thrill of clary sage and the sparkling ardor of ripe mandarin, an intoxicating amber woody composition, an ode to the feeling of pure freedom. With its inaugural trilogy, AMG Parfums arouses the thrill of desire and announces the advent of a new icon.
The line that gives you the ultimate thrill. Back to 1967, the year the legend was born. Two daring young men – Hans Werner Aufrecht and Erhard Melcher – unite their talents and will revolutionize motor racing. Famous for its “one man, one engine” concept, the audacious duo with a wild spirit will imagine cult creations that are still at the forefront of the industry today. This philosophy of raw excellence and intense sensations has brought AMG fragrances to life. Carefully selected ingredients. Original and daring compositions. Born from the belief that nothing is impossible, AMG Parfums unites high performance and pure emotion to infuse the spirit of racing into the heart of the Mercedes-Benz universe. Taking its name from the intense sensations provided by the power of AMG, THRILL enters the arena with three signature creations. SILVER THRILL, BLACK THRILL AND RED THRILL.
Composed by master perfumer Fabrice Pellegrin, each version of THRILL calls upon a key element of the AMG universe – technology for SILVER, luxury for BLACK, and passion for RED – while accelerating a specific masculine mood and moment. Born in Grasse, the cradle of high perfumery, the creator-perfumer of the collection demonstrates all his talent for the composition of perfumes and the supply of raw materials. This is one of the many reasons why the THRILL collection brings together the finest ingredients sourced with rare precision, for which "sustainability" is the watchword.
A single chassis, a heart that looks like an engine. Like an instantly recognizable homage to AMG, each bottle features a beating heart protected by a fascinating metallic shell. The raw character and apparent mechanism reflect the legendary audacity of AMG engines and the feeling of bravery that each THRILL fragrance evokes in you. Made of recycled glass and aluminum, AMG's eco-responsible commitment is at its peak.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Musky Rain is a musky, soft, and narcotic floral fragrance, inspired by the image of the painting of the same name. It is described as a unique composition that has been inspired by a secret love story, as well as the musks and ambers used.
A top note of bergamot and lychee wrapped in a spicy rose are the first chords of the composition, resting on a floral body. Narcissus absolute is the protagonist of the journey, while chords of jasmine and ylang-ylang help sweeten this dark flower, just as Indian Mysore sandalwood brings creaminess and sensuality to the fragrance.In the base notes, musks and ambers create the attractive character of the perfume.
TOP NOTES: Bergamote, Lychee, Black Pepper, Rose
MIDDLE NOTES: Narcissus absolute, Jasmine, Ylang Ylang, Sandalwood
BASE NOTES: Musk, Vanilla, Oriental, Civet, Benzoin
Available as a 50 ml Extrait de Parfum.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Through thick and thin. Our hearts beating. All immersed in lustful cherry. Hints of rum roaring within. A force of amber and musk. Our movements slower. And slower. No up and down. No you and me. Am I still? Or are we? Melt away in lust! Unlike anyone.

perfumes_data.name: Love by Kilian Amber and Oud Special Blend 2023 By Kilian for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Love by Kilian Amber and Oud Special Blend 2023 by By Kilian is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Love by Kilian Amber and Oud Special Blend 2023 was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Calice Becker. Top notes are Tunisian Orange Blossom, Marshmallow and Bulgarian Rose; middle notes are Amber, Resins and Spices; base notes are Amber, Agarwood (Oud) and Akigalawood.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Each year, Kilian launches a limited edition of one of its most popular and emblematic fragrances, Love, Don't Be Shy. The Special Blend edition of 2023 captures the essence of home and heritage with the legend of the inspiring Middle East, oud resonating with a vibrant amber accord.
Love, Don't Be Shy AMBER & OUD Special Blend 2023 highlights the rich and diverse facets of oud oil. This year's blend begins with bright Bulgarian rose oil and orange blossom absolute from Morocco, blooming with refinement and sensuality into the unforgettably delicious marshmallowy accord. In this heart begins the opening notes of a rich ambery accord, boldly with intensified spices and resins. Oriental and oud are the core resonance with a touch of akigalawood. The composition is signed by perfumer Calice Becker.
 
Notes: Accord of Oud, Accord of Oriental, Rose essence, Akigalawood.
The fragrance is available as a 50 ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
"In the vast expanse of the skies, there exists a realm where freedom reigns supreme. Here, one can find the majestic falcon – the ruler of the skies. On its celestial voyage, the falcon surveys its domain with vigilance and commands respect from all those who dwell below and its independence is a beacon of autonomy. Despite its lofty status, it remains a creature of elegance and poise. Like poetry upon the skin, the leathery essence of Baz Cuir captures the scent of adventure and independence. As the fragrance settles, it reveals layers of complexity reminiscent of the falcon’s graceful descent."
TOP NOTES
Bergamot, Apple, Yuzu, Mandarin, Green Notes, Orange, Cypress, Coriander, Cinnamon
MIDDLE NOTES
Jasmine, Muguet, Geranium, Osmanthus, Cedar Wood, Starwood, Myrrh, Labdanum, Incense
BASE NOTES
Sandalwood, Leather, Musk, Oriental, Safran, Guaiac wood, Cardamom, Cedar Wood, Patchouli, Vetiver

perfumes_data.name: Torpe Tiziana Terenzi for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Torpe by Tiziana Terenzi is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Torpe was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Paolo Terenzi. Top notes are Marine notes, Calabrian bergamot, Lemon and Sicilian Mandarin; middle notes are Bulgarian Rose, Peach, Sicilian Orange, Lavender, Peony, Violet and Iris; base notes are Ebony, Ambergris, Musk, Australian Sandalwood, Oakmoss and Indian Patchouli.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
This creation originates from the memory of a trip to the heart of the French Riviera, between the shimmering blue of the Mediterranean and the hills dotted with olive trees, in Saint-Tropez.
Paolo and Tiziana visited this town with its timeless lifestyle of gentleness and freedom and were inspired by the joyful and vibrant character of this seaside resort.
Saint-Tropez was a fascinating journey through the golden age of life on the Riviera in the 1960s.
In those years, the Italian and French Rivieras were the protagonists of an extraordinary cultural transformation: the life of the all-Italian playboys, known as Les Italiens, who were taking over the Riviera in the 1960s to the cry of “Bare feet, jeans, hair in the wind and go!”
This iconic image perfectly captures the defiant attitude and desire for freedom of the time.
These young people took over the Riviera with a daring spirit and a liberating attitude, embracing a lifestyle of relaxation and fun, while a blazing fire of passion burned within them, driving them to live every moment to its fullest.
When the film ‘And God Created Woman’ hit the big screen, it captured the hearts of audiences around the world thanks to the unforgettable young Brigitte Bardot.
Torpè is a tribute to the timeless glamour of that period, when Saint Tropez became a popular destination for the international jet set. Torpè, on the other hand, was the name used by the resort’s trendiest ‘rebels’ in the 1960s. This creation is a fresh, vibrant fragrance whose marine notes remind us of unforgettable summer evenings full of laughter with not a care in the world. Each note is dedicated to the sea and its magic, a journey of the senses to one of the most fascinating places in the world. Anyone wearing it can close their eyes and find themselves transported to the cobbled streets of Saint Tropez, amidst the laughter of children at play, the scent of the salty air and the warmth of the sun on their skin.
The fragrance opens with a fresh, citrusy bouquet, thanks to Reggio Calabrian Bergamot, Sorrento Lemon and Sicilian Mandarin, and combines with Marine notes, which add depth to the perfume.
The heart of the fragrance, the true essence of this creation, opens with the muted scents of Bulgarian Rose, Côte d’Azur Lavender, French Iris and Provençal Violet, intertwined with the delicate elegance of Saint Tropez Peony, the sweetness of Sicilian Orange and juicy Romagna Peach.
The entire creation is built on a solid foundation of fine woods such as African Ebony and Australian Sandalwood combined with Musk, Orientalgris, Indian Patchouli and Tuscan Oakmoss, creating a beguiling and sensual base that envelops the wearer like a lasting embrace.
Torpè captures the vibrant, lush essence of the Mediterranean coastline.
Its accords are reminiscent of when the turquoise sea meets the sun-kissed olive groves, creating an unforgettable olfactory experience.
TOP NOTES: Reggio Calabrian Bergamot, Sicilian Mandarin, Sorrento Lemon, Marine Notes
MIDDLE NOTES: Bulgarian Rose, Côte d'Azur Lavender, French Iris, Provençal Violet, Saint Tropez Peony, Sicilian Orange Blossom, Romagna Peach
BASE NOTES: Orientalgris, Musk, African Ebony, Australian Sandalwood, Indian Patchouli, Tuscan Oakmoss

perfumes_data.name: Signature BLOOM Zaharoff for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Signature BLOOM by Zaharoff is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Signature BLOOM was launched in 2024. Top notes are Gardenia, Star Jasmine and Coconut; middle notes are Egyptian Jasmine, Jasmine, Orange Blossom, Red Peony and Amber; base notes are Ylang-Ylang, Jasmine, Myrrh, Oud, Olibanum, Sandalwood, Sugar Cane and Bourbon Vanilla.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
We combined four types of jasmine oils, each offering a distinct olfactory journey, and blended it with a base of incense oils. This is BLOOM; a feminine sweetness accompanied by a masculine wildness.
White jasmine, with its sweet and floral notes. Unlike others in the family, it has a slight animalic edge that gives a musk experience.
Arabian jasmine used in alternative medicine for its healing and soothing properties, gives a fruitier, almost vanilla experience. Considered the most fragrant jasmine.
Egyptian jasmine lends a timeless elegance to the blend, with its sophisticated floral bouquet and subtle hints of earthiness, evoking visions of ancient gardens steeped in history and tradition.
Star jasmine stands out from the other types. While it shares the classic jasmine features of a five-point flower, it belongs to the "dogbane" family; unlike white, Arabian, and Egyptian jasmine, which are part of the olive family. Star jasmine has a distinct appearance resembling a "pinwheel" and takes center stage on the front of the BLOOM box. Unlike other jasmines, it has a sweeter scent and lacks the typical indolic or animalic notes.
Together, these four jasmine oils create a harmonious fusion of scents, inviting the wearer on a captivating olfactory voyage through the lush gardens of the imagination.
"Zaharoff Signature BLOOM, a jasmine incense, opening with the heady embrace of jasmine, its intoxicating aroma filling the air like a floral symphony. Each spray carries with it the essence of a thousand whispered secrets, a thousand forgotten dreams, as if the very soul of the collective world itself were captured within its petals.
As the scent unfolds, it reveals a heart of sacred resins - myrrh and frankincense mingling with the warm embrace of oud, their smoky tendrils weaving a tapestry of ancient wisdom and divine mystery. It is as if the fragrance itself is a portal to another world, a gateway to the realms of the gods.
For within its depths lies the promise of renewal, of new beginnings and endless possibilities. For in the heart of BLOOM, where jasmine and resin intertwine, lies the key to unlocking the mysteries of the universe - a fragrance so powerful, so intoxicating, that it has the power to change the course of destiny itself."

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Orpheus is an herbal, boozy and slightly smoky citrus-incense-tobacco fragrance, perfect for fall. Composed in 2013 and completed more recently, it features bitter orange, blood orange, bergamot, lemon, mate, spray paint, sage, ginger, frankincense, myrrh, tobacco, cedar, amber, white musks and subtle shadings of rose, carnation and tuberose. As with many earlier CL compositions it’s complex enough that the individual notes blend seamlessly into the character of the fragrance, which leans traditionally masculine.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
This fragrance belongs to the warm and spicy family, offering warmth and sweetness within the gourmand category. It features notes of vanilla tincture and vanilla absolute, harmoniously balanced with sandalwood, creating an inviting and comforting olfactory experience.
Vanilla Tincture India, an ingredient explicitly created for Vanilla Sex, exudes a soft sensuality. Vanilla reveals a pristine glamour, warmed by mysterious florals and bitter almond essence. A timeless sandalwood quality mingles with enticing tonka absolute and an exquisite Ultravanil™ molecule.
A Symphony of Vanilla Notes:
Notes:  Vanilla Tincture, Vanilla Absolute, Floral Notes, Bitter Almond, Sandalwood, Tonka Bean Absolute, Ultravanil®
Available in 30ml and 50ml Eau de Parfum.

Roja Dove Haute Parfumerie 20th Anniversary was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. Top notes are Aldehydes, Bergamot, Lemon and Lime; middle notes are Jasmine, Geranium, Ylang Ylang, Magnolia, Freesia, Rose, Peach, Violet and Clary Sage; base notes are Musk, Amber, Sandalwood, Rhubarb, Clove, Transparent Woods, Frankincense, Patchouli, Cedar, Labdanum, Benzoin, Vanilla, Moss, Orris, Peru Balsam, Tonka Bean and Agarwood (Oud).
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Celebrate 20 years of the Roja Dove Haute Parfumerie with this special edition design, limited to only 150 bottles. Each will be signed and numbered by Roja Dove and includes a certificate of authentication.
An exciting new exclusive to the Roja Dove Haute Parfumerie, RDHP20 is a celebration in scented form. Created especially for our 20th Anniversary, this special new piece commemorates two decades of our mission to bring the cutting-edge of luxury perfumery to fragrance-lovers across the world.
As we enjoy this exciting milestone, we invite you to celebrate with us by enjoying an exuberant new composition. Like a dazzling visit to the Haute Parfumerie, a collection of 31 luxurious raw materials set the scene for scene for an Ambrée accord as opulent and enduring as the boutique itself.
Luminous Citrus notes and Aldehydes which sparkle like our iconic chandeliers make a luminous first impression. A decadent blend of expensive Woods blend with pillowy base of Oriental and Vanilla to sink the senses into the plush surroundings of the shop. A finishing touch of Clear Woods - a unique material crafted from Patchouli Isolate - sign the hallmark of another pioneering new creation from Perfumer, Roja Dove.
An homage to an amazing 20 years with a bold vision of the future, RDHP20 is ready to enter the roaring 20's era for The Roja Dove Haute Parfumerie.

perfumes_data.name: Cyan Max Philip for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Cyan by Max Philip is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Cyan was launched in 2024. Top notes are Ambergris and Jasmine; middle notes are Orris and Violet; base notes are Musk and Black Elder.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Max Philip Cyan is a fragrance that delicately balances strength with freshness, creating a captivating aura of sophistication. It opens with the marine richness of ambergris and the enchanting floral notes of jasmine, setting a luminous and engaging tone. The heart introduces a refined blend of orris and violet, weaving together a powdery floral sophistication that is both delicate and commanding. Completing the sensory journey, the scent settles into a base of elderflower and musk, adding a burst of freshness that is charged with an invigorating energy.

perfumes_data.name: Ruade Parfum d'Empire for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Ruade by Parfum d'Empire is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Ruade was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Marc-Antoine Corticchiato.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Mane, hooves, neighing, galloping, jumping… Kicking. Kick the animal's ass for a punchy scent. It is all the passion of the horse that distills this exceptional perfume built around an excess of natural oud wood.
A souvenir scent, that of returning to the stables after a weekend of show jumping competitions. A discipline that Marc-Antoine Corticchiato has practiced for a long time, and which he evokes here – the adrenaline of competition, the joy of returning to the stable…
A perfume-universe, that of the equestrian world, when the horses have been taken down from the truck and return to their box. We then take the canteens from the van, these large trunks from which a mixture of strong animal odors emerge: leather from the harness and gaiters, saliva from the bits, sweat from the saddle cloths, tar with which we coat the hooves, remains of straw and hay on the blankets...
To capture the scent of opening the trunks, Marc-Antoine chose the most difficult material in perfumery: the essence of oud wood. Distilled since the year 1000, its fragrant resin results from an attack on the Aquilaria wood, after a very slow process evolving over several decades. This sumptuous liquid gold, used here in overdose, then displays all its panache.
Wild floral, narcissus exalts the insolent character of Ruade with its mane note and its straw effects. The absolute of cut hay lends its power to the evocation of hay fetuses whose scent saturates the air and panics the horses.
An intrepid perfume with precious materials in overdose, saturated with animality and rebellious like a kick.

perfumes_data.name: F2 Toskovat' for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: F2 by Toskovat' is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. F2 was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is David-Lev Jipa-Slivinschi. Top notes are Aldehydes, Lily-of-the-Valley, Narcissus, Neroli, Pine, Turmeric, Bergamot and Lemon; middle notes are Plum, Heliotrope, Galbanum, Palmarosa, Orris, Labdanum, Wisteria, Cinnamon, Mimosa, Rose and Opoponax; base notes are Synthetic Civet, Copaiba balm, Musk, Oakmoss, Amber, Patchouli, Vanilla, Benzoin and Myrrh.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
"Today I remembered what I was taught and how wrong it was.
I was told so many rules. What was wrong, what was right, what was natural, what was expected. Make a move.
I want the old love of my grandparents and the freedom of my children.
I don’t want to see in black and white anymore.
We are all so vulnerable in the grand scheme of things but we keep craving and carving a plan…
They say if you want to make fate laugh, you should tell her your plans.”

perfumes_data.name: Topaz Prisma Parfums for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Topaz by Prisma Parfums is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Topaz was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Isaac Hilton. perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Encapsulating Miami, Fl in Red
Topaz is a completely unisex, Citrus, Oriental fragrance.
Inspired by the idea of an afternoon on the beach transitioning to a night out on the town. Experience the vibrant energy of Miami with our captivating fragrance, "Topaz."
Guided by the city's lively spirit and the fiery hue of red, this scent is a celebration of life and passion. Let the zesty Lime and luscious Coconut transport you to sun-kissed shores, while the spicy Saffron adds an exotic touch.
Immerse yourself in the sultry allure of Rum, evoking Miami's glamorous nightlife, and feel the warmth of Tobacco, mirroring the city's rich history.
With Topaz, the essence of Miami comes alive, enveloping you in a captivating blend that ignites your senses and leaves a lasting impression.

perfumes_data.name: Gentle Fusion X Nathalie Feisthauer CZAR for women and men

perfumes_data.name: Cola Oud Aromas de Salazar for women and men

The nose behind this fragrance is Michael Salazar. perfumes_data.detailed_description: Introducing our unique creation that combines the refreshing and familiar notes of Cola with the exotic and luxurious scent of Oud. Pure Hindi Oud and Indian Oud are used in this composition that only real oud lovers will truly admire. This fragrance is further enhanced by the sweet and tart Black Currant Absolute and Raspberry, balanced with the subtle spice of Pink Peppercorn. The floral notes of Jasmine Sambac Absolute add a touch of elegance while the woody and earthy Hiba Japanese Cedar Wood grounds the fragrance. Our Cola Accord is composed of mostly natural materials and is as close to the real cola as you could get!

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Kama symbolizes the essence of desire, igniting our pursuit of pleasure and connection, often dimmed by life's routine. Named after the Sanskrit word for desire, Kama encourages living life to the fullest. The bow and arrow symbolize the power of attraction and seduction.

perfumes_data.name: Jean Lowe Azure Maison Alhambra for women and men

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Jean Lowe Azure by Maison Alhambra is a sophisticated and refreshing unisex fragrance from the amber fruity family. The top notes of bergamot and mandarin offer a vibrant citrus opening, while the heart of orange adds a juicy and sunny touch. The base notes of ambergris and ginger provide warmth and a sensual touch, making the perfume elegant and long-lasting.

Masters was created by Nathalie Lorson and Olivier Cresp. Top note is Cardamom; middle notes are Heliotrope and Cacao; base notes are Vanilla and Amber.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Crafted by two visionary master perfumers, Masters is inspired by the world of art, music, and paintings. Elegant and sophisticated, it's an olfactory masterpiece that unfolds like the strokes of a masterful painting.
Like a symphony of scents, the top note bursts with the lively composition of Cardamom, and the heart reveals a gallery of Heliotrope and Cocoa that complement each other with their delicate floral and vibrant accord. Concluding with the velvety aroma of Vanilla, and the warm embrace of Oriental, we are leaving an indelible mark on your senses, much like a cherished piece of art.
More than a fragrance; Masters is a celebration of an artistic masterpiece.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
LA COLLECTION RABANNE.

An unprecedented bolder and edgier collection of eight aspirational fragrances crafted by six of the world’s most renowned and innovative Master Perfumers.

Inspired by Calandre, the first fragrance of La Maison, LA COLLECTION RABANNE celebrates the history and savoir-faire through iconic dates, places, characters and a hyper-sculptural design in radiant glass framed in metal - the iconic material that sits at the heart of the Rabanne story.

perfumes_data.short_description: Néroli Outrenoir (2024) by Guerlain is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Néroli Outrenoir (2024) was launched in 2024. Néroli Outrenoir (2024) was created by Delphine Jelk and Thierry Wasser. Top notes are Petitgrain, Bergamot, Lemon, Tangerine and Grapefruit; middle notes are Tea, Neroli, Earthy Notes, Orange Blossom and Smoke; base notes are Benzoin, Vanilla, Ambrette (Musk Mallow), Myrrh and Moss.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: "Maison Guerlain invites you to its new exceptional event in a numbered edition dedicated to the Chinese New Year. Each year, a new collaboration will celebrate the astrological sign of the Chinese calendar. Guerlain thus inaugurates the first edition with its 2024 vintage under the sign of the dragon, symbolizing the year to come. Dressed in red for the occasion, the legendary Flacon aux Abeilles is adorned with a sumptuous golden dragon adorned with Swarovski® crystals designed by Parisian jeweler Francesco Truscelli. This exceptional piece welcomes the powerful trail of Néroli Outrenoir in the image of the imperial dragon."

perfumes_data.name: Cocktail de Minuit Voskanian Parfums for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Cocktail de Minuit by Voskanian Parfums is a Aromatic Fruity fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Cocktail de Minuit was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Tsovak Voskanian.

perfumes_data.name: Violetta Mannara Strega Del Castello for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Violetta Mannara by Strega Del Castello is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Violetta Mannara was launched in 2023.

perfumes_data.name: Labirinto Pollini Profumi for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Labirinto by Pollini Profumi is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Labirinto was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Michele Pollini. Top notes are Green Notes and Bergamot; middle notes are Osmanthus, Ylang-Ylang and Iris; base notes are Myrrh, Birch, Sandalwood, Patchouli, Cedar, Vanilla and Tonka Bean.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
The labyrinth is a spiral which captures us and draws us to its centre.
An ancient and powerful symbol representing the journey of man through the ordeals and challenges of his existence. Those who entertain this journey are made aware that the boundaries between human and divine, between finite and infinite, are mysteriously permeable. It is the symbol of pilgrimage, of a path to atonement, of a spiritual search. In its chore the material is defeated by the spiritual,  instinct is defeated by intelligence, violence is defeated by knowledge, the perishable by eternity.
In the opening, Labirinto is slightly smoky due to the Birch Wood… and while you venture through its corridors you are embraced by creamy Sandalwood, a sweetness and depth which will attract you to its very chore: here Osmanthus, Patchouli and Sandalwood are revealed.

perfumes_data.name: Fire Snake In The Box for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Fire Snake by In The Box is a Oriental Woody fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Fire Snake was launched in 2024. Top notes are Mango, Ginger, Lemon and Red Berries; middle notes are Woody Notes, Coumarin and Jasmine; base notes are Musk, Oud, Amber and Cypriol Oil.

perfumes_data.name: Marla Pollini Profumi for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Marla by Pollini Profumi is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Marla was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Michele Pollini. Top note is White Rose; middle notes are Rose and Cloves; base notes are Amber, Myrrh, Vanilla, Tonka Bean and Oakmoss.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Marla is femininity, a name which has always been associated with pureness, kindness and beauty. Marla is the warrior who has been through difficult times but has always put up a fight and is proud of every aspect of her being, even her fragility.
Marla, like the female character in the film “Fight Club”, is an unusual  “femme fatale”: she has no past, she has no expectation for the future, she just lives in the moment.
Marla is dominated by a White Rose, ripe and full of thorns and picked in a breezy September night… when it is no longer the fruit of an incidental first blossoming, but the perfection of a mature plant’s last blooming. A rose leaned onto Oaktree moss, Tonka Bean and Myrrh… a magical ritual for a fresh start, inspired by purity.

perfumes_data.name: Red Temptation Tobacco Zara for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Red Temptation Tobacco by Zara is a Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Red Temptation Tobacco was launched in 2024.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Red Temptation Tobacco Extrait de Parfum is a bold reinterpretation of Zara's iconic Red Temptation. This fragrance features an intoxicating burst of spicy tobacco notes, complemented by the delicate sweetness of fresh pink pepper and saffron. Sambac jasmine and fiery rockrose flower blend to create a delicious and intense trail.

perfumes_data.name: Icon MAISON ASRAR for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Icon by MAISON ASRAR is a Aromatic Aquatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Icon was launched in 2023. Top notes are Clary Sage, Cardamom and Apple; middle notes are Lily of the Valley, Aquatic notes and Jasmine; base notes are Cedarwood, Leather and Amber.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Icon is a captivating perfume belonging to the Fougere Marine fragrance family. This family is typically known for their fresh and aquatic characteristics, making them ideal for individuals who enjoy the refreshing and clean scents reminiscent of the sea. It opens with an invigorating burst of apple and cardamom, reminiscent of a brisk sea breeze, while the clary sage adds a touch of herbal complexity.
The heart reveals a harmonious blend of aquatic accords, jasmine, and lily of the valley, creating a serene and elegant aura. As the fragrance evolves, warm amber, woody cedar, and sumptuous leather create a rich and inviting base that lingers on the skin, leaving a lasting impression of elegance and allure.
This combination of fruity, herbal, floral, and woody notes creates a dynamic olfactory experience that can be worn on various occasions, making it suitable for both daytime and evening wear for any occasion.

perfumes_data.name: Le Jardin de Monsieur McGregor 4160 Tuesdays for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Le Jardin de Monsieur McGregor by 4160 Tuesdays is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Le Jardin de Monsieur McGregor was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Sarah McCartney. Top notes are Strawberry, Grass and Mint; middle notes are Hay, Rose and Lavender; base notes are Tobacco, Moss and Mushroom.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
"This first appeared at a perfume making workshop here in our Acton studio. Sarah was demonstrating the way that Hedione™ helps materials smell as if you've just walked outside into a garden and are standing right next to the real thing.
In honour of both Peter Rabbit and his arch nemisis, Mr McGregor, and in further honour of the master of translucence in perfumery, Jean Claude Ellena, creator of the Hermes Jardin series of fragrances, we set about making the scent of a cottage garden in the Lake District, complete with shed.
For batch two, if we make it at all, we'll have to tweak the formula because we did get a bit carried away with the materials: orris, tobacco (Mr McGregor has a pipe), blackcurrant bud, jasmine, parsnip, hay, lavender, cedar moss, vetivert and patchouli for a nice muddy base, cucumber and mushroom.
Equally evocative but not that expensive, notes of cut grass, leather, strawberries, lily of the valley, blackberries, celery and musk, because we think that musk smells like freshly washed bunnies.
We know that these don't all grow at the same time, but we're quite imaginative." -Brand website.

perfumes_data.name: Crazy Garden Aphorismes by Dominique Ropion for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Crazy Garden by Aphorismes by Dominique Ropion is a Floral Green fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Crazy Garden was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Dominique Ropion. Top notes are Black Currant Blossom, Mandarin, Lemon, Green Notes, Galbanum and Rosemary; middle notes are Tuberose, Lily of the Valley, Jasmine and Rose; base notes are Vanilla, Oakmoss, Musk, Cashmeran, Patchouli, Labdanum, Vetiver, Tonka Bean and Ambergris.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Crazy Garden by Aphorismes by Dominique Ropion is a fresh perspective on green florals. The fragrance opens with vibrant citrus notes of lemon and mandarin, combined with agrestic notes and blackcurrant bud, creating a lively effect. A floral heart of jasmine, lily of the valley, and rose is enhanced by tuberose with milky nuances. The base is a blend of patchouli essence, oakmoss absolute, and labdanum, merging into a grey amber-vanilla accord.
Top Notes: Lemon Essence, Mandarin Essence, Rosemary Essence LMR, Blackcurrant Bud Absolute LMR, Green Vegetal Accord, Galbanum Resinoid
Middle Notes: Rose Accord, Lily of the Valley, Jasmine, Tuberose Absolute LMP, Floral Lactone Accord
Base Notes: Cashmeran, Patchouli Essence LMP, Vetiveryl Acetate LMR, Oakmoss Absolute LMR, Labdanum Resinoid LMR, Tonka Bean Accord, Grey Amber Accord, Vanilla Accord, Musk

perfumes_data.name: Auspicious Dragon Rituals for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Auspicious Dragon by Rituals is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Auspicious Dragon was launched in 2023.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Inspired by the ancient tales of Chinese imperial dragons and their mythical strengths, this new limited edition is designed around the notion that we all carry an invisible power.
A blend of olibanum and tonka bean spices, grounded with cedar wood, opens up to a warm, spicy heart. Jasmine adds luminosity while the dry down reveals a rich, intense signature, making it bold, mesmerizing and deeply comforting.

perfumes_data.name: Fresh Oud Sensaroma for women and men

perfumes_data.detailed_description: This fragrance seamlessly blends invigorating freshness with luxurious smokiness. It starts with a bright, refreshing mix of pineapple, bergamot, black currant, apple, and raspberry. Smoothly transitioning into a luxurious smoky essence through a bouquet of patchouli, Moroccan jasmine, rose, and amber.

perfumes_data.name: Résolument Affranchi Harold & Maude for men

perfumes_data.detailed_description: "A perfectly unisex scent! Surprising, powerful, and utterly endearing... The heart composed of rose and jasmine flowers is reinforced by the astonishing leathery and tarry smell of saffron and the camphorous aroma of incense, until now rarely associated with jasmine! The base of musk and vanilla, captivating and sensual, is powerfully warmed by oud and Indian patchouli." -Brand website.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Al Haramain's L'Aventure Fraîche is a unisex Citrus Aromatic fragrance introduced in 2024. It opens with vibrant top notes of bergamot, lemon, and ginger, delivering a zesty and invigorating start. The heart features tea, violet leaves, and cardamom, adding a soft, green freshness that balances the lively top notes. The base comprises musk, woody notes, and sandalwood, providing a warm and smooth finish .

perfumes_data.name: L'Orpheline Edition Limitée Serge Lutens for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: L'Orpheline Edition Limitée by Serge Lutens is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. L'Orpheline Edition Limitée was launched in 2024. Top note is Incense; middle note is Castoreum; base note is Musk.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: “In the hands of Destiny – cruel puppeteer – she becomes a ballerina Yet, without being its toy, through her magical fingers, she also directs her luck!” Cruelty, fragility, what are we made of? The truth is often hidden behind appearances. Graceful, delicate and ethereal, a ballerina seems manipulated like a doll, by an elegant puppeteer. Slender dandy with spider fingers, the fate of the little one is in his hands. Precarious balance, fatally inevitable destiny! However, between the executioner and his intended victim, are things so obvious? On closer inspection, wouldn't she also be pulling the wires on her side, giving direction to the emaciated fingers? The orphan, fascinating actress of our illusions! When reality resurfaces, letting doubt settle in, it evaporates into a mystical and disturbing incense. Serge Lutens

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
The Feeling: Leaning back into an Adirondack chair by the lake, you crack open a craft IPA and breathe in the fresh mountain air. Your perfectly worn denim jacket beams under the sun. Surrounded by trees, nature, and good friends is where you feel the most at-home.
The Fragrance: Fruity and aquatic notes of lemon, mandarin splash, and apple leaf soften into floral notes of blue lavender, geranium mist, and lotus before warming into earthy base notes of vetiver, sandalwood, and amber.

perfumes_data.name: I Wanna Be Loved By You Haute Fragrance Company HFC for women and men

I Wanna Be Loved By You was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Benoît Bergia. Top notes are Wild Berries, Sake and Plum; middle notes are Amber, Rose and Apple; base notes are Oud, Osmanthus and Vetiver.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
She awakens as the sun bids farewell to the horizon. Moonlight kisses her skin, and the night fills her with passion, shedding all the shackles of restraint. She craves celebration, and the entire world freezes in anticipation of her enchanting curves.
Her magic and sensuality captivate everyone, leaving behind a morning trail of joyful memories and twilight carefreeness, echoing like a love message, “I wanna be loved by you”.
Top Note:
Forest berries, Plum sake
Middle Note:
Rose, Grey Oriental, Apple hookah
Bottom Note:
Osmanthus, Vetiver, Oud

LA COLLECTION RABANNE.

An unprecedented bolder and edgier collection of eight aspirational fragrances crafted by six of the world’s most renowned and innovative Master Perfumers.

Inspired by Calandre, the first fragrance of La Maison, LA COLLECTION RABANNE celebrates the history and savoir-faire through iconic dates, places, characters and a hyper-sculptural design in radiant glass framed in metal - the iconic material that sits at the heart of the Rabanne story.

perfumes_data.short_description: Majestic Amber by Pana Dora is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Majestic Amber was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Ibrahim Al Zoabi. Top notes are Orris Root, Saffron, Nutmeg, Pink Pepper and Violet; middle notes are Amberwood, Ambergris, Orange Blossom, Cashmere Wood, Fir Resin and Tuberose; base notes are Leather, Ambroxan, Dry Wood, Benzoin, Vanilla, Oakmoss, Papyrus and Cedar.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Majestic Amber by Pana Dora is a complex and rich fragrance that combines a variety of notes to create a unique scent experience. The perfume opens with a spicy and floral blend of pink pepper, nutmeg, orris root, violet, and saffron. The heart reveals a warm and woody mix of cashmere wood, tuberose, orange blossom, ambergris, fir resin, and amberwood. The base is a deep and lasting combination of papyrus, dry wood, vanilla, leather, benzoin, cedar, ambroxan, and oakmoss.

perfumes_data.name: Signature Heart Attack Daniel Josier for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Signature Heart Attack by Daniel Josier is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Signature Heart Attack was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Daniel Josier. Top notes are Lime, Chili Pepper, Aldehydes, Pepper, Mandarin Orange and Green Pear; middle notes are Cypress, Sage and Frankincense; base notes are Cedar, Patchouli, Sandalwood and Musk.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Daniel suffered a heart attack in July 2021, and with his signature sense of humour, he wanted to pay tribute to that moment. The three phases are created around the initial moments of the attack, the hospital admission, and the rest at home. The perfume is unisex and for any season, since a heart attack can happen to anyone at any time.

perfumes_data.name: Cuir Grenat L'Artisan Parfumeur for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Cuir Grenat by L'Artisan Parfumeur is a Leather fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Cuir Grenat was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Christophe Raynaud. Top note is Raspberry; middle note is Leather; base note is Ambrofix™.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
L'Artisan Parfumeur introduces Cuir Grenat to the Les Merveilles collection (formerly known as the L'Orient collection).
Influenced by his experiences in Morocco, perfumer Christophe Raynaud created Cuir Grenat Eau de Parfum for L'Artisan Parfumeur. During his travels, Raynaud stumbled upon a leather workshop, captivated by the mastery of craftsmanship and the aromatic atmosphere that surrounded him. This olfactory journey inspired the creation of Cuir Grenat, a fragrance that beautifully captures the interplay between the dimly lit room's warmth, leather, and aromatic scents, and the luminosity of the outside world.
The composition features prominent notes of raspberry, leather, and ambrofix.
L'Artisan Parfumeur Cuir Grenat is available in a 100 ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: Maraschino Sospiro Perfumes for women and men

The nose behind this fragrance is Christian Provenzano. Top notes are Cherry, Strawberry, Peach, Apple and Almond; middle notes are Jasmine Sambac, Heliotrope, Mimosa, Orris and Rose; base notes are Musk, Tonka Bean, Vanilla, Sandalwood, Vetiver, Amber and Patchouli.

perfumes_data.name: Coriandre 39 Mexico Le Labo for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Coriandre 39 Mexico by Le Labo is a Floral Aquatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Coriandre 39 Mexico was launched in 2024. Top notes are Cilantro, Lime and Aldehydes; middle notes are Green Notes, Watery Notes and Floral Notes; base note is Musk.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Coriandre 39 is the Mexican City exclusive from Le Labo's City Exclusives collection. This fragrance opens with a zing of spicy lime and aldehydic cilantro leaves, followed by crisp watery notes. Fresh, green florals then emerge, leading to an intoxicating musky dry down. The scent offers a sensory experience that balances tranquility and vibrancy, reminiscent of forest bathing in El Bosque de Chapultepec or sipping mezcal in La Condesa.

perfumes_data.name: Pavlova Nicolai Parfumeur Createur for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Pavlova by Nicolai Parfumeur Createur is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Pavlova was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Patricia de Nicolai. Top notes are Pineapple, Passionfruit and Rum; middle notes are Raspberry, Peach and Coconut; base notes are Musk, Vanilla, Sandalwood and Cedar.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
A daring, innovative scent inspired by the lightness and delicacy of the famous dessert of the same name, Pavlova is a celebration of sweetness and freshness, evoking the grace of a dance between sweet and sour flavours.
Pavlova’s theatrical opening is an invitation to discover the tangy gourmet notes of sparkling pineapple, passion fruit and coconut, creating an unapologetic sense of the exotic.
There is also a raspberry note whose rich, fruity nuances have a surprising depth. This sweet and slightly bitter red berry adds a fascinating intricacy, balancing the lightness of other fruity notes such as peach.
Pavlova is a fragrance enhanced by a combination of woody notes like cedar and sandalwood, a reassuring contrast to the light, fruity notes. Vanilla and musk harmoniously entwine to sign this original composition recalling the airy, melting meringue of the Pavlova.
A sparkling sensory experience evoking joy, youth and freedom, Pavlova is a nod to the limitless creativity of perfumery.
Available as 30ml, 100ml and 250ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: Black Vanilla AXE for men

perfumes_data.detailed_description: Black Vanilla Premium Deodorant Body Spray by AXE is part of the Fine Fragrance Collection. This body spray features an indulgent, delicious fragrance infused with orange essential oil. It is formulated with an aluminum-free formula that is easy on the skin and tough on odor, providing freshness and confidence for up to 72 hours.

perfumes_data.name: Mexico Bulevard Puerta Del Hierro 4965 Zara for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Mexico Bulevard Puerta Del Hierro 4965 by Zara is a Aromatic Fruity fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Mexico Bulevard Puerta Del Hierro 4965 was launched in 2024. Top note is Cardamom; middle note is Pineapple; base note is Cashmeran.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Mexico Bulevard Puerta Del Hierro 4965 by Zara is an Eau de Parfum that opens with exotic cardamom and a hint of pineapple, evoking vibrant culture and lively conversations. The base notes of cashmere provide a soothing essence, exuding strength and sophistication.

perfumes_data.name: Vanilla Edesia Electimuss for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Vanilla Edesia by Electimuss is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Vanilla Edesia was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Cécile Zarokian. Top notes are Frankincense, Heliotrope, Pink Pepper, Bergamot and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Cumin, Cinnamon, Coriander, Rose and Ylang Ylang; base notes are Vanilla, Sandalwood, Patchouli, Haitian Vetiver and Virginia Cedar.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Edesia was the Roman goddess of luxury and feasting, so this fragrance was inspired by celebrations of extravagance, excess and epicurean pleasures.

This opulent creation is a cornucopia of the gastronomic delights of creamy vanilla, exotic fruits, citrus and bitter almond seasoned with exotic spices cinnamon and pink pepper, scattered with ylang-ylang, heliotrope and sweet rose centifolia florals, all underpinned with an addictive, carnal base of amber, musk, leather, gourmand and woody accents.

perfumes_data.short_description: Through The Forest by d'Annam is a Aromatic Spicy fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Through The Forest was launched in 2023. perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Through The Forest tells the story of Vietnamese men venturing deep into the forest in search of prized oud. Before each trip, they kindle incense at their ancestral altar, praying for safety and fruitful voyage. This fragrance transports you into the heart of Vietnam's jungle as scents of oud beckons. It's an ode to exploration, reverence, and the treasures hidden within nature's embrace.
Gender: Masculine
Top Notes: Elemi, Black Pepper, Saffron
Heart Notes: Incense, Spices, Tobacco
Base Notes: Oud, Sandalwood, Vanilla

perfumes_data.name: Time Machine Le Frag for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Time Machine by Le Frag is a Aromatic Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Time Machine was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Renier R. Mendez.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
"First, you’ll probably feel a slight acidity, but then sweetness will follow… Weren’t those white candies pineapple-flavored? But wait! There’s a hint of tobacco, did grandpa carry them in his pocket along with his pipe? You close your eyes, trying to reassure yourself about their taste, and suddenly… the time machine starts.

Time Machine is an exception in the entire Le Frag collection. This time, I’m not taking you on a journey through my memories or childhood fascinations, but I invite you on your own journey through time.

Take a sniff and let the Time Machine’s gears run…

Perhaps it will remind you of the workshop where Dad repaired the cabinet, the one Mom constantly nagged him about. Or an old wooden trunk with brass fittings, which hid everything your imagination suggested. A small-town pharmacy, where your pharmacist aunt hid secret potions in hundreds of wooden drawers. Or maybe your beloved grandfather, who was a craftsman and spent every spare moment in his workshop. So often, that he soaked up the scent of the tools, and the space soaked up his cologne, which you will forever associate with love and a sense of security."
Notes: lime, lavender, pineapple, cardamom, oud Vietnam, rum, immortelle, hamamelis, amber, tobacco, musk, ambrette seeds and… gear train.

perfumes_data.name: Nightcap GUY FOX for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Nightcap by GUY FOX is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Nightcap was launched in 2024. Nightcap was created by Marc Daniel Heimgartner and Sidonie Grandperret. Top notes are Tobacco, Bitter Orange, Malt, Nutmeg, Coriander and Ginger; middle notes are Agarwood (Oud), Milk, Bourbon Whiskey, Leather, Oak and Pimento; base notes are Smoke, Amber, Vanilla, Sandalwood and White Musk.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Meet the first fragrance in our new luxury line: Nightcap. Designed for chilly date nights, long winter walks, firesides with old friends, and late night lounging. Perfect for a night like tonight.
Nightcap is unlike anything we've ever released. Its rich, intoxicating combination of Bourbon, Leather, and Vanilla results in something truly special and lasts all day.
Nightcap is something completely new for GUY FOX. After previously focusing on versatile, everyday fragrances, we set out to create a multi-layered, rich scent with classically masculine notes and serious longevity. Good news: We nailed it.
Nightcap is so unique we created a brand new collection to release it. Founder's Reserve will feature limited quantity, high-end fragrances that are too exciting to keep to ourselves.

With sparkling citrus top notes, a floral heart of osmanthus, jasmine and iris and basenotes nuanced with leather, apricots and gentle musks, Osmanthe Liu Yuan is a ray of sunshine, bottled.

perfumes_data.name: Fight Fight Fight Cologne for Men President Trump for men
perfumes_data.short_description: Fight Fight Fight Cologne for Men by President Trump is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Fight Fight Fight Cologne for Men was launched in 2024.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Fight Fight Fight is a bold fragrance from Trump Fragrances, designed for men who embody strength and resilience. This limited-edition cologne is crafted to leave a lasting impression with its rich and robust notes.
The fragrances commemorate President Trump's moment of personal courage and the strong message he sent to Americans after being shot at in Butler, Pennsylvania. Instead of the potential horrific moment of Trump's assassination, every camera on the mainstream media captured the most iconic photograph and video of his political career.
Photos of the fragrance and information: courtesy of President Trump Fragrances. The images shown are for illustration purposes only and may not be an exact representation of the product.

perfumes_data.name: Perfect Oud Extrait Mizensir for women and men

Master Perfumer Alberto Morillas uses the rare Alaskan cedar to dominate the heart of the scent, while cardamom and bergamot essence cool down the fragrance. This extrait de parfum blends notes of rose oxide and rum absolute, which gracefully lifts the scent of smoke to invigorate the senses.

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
"KILIAN PARIS presents its new limited edition summer perfume, inspired by monoi oil and tiare flower infused in coconut oil: Sunkissed Goddess. Our founder revisited this Polynesian elixir to give it an unparalleled radiance with floral notes as fresh as they are captivating that revive the sensory memories associated with the summer season. A fragrance that evokes the smells of summer, of tanning oil and the warmth of the sun radiating on the skin.

The fragrance opens with this happy marriage between a white tiaré with delicious creaminess and a terribly sensual essence of ylang-ylang, before giving way to the warm roundness of coconut and vanilla, and ending with notes of guaiac and labdanum cistus, two emblematic scents that KILIAN PARIS loves for their resinous character, their energy and their persistent charm."

Fragrance Notes: Ylang Ylang Essence, Tiare Flower, Coconut.

perfumes_data.detailed_description: "A perfectly unisex perfume! This composition is bursting with freshness and sensuality! The top note is deliciously sparkling through its touches of fresh and invigorating citrus. The sumptuous flowery heart is divinely enhanced by the peppery notes of powerful ginger. The richly woody base of oud, Indian patchouli, and Haitian vetiver continues with a sensual trail of amber and musk." -Brand website.

"SKINS X SALLE PRIVÉE, an exclusive scent in collaboration with Skins Cosmetics, a renowned beauty retailer that carries niche brands.
SKINS X SALLE PRIVÉE is an everyday fragrance that can be worn all year round. It is sexy, comfortable, and mysterious. The fragrance experience is different every time, and therefore this creation cannot be put in a box. "When I wear the perfume, it immediately gives me a positive energy. It brings out the best in me and makes me feel happy. Especially at this time, I think it is especially important to pass on that positivity because that is something we are all looking for now,” says [Skins founder] Philip Hillege. Salle Privée's co-founder Anna Hegeman adds: “The Perfume gives me an instant sense of excitement.” -Brand Website.

perfumes_data.name: Happy Hardcore Binaurale for women and men

perfumes_data.detailed_description: The cooling spice mix of saffron, nutmeg and black pepper pulsate to the hedonistic rhythm of rose oxide and jasmine sambac until the beat drops with an electrifying shot of guava jelly making way for a pumping bass of fractionated patchouli and oakmoss.

perfumes_data.name: Solar Aura Deck of Scarlet for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Solar Aura by Deck of Scarlet is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Solar Aura was launched in 2024.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Solar Aura by Deck of Scarlet captures the essence of a sunlit day with lush tropical flowers like jasmine, ylang ylang, and tiare mingling with bold citrus notes like blood orange, bergamot, and mandarin. Tonka bean and solar musk create a warm, skin-to-skin contact vibe, while whipped vanilla adds a touch of sweetness. This amber floral fragrance transitions seamlessly from hazy days to heated, sensual nights.

perfumes_data.name: CR7 Fearless Cristiano Ronaldo for men
perfumes_data.short_description: CR7 Fearless by Cristiano Ronaldo is a Woody Spicy fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. CR7 Fearless was launched in 2023. Top notes are Red Apple, Longoza, Bay Leaf, Grapefruit and Violet Leaf; middle notes are Nutmeg, Geranium and Violet; base notes are Amrostar®, Cashmeran, Labdanum, Vanilla and Tonka.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Iconic footballer Cristiano Ronaldo launches his newest fragrance, Cristiano Ronaldo Fearless, the second from the 7 Collection.
Cristiano invites us to take a deep dive into his mind, his ‘Mental Field’, a universe of ambition and discipline at the root of a fearless and determined man.
‘Mental Field’, the short film takes place on a planet resembling a floating pitch. We see Ronaldo frenetically chasing a ball of fire. Never giving up, he jumps, dodges and slides between the celestial elements. Reaching for the ball of fire, it transforms into the new Cristiano Ronaldo Fearless: the encapsulation of the aim for perfection.
‘’Fearless is more than just a fragrance—it's an attitude. With my new fragrance, I want to inspire my fans to keep chasing their dreams and to remember that every accomplishment starts in the mind’’ says Cristiano.
At the heart of Fearless lies the hero ingredient, Longoza—a remarkable plant cultivated in Madagascar. Just like Ronaldo who comes back stronger after defeats and challenges, Longoza possesses the extraordinary ability to regenerate itself, making it an everlasting plant.
The top notes of violet leaf, Longoza, apple, and bay leaf intertwine to create an invigorating opening, while the heart notes of geranium and violet add depth and complexity. The final notes of tonka, vanilla, cashmeran, cistus labdanum, and Ambrostar® leave an intense and sensual impression, enveloping you in a woody spicy embrace.
Housed in a sleek orange bottle, Cristiano Ronaldo Fearless was developed in collaboration with Eden Parfums.

perfumes_data.name: Cuban Tobacco Alghabra Parfums for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Cuban Tobacco by Alghabra Parfums is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Cuban Tobacco was launched in 2023. Top notes are Vanilla, Mojito and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Tobacco, Smoke, Plum Wine and Jasmine; base notes are Woody Notes, Tobacco Blossom and Salt.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
When Spanish sailors first explored Cuba in 1492, they returned with accounts of tall forests, chattering birds and men and women going from place to place “with a firebrand of weeds in their hands to take in the fragrant smoke.” Before long, Spanish colonists were growing and smoking tobacco too. As the demand for tobacco spread, the “weeds” became profitable. Cuba opened its first cigar factories in the early 1800s. Cuban Tobacco is an oriental, fruity scent. It embodies the smell of a tobacco aroma at its best. Starts with Mandarin Orange, Vanilla, and Mojito. Jasmine and Plum Wine unite with Tobacco and woody notes to create an olfactive journey through the history of Cuba. Salt is a note that you can notice throughout the whole experiment.
Funny Fact, Honey was used with cigars as a natural filter, adding a sweet flavor to the tobacco.
MANDARIN ORANGE • VANILLA • MOJITO
JASMINE • PLUM WINE • SMOKE • TOBACCO
TOBACCO BLOSSOM • WOODY NOTES • SALT
