perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Immense yourself in the allure of luxury and let it become an exquisite reflection of your own personal style. Zenobia is a symphony of opulent notes meticulously blended to perfection. Unveil a sensorial journey that transcends ordinary realms.
Top notes are Black Currant and Orange Blossom
Middle notes are Madagascar Vanilla, Syrian Royal Jasmine, Orchid, and Turkish Rose
Base notes are Oriental, Saffron, Leather, Moroccan Cedarwood, and Oud

perfumes_data.name: Turath MAISON ASRAR for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Turath by MAISON ASRAR is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Turath was launched in 2023. Top notes are Saffron, Black Pepper and Red Fruits; middle notes are Chocolate, Rose and Incense; base notes are Ambergris, Musk and Moss.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Turath belongs to the Oriental Orientaly fragrance family, offering a captivating olfactory experience that combines rich and luxurious notes.
The fragrance opens with a burst of sophistication, as the spicy warmth of black pepper intertwines with the luscious sweetness of red fruit. Saffron adds a touch of exoticism, creating an initial impression that is both inviting and intriguing. The heart notes reveal a rich and indulgent blend. Decadent chocolate weaves its way through the composition, intertwining with the resinous and spiritual aura of incense. The velvety softness of rose petals adds a floral elegance, balancing the intensity with a delicate touch. The fragrance concludes with Orientalgris, with its deep and golden warmth, forming the foundation of the fragrance, leaving an indelible impression of luxury. Moss adds an earthy complexity, while musk contributes a sensual and lingering trail, enveloping you in an aura of timeless sophistication.
Turath, with its Oriental Orientaly character, is a timeless and evocative fragrance that captures the essence of tradition and luxury. It is a symphony of notes that come together to create a sensorial experience that is both opulent and inviting.

perfumes_data.name: Dancing Sand The Dua Brand for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Dancing Sand by The Dua Brand is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. Dancing Sand was launched in 2023.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Dancing Sand by The Dua Brand is a fragrance that captures the essence of a specific place or sentiment, expertly crafted by renowned French brand Stéphane Humbert Lucas. Released in 2022, this fragrance is an amber vanilla composition that is both boozy and citrusy, with sweet undertones and a richly exotic aroma. The opening notes feature a generous spice from the whiskey accord, while the cacao adds a gentle sweetness alongside the tonka beans. Earthy tones of cedar and patchouli complete the base, providing a natural finish that leaves a lasting impression. Dancing Sand is available in an Extrait de Parfum concentration, ensuring a long-lasting and intense scent experience. The notes of Dancing Sand include whiskey, mandarin orange, coriander, cashmeran, cacao, sandalwood, tonka beans, cedar wood, benzoin, and patchouli. This fragrance offers a complex and multi-dimensional scent profile that combines the warmth of whiskey with the freshness of mandarin orange and the spice of coriander. The cacao adds a touch of sweetness, while the sandalwood and cedar wood contribute to the woody aspect of the fragrance. With its unique blend of notes, Dancing Sand falls under the olfactory group of Oriental Vanilla, offering a harmonious balance between warm amber accords and creamy vanilla undertones.

perfumes_data.name: Artisan Ethnique Lattafa Perfumes for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Artisan Ethnique by Lattafa Perfumes is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Artisan Ethnique was launched in 2024. perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Lattafa Pride Artisan Ethnique is an enchanting amber-sweet gourmand fragrance that exudes playful sophistication. The scent opens with a warm blend of cinnamon, sugar, and rum, creating an inviting sweetness that instantly captivates. The heart reveals a rich and indulgent mix of cacao, coffee, caramel, and oakmoss, adding depth and complexity. Finally, the base notes of tonka bean, cashmere, labdanum, and vanilla linger on the skin, offering a luxurious, lasting finish. Whether worn alone or layered, Lattafa Pride Artisan Ethnique is a must-have for anyone who appreciates the perfect balance of sweetness and elegance in their fragrance collection.
Top Notes: Cinnamon, Sugar, Rum.

Middle Notes: Cacao, Coffee, Caramel, Oakmoss.

Base Notes: Tonka Bean, Cashmere, Labdanum, Vanilla.

This scent is an olfactory celebration of contrasts, where vibrant fruitiness meets the deep, golden richness of exotic spices, creating an aura of sophistication and sensuality.
“A delectable harmony of luscious fruits, saffron and sandalwood .A true testament to luxurious pleasure”.

perfumes_data.name: Editor in Chief Michael Malul London for men

perfumes_data.detailed_description: "Victory" is the signature scent of strength and success, encased in a luxurious gold bottle. A crisp opening of citrus blends into a cedar heart, underpinned by a rich base of leather and amber, crafting a commanding presence.

perfumes_data.name: Sauvage Eau Forte Dior for men

perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Sauvage Eau Forte by Dior is a fresh and spicy fougère fragrance. This innovative scent features an alcohol-free formula, blending cold spices, bleached lavender, and musky woods. The fragrance is inspired by the symbolic power of water, creating a highly concentrated and milky-colored eau.
"The emblematic freshness of Sauvage intensified and extended by the power of water. A striking blend of cold spices and blanched lavender, deepened by the strength of musky woods in an exclusive water-based formula."
Available in bottles of 60 and 100 ml.

perfumes_data.name: Bull's Blood 2nd Edition Imaginary Authors for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Bull's Blood 2nd Edition by Imaginary Authors is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Bull's Blood 2nd Edition was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Josh Meyer.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
"The women and men in these pages are lovers and brawlers, bullfighters and boxers, soft talkers and hard drinkers. They inhabit dusty Spanish villages and dank, dark brothels. At the heart of these unforgettable characters is a determined and undying passion that pushes them to make extraordinary decisions in the face of fear. Their fates are varied but the outcome is always the same, these are stories that grip you by the throat and don’t let go until you profess your devotion. Seductive and steadfast, this classic is not for the faint of heart but for the full of heart."
NOTES: Geranium, Spanish Rose, Patchouli, Black Musk, Tobacco, Sandalwood, Bull’s Blood.
"No other fragrance in our line balances brutality and elegance like this beast. Ignore the glares, take the bull by horns, and show the world who’s boss. "
Available in 50ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: Rose Amira Guerlain for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Rose Amira by Guerlain is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Rose Amira was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Delphine Jelk.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
A distinguished rose combining power and gentleness.
Rose Amira is a nocturnal tribute to the queen of flowers, an essential scent and perfumery icon. In this journey to the heart of a Persian garden, rose reveals its most sensual fragrance. Shot through with the sacred swirls of frankincense and the warmth of patchouli, the majestic flower unfolds with a blend of strength and softness in a halo of musks.
The Allegoria fragrance collection celebrates the wonders of the world. Each creation pays tribute to nature’s beauty and sweeps us up in a discovery of exceptional raw ingredients and notes, beautifully enhanced by our perfumer-explorers. Discover Rose Amira, a nocturnal tribute to the queen of flowers, an essential scent and perfumery icon. In this journey to the heart of a Persian garden, rose reveals its most sensual fragrance. Shot through with the sacred swirls of frankincense and the warmth of patchouli, the majestic flower unfolds with a blend of strength and softness in a halo of musks.
"Rose Amira is my vision of rose, sumptuous and sensual within the secrecy of the night. A rose stood upright, turned towards the moon, within a poetic, nocturnal fragrance.” - Delphine Jelk, Guerlain Perfumer   Absolus Allegoria, the absolute fragrance collection, is an enchanting and mysterious journey to the heart of the world’s wonders once night falls fragrance trails celebrating deep and powerful nature, revealed by striking contrasts by moonlight.
A powerful symbol of Guerlain's commitment to the planet, Absolus Allegoria fragrances contain up to 90% natural origin. The French beetroot alcohol used in their formulas comes from a network committed to responsible farming.  Rose Amira comes in the Allegoria collection’s emblematic bottle made in France using 15% recycled glass. Featuring a removable spray pump and transparent lacquer finish, its design can be easily recycled. 90% to 94% of ingredients are of natural origin, by ISO 16128, the calculation includes water.

perfumes_data.name: Yinyang Sea House of Atropa for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Yinyang Sea by House of Atropa is a Floral Aquatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Yinyang Sea was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Lisa Andrék. Top notes are Osmanthus, Grapes, Woody Notes and Mint; middle notes are Osmanthus, Salt and Mango Tree; base notes are Cypress and Cabreuva.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Fragrance dedicated to the Yinyang Sea in Taiwan. Osmanthus solo with back vocals of mostly, black mint & wet grape branches. All components except salt, are 100% natural, and were extracted by the author.

The nose behind this fragrance is Christophe Raynaud. Top notes are Cardamom, Nutmeg, Bergamot and Grapefruit; middle notes are Cypress, Moss, Violet and Tonka Bean; base notes are Patchouli, Amber and Labdanum.

perfumes_data.name: Acne Studios Frederic Malle for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Acne Studios by Frederic Malle is a Floral Aldehyde fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Acne Studios was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Suzy Le Helley. Top notes are Aldehydes, Bergamot and Mandarin; middle notes are Peach, Orange Blossom, Violet, Rose, Lily of the Valley and Jasmine; base notes are Sandalwood, Frankincense, Iso E Super, Musk, Vanilla and Heliotrope.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
Acne Studios X Frédéric Malle represents a fusion of fashion, perfumery, and art. This unique collaboration yields a fragrance that delivers a neoclassical olfactory experience—vibrant yet comforting, magnetic yet bold.
Created by Suzy Le Helley, the sophisticated blend seamlessly combines notes of peach, orange blossom, aldehyde, and vanilla. Epitomizing elegance and refinement, this fragrance captures the luxurious aesthetic of Acne Studios, promising an unforgettable sensory journey.
Available in 50 and 100 ml Eau de Parfum.

perfumes_data.name: Sel d'Ambre Pierre Balmain for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Sel d'Ambre by Pierre Balmain is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Sel d'Ambre was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Quentin Bisch.
perfumes_data.detailed_description: Sel d'Ambre by Balmain captures the mystique of glittering desert nights in its reflective golden bottle. This fragrance features a captivating alchemy of glowing amber and the mineral and oceanic depth of salty ambergris. The opening captivates with warm spice rising from olibanum before the composition cools down with rukeri tea leaves. Caramelized ambers exult, carrying an opulent, long-lasting trail.

perfumes_data.name: Junoon Oud Al Haramain Perfumes for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Junoon Oud by Al Haramain Perfumes is a Woody Floral Musk fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Junoon Oud was launched in 2023. Top notes are Grapefruit and Woody Notes; middle notes are Musk, Amber and Jasmine; base notes are Woody Notes, Palisander Rosewood and Patchouli.

perfumes_data.name: Borderline Neroli La Serra for women and men
perfumes_data.short_description: Borderline Neroli by La Serra is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Borderline Neroli was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Olivier Cresp. Top notes are Neroli, Calabrian bergamot and Fig; middle notes are Tuberose and Jasmine; base notes are Sandalwood, Vanilla and Cedar.
perfumes_data.detailed_description:
The olfactory identity of BORDERLINE NEROLI takes inspiration by the struggle for balancing the self-image and sense of self.
THE FIGHT BETWEEN TWO OPPOSITE WHITE FLOWERS: the clean kindness of NATURAL NEROLI against the violence of NATURAL TUBEROSE essential oils.
The first is supported by a COMFORTABLE SOAPY CLEAN SMELL of NATURAL BERGAMOT CALABRIA OIL, while the second is sharpened by a GREEN FRUITY note of FIG.

We have taken inspiration from an aspect of the Borderline Personality Disorder which is the struggle for balancing the self-image and sense of self.
